description: ''Optibet'' Latvijas-Igaunijas līgas ceturtdaļfināla sērijas otrajā spēlē neveiksmi piedzīvoja ''Rīgas Zeļļi'', kas izbraukumā ar 84:92 piekāpās ''Tartu Ulikool'' basketbolistiem. Rezultāts sērijā līdz divām uzvarām kļuvis neizšķirts 1-1.
title_translated: There will be a decisive battle: '' Riga Zeļļi '', after a convincing victory
description_translated: Optibet in the second game of the quarter-finals of the Latvian-Estonian league, "Riga Zeļļi" failed, which defeated Tartu Ulikool for 84:92. The result in the series up to two wins has become a 1-1 draw.

title: NATO ģenerālsekretārs apstiprina četru ASV karavīru bojāeju Lietuvā
description: NATO ģenerālsekretārs Marks Rite ir apstiprinājis, ka Lietuvā gājuši bojā četri ASV karavīri, taču sīkākus komentārus nav sniedzis, vēsta "TV3 Ziņas".
title_translated: NATO Secretary General confirms the death of four US soldiers in Lithuania
description_translated: NATO Secretary General Mark Rite has confirmed that four US soldiers have been killed in Lithuania, but have not made further comments, reports TV3 News.

title: "Ryanair" ievieš jaunu piedāvājumu, kas ceļotājiem sola būtisku ietaupījumu
description: Aviokompānija "Ryanair" paziņojusi par jaunas abonēšanas atlaides programmas “Prime” ieviešanu, kas paredzēta tās biežākajiem pasažieriem. Šī iniciatīva ļaus lojālākajiem ceļotājiem ietaupīt vēl vairāk, piedāvājot virkni ekskluzīvu priekšrocību, piemēram, bezmaksas sēdvietu rezervēšanu, bezmaksas ceļojumu apdrošināšanu un īpašus piedāvājumus 12 reizes gadā – vienu reizi katru mēnesi.
title_translated: "Ryanair" introduces a new offer that promises travelers a significant savings
description_translated: Ryanair has announced the introduction of a new subscription discount program Prime, for its most common passengers. This initiative will allow the most loyal travelers to save even more by offering a number of exclusive benefits, such as free seating, free travel insurance and special offers 12 times a year - once a month.

title: Satversmes tiesas spriedums rada pārdomas par tiesiskuma un cilvēktiesību nozīmi demokrātiskā sabiedrībā
description: Satversmes tiesas 14.03.2025. spriedums lietā Nr.2022-32-01 par regulējumu, kas noteic noziedzīgi iegūtas mantas izcelsmes pierādīšanu, rada pārdomas par tiesiskuma un cilvēktiesību nozīmi demokrātiskā sabiedrībā.
title_translated: The judgment of the Constitutional Court creates a reflection on the importance of the rule of law and human rights in a democratic society
description_translated: Constitutional Court 14.03.2025. The judgment in Case No.2022-32-01 on the provision of the origin of the criminal property creates a reflection on the importance of the rule of law and human rights in a democratic society.

title: Kāpēc ASV prezidenta teiktais samazināja mūsu pensijas
description: Pēdējā laikā Latvijā otrā līmeņa pensiju fondu ienesīgums gan nav stipri, bet ir samazinājies. Un tas ir Donalda Trampa politikas rezultāts, uzskata starptautiskās audita, nodokļu, juridisko un biznesa ārpakalpojumu kompānijas BDO Latvia partneris, ekonomikas zinātņu doktors Edgars Voļskis.
title_translated: Why did the US president reduce our pensions
description_translated: Recently, Latvia's second -pillar pension funds are not strong, but it has decreased. And this is the result of Donald Trump's policy, according to BDO Latvia, a partner of international audit, tax, legal and business outsourcing company Edgars Voļskis, Doctor of Economics.

title: Robežsardze/Rīga volejbolisti uzvar pirmajā Latvijas čempionāta finālspēlē
description: "Robežsardze"/"Rīga" trešdien Rīgā pirmajā "Optibet" Latvijas volejbola čempionāta finālsērijas mačā piecos setos pārspēja "Ezerzeme"/"Daugavpils Universitāte" ("Ezerzeme"/DU) vienību.
title_translated: Border Guard/Riga Volleyball players wins the first Latvian Championship final
description_translated: "Border Guard"/"Riga" on Wednesday in Riga in the first "Optibet" Latvian Volleyball Championship finals in five sets beat "Ezerzeme"/"Daugavpils University" ("Ezerzeme"/DU) unit.

title: ASV izskatot Krievijas nosacījumus pamieram, Zelenskis pārmet manipulēšanu
description: Pat pēc otrdien izskanējušajiem ASV, Krievijas un Ukrainas paziņojumiem, ka panākta konceptuāla vienošanās par uguns pārtraukšanu pa energoinfrastruktūru, uguns pārtraukšanu Melnajā jūrā un pasākumiem kuģošanas drošības un civilo kravu pārvadāšanas Melnajā jūrā atjaunošanai, joprojām nav skaidrs, vai un kā šī konceptuālā vienošanās tiks īstenota.
title_translated: In the US, when the Russian conditions for a ceasefire, Zelensky accuses manipulation
description_translated: Even after Tuesday's announcements made by the United States, Russia and Ukraine that a conceptual agreement on the termination of fire on energy infrastructure, the cessation of fire in the Black Sea and the measures for the restoration of shipping and civilian cargo in the Black Sea is still unclear whether and how this conceptual agreement will be implemented.

title: Sieviete 46 gadu vecumā pārcieš infarktu un pastāsta par neparastiem simptomiem, kurus ignorēja
description: Nikijas stāsts parāda, cik svarīgi ir ieklausīties savā ķermenī un savlaicīgi reaģēt uz neparastiem simptomiem. Ātra reakcija var glābt dzīvību, īpaši, ja runa ir par agrīnām infarkta pazīmēm.
title_translated: A woman at the age of 46 undergoes a heart attack and tells about unusual symptoms ignored
description_translated: Nicia's story shows the importance of listening to your body and responding to unusual symptoms in a timely manner. A quick reaction can save life, especially when it comes to early signs of infarction.

title: Bļugers Ņujorkā gūst astotos vārtus šosezon
description: Nacionālajā hokeja līgā (NHL) svarīgu uzvaru Vankūveras "Canucks" komandai palīdzējis izcīnīt Teodors Bļugers. Latvietis atzīmējās ar rezultatīvu piespēli, bet komanda uzvarēja Ņujorkas "Islanders" ar 5:2.
title_translated: Blauger in New York gets the eighth goals this season
description_translated: In the National Hockey League (NHL) an important victory for the Vancouver Canucks has been helped by Theodore Bluger. The Latvian scored a successful pass, but the team won the New York Islanders by 5: 2.

title: Porziņģim 30 punkti Celtics uzvarā pār Suns
description: Latvijas basketbolists Kristaps Porziņģis trešdien Nacionālās basketbola asociācijas (NBA) mačā izcēlās ar 30 punktiem un sekmēja Bostonas "Celtics" septīto panākumu pēc kārtas.
title_translated: Porzģis 30 points in the Celtics victory over the dog
description_translated: Latvian basketball player Kristaps Porziņģis stood out on Wednesday with 30 points in the National Basketball Association (NBA) match and contributed to the seventh consecutive success of the Boston Celtics.

title: Par gada cilvēku medicīnā atzīst traumatologu un ortopēdu Mārtiņu Malzubri
description: Par aizvadītā gada cilvēku medicīnā atzīts traumatologs un ortopēds Mārtiņš Malzubris, kuram trešdienas vakarā pasniegta "Gada balvas medicīnā", aģentūrai LETA pavēstīja Latvijas Ārstu biedrībā (LĀB).
title_translated: A traumatologist and orthopedist Martin Malzubri is recognized as people of the year
description_translated: A traumatologist and orthopedist Martins Malzubris, who was presented "Annual Medicine Awards" on Wednesday night, has been recognized as people in medicine last year, LETA told the Latvian Medical Society (LAB).

title: Kaspars Cipruss Rīgā sagaida basketbola fanu pūļus, bet drošība būs pirmajā vietā
description: Ārvalstu līdzjutēji, kuri augustā un septembrī Rīgā ieradīsies uz Eiropas čempionātu basketbolā, varētu viesnīcās pavadīt vismaz 200 000 naktis, intervijā žurnāla "Sporta Avīze" marta numurā prognozēja Latvijas Basketbola savienības (LBS) ģenerālsekretārs un turnīra izpilddirektors Kaspars Cipruss.
title_translated: Kaspars Cyprus is waiting for basketball fan crowds in Riga, but security will be in the first place
description_translated: Foreign fans, who will arrive in Riga for the European Basketball Championship in August and September, could spend at least 200,000 nights in hotels, the Latvian Basketball Union (LBS) Secretary General and Tournament Executive Director Kaspars Cyprus predicted in an interview with Sporta Avīze.

title: Medijs: Internetā atrodami Trampa svarīgāko drošības padomnieku privātie dati un paroles
description: ASV prezidenta Donalda Trampa svarīgāko drošības padomnieku privātie kontaktinformācijas dati ir atrodami internetā, vēsta žurnāls "Der Spiegel".
title_translated: Media: Private data and passwords of Trump's most important security advisers on the Internet
description_translated: Private contact details of US President Donald Trump's most important security advisers can be found on the Internet, reports Der Spiegel magazine.

title: U19 futzālisti Jelgavā gūst panākumu pār Andoru
description: Latvijas U19 telpu futbola izlase ceturtdien Jelgavā otrajā šī gada Eiropas čempionāta kvalifikācijas pamatkārtas turnīra spēlē ar rezultātu 4:1 uzvarēja pundurvalsti Andoru, tādējādi saglabājot izredzes sacensību pēdējā kārtā izcīnīt vietu finālturnīrā.
title_translated: U19 Footballers in Jelgava are successful over Andorra
description_translated: The Latvian U19 indoor football team in Jelgava on Thursday in the second round of this year's European Championship Qualifying Tournament with a score of 4: 1 defeated the dwarf country Andorra, thus maintaining the prospect of winning a place in the final.

title: Aizvadīts Hospiss LV organizētais trešais diskusiju forums “Tiesības uz cieņpilnu nāvi: Teikt vai neteikt". Kas secināts?
description: Vakardien, 26. martā, Latvijas Universitātes Mazajā aulā norisinājās trešais nodibinājuma “Hospiss LV” rīkotais diskusiju forums “Tiesības uz cieņpilnu nāvi”. Pasākums klātienē pulcēja rekordlielu apmeklētāju skaitu, apliecinot aizvien pieaugošo sabiedrības interesi par cieņpilnas attieksmes un atklātas komunikācijas nozīmi dzīves noslēgumā. Deviņi pieredzējuši lektori visas dienas garumā dalījās pieredzē un viedokļos, aplūkojot sarežģīto dilemmu “teikt vai neteikt” – vai un kā pacientam atklāt patiesību par viņa veselības stāvokli un paredzamo dzīvildzi.
title_translated: Hospis LV's third discussion forum "Right to Respect Death: To say or not to say". What concluded?
description_translated: Yesterday, March 26, the third discussion forum "Right to Respect Death" was held in the Small Hall of the University of Latvia. The event gathered a record number of visitors in person, proving the growing public interest in the importance of respectful attitudes and open communication at the end of life. Nine experienced lecturers shared their experiences and opinions throughout the day, looking at the complex dilemma of "say or not say" whether and how the patient discover the truth about his health and the expected survival.

title: Medijs: pirms kara sākuma Krievijā tika ievesta skaidra nauda 12 miljardu ASV dolāru vērtībā, taču iemesls nav skaidrs
description: Pusotra mēneša laikā pirms pilna mēroga iebrukuma Ukrainā Krievijā tika ievesta skaidra nauda – dolāri, eiro un Šveices franki – vairāk nekā 12 miljardu ASV dolāru vērtībā. Kam tieši bija paredzēta šī skaidra nauda, joprojām nav zināms, ziņo “Meduza”.
title_translated: Media: Before the war starts in Russia, cash worth $ 12 billion was brought in, but the reason is not clear
description_translated: Within a month and a half before a full -scale invasion of Ukraine, cash - dollars, euros and Swiss francs - more than $ 12 billion - were imported in Russia. Whoever had this cash was expected is still unknown, reports Medusa.

title: Latvijas izlase pirms EČ aizvadīs pārbaudes mačus arī pret Itāliju un Grieķiju
description: Latvijas vīriešu basketbola izlase pirms šogad gaidāmā Eiropas čempionāta Rīgā aizvadīs pārbaudes mačus izbraukumā ar Itāliju un Grieķiju, raidījumā "Ūdenszeļļi" atklāja Latvijas Basketbola savienības (LBS) ģenerālsekretārs Kaspars Cipruss.
title_translated: The Latvian team will also play a test match against Italy and Greece before the EC
description_translated: The Latvian men's basketball team will play test matches with Italy and Greece before the upcoming European Championship in Riga this year, Kaspars Cyprus, Secretary General of the Latvian Basketball Union (LBS), opened in the broadcast "Water Zeels".

title: Loceniece turpina svilināt grozus, Šauļi sērijas vidū atlaiž treneri
description: Ceturtdien, 27. martā, turpinājās "BioSil" Sieviešu Baltijas basketbola līgas izslēgšanas spēles. Klaipēdas "LCC International University" mājās uzvarēja "Šiauliai/Vilmers" ar 77:60, divcīņas summā guva virsroku ar 174:108 un izcīnīja ceļazīmi uz "Final Four".
title_translated: Leneniece continues to heal baskets, Šiauliai releases coaches in the middle of the series
description_translated: On Thursday, March 27, the Biosil Women's Baltic Basketball League elimination continued. Klaipeda's "LCC International University" won "Šiauliai/Wilmers" at home with 77:60, winning a 174: 108 in the sum and won the road to the Final Four.

title: NBA sadarbībā ar FIBA vērtēs līgas izveidi Eiropā
description: Nacionālā basketbola asociācija (NBA) sadarbībā ar Starptautisko Basketbola federāciju (FIBA) vērtēs līgas izveidi Eiropā, ceturtdien kopīgā preses konferencē paziņoja NBA komisārs Edams Silvers un FIBA ģenerālsekretārs Andreass Zagklis.
title_translated: The NBA in cooperation with FIBA ​​will evaluate the creation of the league in Europe
description_translated: The National Basketball Association (NBA), in cooperation with the International Basketball Federation (FIBA), will evaluate the creation of the league in Europe, NBA Commissioner Edams Silvers and FIBA ​​Secretary General Andreas Zagklis said at a joint press conference on Thursday.

title: Par iespējamo Rietumu kontingentu Ukrainā ir daudz jautājumu, norāda Zelenskis
description: Par iespējamo Rietumu militārā kontingenta nosūtīšanu uz Ukrainu miera vienošanās ietvaros joprojām ir daudz jautājumu, ceturtdien sacīja Ukrainas prezidents Volodimirs Zelenskis.
title_translated: There are many questions about the possible Western contingent in Ukraine, Zelenskis points out
description_translated: There are still many questions about the possible sending of the Western military contingent to Ukraine, said Ukrainian President Volodimir Zelensky on Thursday.

title: "Jēkabpils lūši" uzvar pirmajā spēlē par bronzu
description: Volejbola kluba “Piejūra”/Murjāņu Sporta ģimnāzijas komanda ceturtdien savās mājās Sējas pamatskolas sporta centrā trijos setos zaudēja “Jēkabpils lūšiem” pirmajā spēlē par Latvijas čempionāta bronzas medaļām. Sērija ritēs līdz divām uzvarām.
title_translated: "Jekabpils lynx" wins the first game for bronze
description_translated: The team of volleyball club "Piejūra"/Murjan Sports Gymnasium on Thursday lost to the "Jekabpils lynx" in the first game of the Latvian Championship for bronze medals at the Sēja Elementary Sports Center on Thursday. The series will go up to two wins.

title: Jānim Bērziņam Polijā klupiens divu papildlaiku cīņā
description: Polijas basketbola meistarsacīkstēs Jāņa Bērziņa komanda Valbžihas "Górnik Zamek Książ" (bilance 14-9) savā laukumā 50 minūtes ilgušā kaujā ar 104:108 piekāpās Ostruvas Velkopolskas "Stal" (9-14).
title_translated: Jānis Berzins in Poland is stumbled by two overtime battle
description_translated: In the Polish Basketball Championship, Janis Berzins' team Valbžiha's "Górnik Zamek książ" (balance 14-9) defeated Ostruvas Volcopolsk's "Stal" (9-14) in a 50-minute battle in a 50-minute battle.

title: 51 gadu vēlāk bibliotēkai tiek atgriezta kādreiz izņemtā grāmata
description: Ziemeļdakotas bibliotēka paziņoja, ka 51 gadu vēlāk, kopš atgriešanas termiņa iztecēšanas, anonīmi tika atgriezta grāmata "Rebeka" (autore Dafne di Morjē), ziņo “UPI”.
title_translated: 51 years later the library is returned to the ever removed book
description_translated: The North Dakota Library announced that the book "Rebeka" (author Dafne di Morier) was returned anonymously 51 years later, the river reported.

title: Meloni: ASV līdzdalība Eiropas sarunās par Ukrainu ir būtiska
description: Itālijas premjerministre Džordža Meloni ceturtdien pauda cerību, ka nākamajā Eiropas sanāksmē par Ukrainu piedalīsies arī ASV.
title_translated: Meloni: USA's participation in European talks on Ukraine is essential
description_translated: Italian Prime Minister George Meloni said on Thursday that the US will be attending the next European meeting on Ukraine.

title: 51 gadu vēlāk bibliotēkai tiek atgriezta kādreiz izņemtā grāmata
description: Ziemeļdakotas bibliotēka paziņoja, ka 51 gadu vēlāk, kopš atgriešanas termiņa iztecēšanas, anonīmi tika atgriezta grāmata "Rebeka" (autore Dafne di Morjē), ziņo “UPI”.
title_translated: 51 years later the library is returned to the ever removed book
description_translated: The North Dakota Library announced that the book "Rebeka" (author Dafne di Morier) was returned anonymously 51 years later, the river reported.

title: Dzierkals un Zviedrijas čempione viena panākuma attālumā no pusfināla
description: Zviedrijas augstākās Hokeja līgas (SHL) ceturtdaļfināla sērijā 3-1 panākusi Šellefteo komanda, kura šovakar savā laukumā ar 6:2 satrieca Kārlstades "Färjestad".
title_translated: Dzierkals and Swedish champion one success from the semi -finals
description_translated: The Swedish Supreme Hockey League (SHL) quarter-finals series 3-1 was reached by the Shellefteo team, who tonight's 6: 2 struck Karlstad's "Färjestad".

title: Serbijas treneris par apakšgrupas favorītiem uzskata latviešus
description: Serbijas vīriešu basketbola izlases treneris Svetislavs Pešičs un Čehijas valstsvienības stūrmanis Djego Okampo ir atšķirīgās domās par to, kuri būs apakšgrupas favorīti šovasar Rīgā gaidāmajā Eiropas čempionātā.
title_translated: Serbian coach considers Latvians as sub -group favorites
description_translated: Serbian men's basketball coach Svetislav Pechich and Czech national team steering Djego Okampo are different in thoughts about who will be the favorites of the sub -group this summer in the upcoming European Championship in Riga.

title: Vasiļjevs un Kuļišs pasaules daiļslidošanas čempionātā kvalificējas izvēles programmai
description: Latvijas pārstāvji Deniss Vasiļjevs un Fedirs Kuļišs ceturtdien Bostonā pasaules daiļslidošanas čempionātā īsajā programmā iekļuva labāko 24 skaitā un kvalificējās sestdien gaidāmajai izvēles programmai.
title_translated: Vasilyev and Kulish in the World Figure Skating Championship qualify for the selection program
description_translated: Latvia's representatives Denis Vasilyev and Fedir Kulish entered the top 24 in the short program of the World Figure Skating Championship on Thursday and qualified for Saturday's upcoming selection program.

title: VIDEO ⟩ Purvciemā vīrietis ar elektrošoku nogalina savu māti un pats piesakās policijā
description: Ikdienišķs ģimenes strīds Purvciemā ievirzījās kriminālā gultnē brīdī, kad 27 gadus vecs vīrietis sāka spīdzināt savu māti, ziņo "Degpunktā".
title_translated: Video⟩ in Purvciems a man with electric shock kills his mother and applies himself to the police
description_translated: The everyday family dispute in Purvciems moved into a criminal direction when a 27 -year -old man began to torture his mother, reports at the "Burnpoint".

title: Meloni nākamajās Eiropas sarunās par Ukrainu vēlas ASV līdzdalību
description: Itālijas premjerministre Džordža Meloni ceturtdien pauda cerību, ka nākamajā Eiropas sanāksmē par Ukrainu piedalīsies arī ASV.
title_translated: Meloni in future European talks on Ukraine wants US participation
description_translated: Italian Prime Minister George Meloni said on Thursday that the US will be attending the next European meeting on Ukraine.

title: Uščins Hannoverei palīdz graut un uzrāpties Bundeslīgas smailē
description: Vācijas Bundeslīgā rokasbumbā 24. spēļu kārtas ievadā Renāra Uščina "Hannover-Burgdorf" savā laukumā ar 32:18 sakāva lejasgala vienību "Bietigheim-Meterzimmern", reabilitējoties par punkta pazaudēšanu (28:28) savstarpējā cīņā pirmajā aplī.
description_translated: In the German Bundesliga Handball, Renar Ushchin's Hannover-Burgdorf defeated the Lower Bietigheim-Meterzimern unit at 32:18, rehabilitating to losing a point (28:28) in the first lap with 32:18.

title: Žurnāls: Internetā atrodami augstu ASV amatpersonu privātie dati un paroles
description: ASV prezidenta Donalda Trampa svarīgāko drošības padomnieku privātie kontaktinformācijas dati ir atrodami internetā, vēsta žurnāls "Der Spiegel".
title_translated: Magazine: On the Internet there are private data and passwords of high US officials
description_translated: Private contact details of US President Donald Trump's most important security advisers can be found on the Internet, reports Der Spiegel magazine.

title: Soldatenoks pēdējā sekundē salauž mārupiešu sirdis, Buki nobradā "Līvānus"
description: "Ramirent" Nacionālajā basketbola līgā ar dramatisku spēles iznākumu ievadīta ceturtdaļfinālu stadija. Sērijas favorīte "Rīgas Stradiņa Universitāte/VEF Rīga" ar Kristapa Soldatenoka metienu pēc atlēkušās bumbas pēdējā sekundē izrāva uzvaru ar 79:78 pār "Mārupi/Latvijas Universitāti".
title_translated: Soldatenok breaks the hearts of Marupe in the last second, Buki's "Livani"
description_translated: Ramirent in the National Basketball League with a dramatic outcome of the game was entered in the quarter -finals stage. The favorite of the series "Riga Stradins University/VEF Rīga" with a shot by Kristaps Soldatenok after a rebound in the last second pulled the victory with 79:78 over "Marupe/University of Latvia".

title: Mileja rūgtās zāles palīdzējušas atveseļot Argentīnas ekonomiku, bet daudziem nācies savilkt jostu
description: Argentīnas prezidents Havjers Milejs nāca pie varas ar solījumu ievērojami samazināt valsts aparātu un uzlabot ekonomikas stāvokli, lai Argentīna izrautos no gadu desmitiem ilgās stagnācijas. Milejam izdevies izpildīt daļu solījumu, taču skarbās reformas padziļinājušas mazāk aizsargāto sabiedrības grupu ciešanas.
title_translated: Miley bitter halls have helped recover the Argentine economy, but many have to tighten the belt
description_translated: Argentine President Javier Mile came to power with a promise to significantly reduce the state apparatus and improve the economic situation to break Argentina from decades of stagnation. Mile has managed to fulfill some of the promises, but the harsh reforms have deepened the suffering of vulnerable groups.

title: Krista Draveniece: Lūk, kas izraisījis bērnu masveida inficēšanos, bet no sākuma samaksā man. Nopietni?
title_translated: Krista Draveniece: Here's what caused the child's mass infection, but at first pay me. Seriously?

title: Iznācis žurnāla Dārza Pasaule ikgadējais speciālizdevums Siltumnīcai un balkonam!
description: Paša audzēti – visgardākie!
title_translated: The annual special edition of the garden world has come out for the greenhouse and the balcony!
description_translated: Self -grown - the most delicious!

title: Francijā top mājas no kartona
description: Visā pasaulē tiek meklēti jauni videi draudzīgi materiāli, ko izmantot ēku būvēšanai. Francijas reģionā Bretaņā šim mērķim jau 10 gadus izmanto arī parasto kartonu.
title_translated: In France Top Homes from Cardboard
description_translated: New environmentally friendly materials are being sought around the world to use for buildings. In the French region in Brittany, regular cardboard has been using for this purpose for 10 years.

title: Ābols rezultatīvs otrajā spēlē pēc kārtas, Girgensons un Tampa grauj ar 8:0
description: Nacionālajā hokeja līgā (NHL) pie panākumiem tikušas latviešu pārstāvētās komandas. Rodrigo Ābols atzīmējās ar rezultatīvu piespēli, palīdzot Filadelfijas "Flyers" uzvarēt Monreālas "Canadiens" (6:4) un pārtraukt sešu zaudējumu sēriju. Savukārt Zemgus Girgensons un Tampabejas "Lightning" ar 8:0 viesos sagrāva Jūtas hokeja komandu.
title_translated: Apple scoring in the second game in a row, Girgenson and Tampa ruins with 8: 0
description_translated: Latvian teams represented by Latvians have been successful in the National Hockey League (NHL). Rodrigo Apple marked a successful pass, helping the Flyers of the Philadelphia to win the Montreal Canadiens (6: 4) and end the six loss series. Zemgus Girgenson and Tampabey's Lightning, with an 8-0 lead, destroyed the Utah Hockey team.

title: ASV apcirptais finansējums augstākajai izglītībai ietekmē pētnieku darbu
description: ASV prezidents Donalds Tramps kopš stāšanās amatā ir veicis vairākas darbības, kas būtiski ietekmē augstākās izglītības iestādes valstī – aptur finansējumu vairākām pētniecības programmām, plāno likvidēt Izglītības ministriju, kā arī iestājas pret antisemītismu universitātēs. Tāpat Trampa administrācija aktīvi izmeklē vairāk nekā 50 universitātes, kuras īsteno iniciatīvas, kas veicina daudzveidību, vienlīdzību un iekļaušanu darba tirgū. Politiskie vēji jau tagad daudzās universitātēs liek krasi samazināt budžetu. Vai šūpošanās ASV augstskolās varētu sekmēt, ka Eiropa atgūs gudros prātus?
title_translated: The US Funding for Higher Education affects the work of researchers
description_translated: US President Donald Trump has taken a number of activities since taking office, which has a significant impact on higher education institutions in the country - suspending funding for several research programs, planning to liquidate the Ministry of Education, and opposed to anti -Semitism at universities. The Trump Administration is also actively investigating more than 50 universities that implement initiatives that promote diversity, equality and inclusion in the labor market. Political winds already make many universities cut the budget dramatically. Could swing at US universities to make Europe regain smart minds?

title: Eiropas čempioni Pļaviņš/Fokerots piekāpjas galotnēs, atzīstot norvēģu pārākumu
description: Meksikas dienvidaustrumu kūrorts Plaja del Karmena šonedēļ uzņem "Beach Pro" pirmo elites posmu jaunajā sezonā. 2024. gada Eiropas čempioni pludmales volejbolā Mārtiņš Pļaviņš/Kristians Fokerots pamatturnīra otrajā mačā zaudēja norvēģiem - 18:21, 18:21. Mūsu nākamā spēle būs šovakar vai naktī uz rītdienu.
title_translated: European Champions Plavin/Fokerot concedes at the ends, recognizing the Norwegian superiority
description_translated: Southeast Mexico resort Play Del Carmen hosts Beach Pro's first elite in the new season this week. Mārtiņš Plaviņš/Kristian Fokerots lost to the Norwegians at 18:21, 18:21 in the second match of the European Beach Volleyball Champions in Beach Volleyball 2024. Our next game will be tonight or night for tomorrow.

description_translated: On Friday, the E3 Saxo Bank Classic Cycling Juniors, which was also the first round of the year's World Nations Cup, finished in the leading group and won 26th place in the lead group and 136. George was also the fifth fastest first year junior.

description_translated: Russia will create a new digital platform that will help the authorities to implement digital control over the public.

title: Kas ir skandalozā Igaunijas zvaigzne Tomijs Kešs un kāpēc viņš tic savai uzvarai "Eirovīzijā"?
description: Šogad viena no spilgtākajām starptautiskā dziesmu konkursa "Eirovīzija" zvaigznēm neapšaubāmi ir Igaunijas pārstāvis, reperis Tomijs Kešs (Tommy Cash), kurš ar dziesmu "Espresso Macchiato" jau paspējis izraisīt starptautisku skandālu.
title_translated: What is the scandalous Estonian star Tommy Kesh and why does he believe in his victory in "Eurovision"?
description_translated: This year, one of the most prominent stars of the International Song Contest "Eurovision" is undoubtedly Estonia, rapper Tommy Cash, who has already been able to cause an international scandal with the song "Espresso Macchiato".

title: Svarīgs iemesls, kāpēc banānu mizas nevajadzētu izmest atkritumos
description: Daudziem no mums šķiet pašsaprotami izmest banānu mizas, ābolu serdes vai citu augļu atliekas kopējā sadzīves atkritumu tvertnē. Tas šķiet nekaitīgi – taču patiesībā tā ir nopietna vides problēma, kas saistīta ar klimata pārmaiņām, vēsta "postimees.ee".
title_translated: An important reason for banana peel should not be thrown away in waste
description_translated: For many of us, it seems self -evident to dispose of banana peel, apple cores or other fruit residues in a common household waste bin. It seems harmless - but in reality it is a serious environmental problem related to climate change, reports "Postimees.ee".

description: Šovbiznesa pasaulē interesantu notikumu netrūkst ne dienas - par tiem parūpējas gan dziedātāji un aktieri, gan karaļnama pārstāvji, politiķi un sportisti.
title_translated: Justin Biber surprises fans, Ben Aflek talks about divorce from Jennifer Lopez - a week in world show business
description_translated: There is no shortage of interesting events in the show business world - both singers and actors and royal representatives, politicians and athletes take care of them.

title: Ķirsis pirms Everesta
description: _SestDiena_ pirms 30 gadiem rakstīja.
title_translated: Cherry before Everest
description_translated: _Sestday_ wrote 30 years ago.

title: Kardiologs Andrejs Ērglis pārsteidz rezerves karavīru ierindā
description: “Šis man bija pēdējais brīdis pieteikties Nacionālo bruņoto spēku rezervistu militārās apmācības kursam, jo nākamgad vecuma dēļ man tas vairs nebūtu iespējams,” uzsver kardiologs Andrejs Ērglis, kas 60 gadu vecumā kļuvis par rezerves karavīru.
title_translated: Cardiologist Andrejs Ērglis impresses with reserve soldiers
description_translated: "This was the last moment to apply for the National Armed Forces Reserve Military Training Course, because next year it would no longer be possible for me," emphasizes the cardiologist Andrei Eagle, who became a reserve soldier at the age of 60.

title: Akmeņi arī no Indijas un Dienvidamerikas. Kā tēvs un dēls Salaspilī dod marmoram un granītam jaunu vērtību
description: Dabīgā akmens apstrādes uzņēmuma "Pilsakmens" dibinātājs Rihards Mateisons ar akmeņiem ir ciešā saziņā jau 30 gadus – deviņdesmitajos viņš sāka kā amatnieks, bet vēlāk izveidoja savu biznesu, kurā tagad saimnieko kopā ar savu dēlu Ati. Akmens apstrādes ražotnē Salaspilī atrodas plašākā akmens plākšņu noliktava Baltijā. No akmens plātnēm te top virtuves virsmas, kāpnes un grīdas, apdare fasādēm un citi produkti.
title_translated: Stones also from India and South America. As a father and son in Salaspils gives a new value to marble and granite
description_translated: Rihards Mateison, founder of the natural stone processing company "Pilsmone", has been in close communication for 30 years - in the nineties he started as a craftsman, but later set up his own business, now managing his son Ati. The stone processing plant in Salaspils has the largest stone plate warehouse in the Baltics. The stone slabs are made here for kitchen surfaces, stairs and floors, facades and other products.

title: Šodien visā Latvijā būs daļējs Saules aptumsums
description: Šodien pusdienlaikā visā Latvijā notiks daļējs Saules aptumsums. Šo var uzskatīt par nelielu aptumsumu, jo maksimālajā brīdī būs aizsegta piektā daļa Saules diametra. Sinoptiķu prognozes liecina, ka nekas netraucēs vērot šo parādību, visā Latvijā šajā laikā debesis būs skaidras, tikai pēcpusdienā mākoņi var parādīties Kurzemē.
title_translated: Today there will be a partial solar eclipse all over Latvia
description_translated: Today at noon, a partial solar eclipse will take place throughout Latvia. This can be considered as a slight eclipse as the fifth part of the sun's diameter will be covered at the maximum. The forecasts of the opticians indicate that nothing will interfere with this phenomenon, throughout Latvia at this time the sky will be clear, only in the afternoon can the clouds appear in Kurzeme.

title: Kasatkina atbrīvojas no neitrālā statusa un turpmāk pārstāvēs Austrāliju
description: Nu jau bijusī neitrālā tenisiste Darja Kasatkina turpmāk spēlēs zem Austrālijas karoga.
title_translated: Kasatkina gets rid of neutral status and will continue to represent Australia
description_translated: The former neutral tennis player Darya Kasatkina will play under the Australian flag.

title: Merzļikins atvaira 31 metienu «Blue Jackets» uzvarā NHL pār Bļugera un Šilova «Canucks»
description: Latvijas vārtsargs Elvis Merzļikins piektdien atvairīja 31 metienu Nacionālās hokeja līgas (NHL) mačā, kurā viņa Kolumbusas "Blue Jackets" komanda izcīnīja uzvaru. "Blue Jackets" mājās ar rezultātu 7:6 uzvarēja Vankūveras "Canucks" komandu, kuru pārstāv Latvijas uzbrucējs Teodors Bļugers un Latvijas vārtsargs Artūrs Šilovs.
title_translated: Merzlikin bounces 31 shots in the Blue Jackets win in the NHL over Blugger and Shilov's Canucks
description_translated: Latvian goalkeeper Elvis Merzlikin on Friday fouled out 31 shots in the National Hockey League (NHL) match in which his Columbus Blue Jackets team won. The Blue Jackets defeated the Vancouver Canucks team at home with a score of 7: 6, represented by Latvian striker Theodore Blauger and Latvian goalkeeper Arthur Shilov.

title: Dzīvnieku sargi no Rēzeknes ķer tos, kuri neievēro mājas mīluļu pavairošanas noteikumus
description: Pamanot sludinājumu "Facebook" vietnē, ka kāds saimnieks meklē mēnešu veciem kucēniem jaunas mājas, un zinot, ka konkrētā persona ne pirmo reizi izvieto šāda veida sludinājumus, dzīvnieku sargi no Rēzeknes izlika lamatas, lai bezatbildīgo saimnieku sauktu pie atbildības. Dzīvnieku aizsardzības likuma izmaiņas nosaka, ka istabas mājdzīvniekus pavairot var, vien izpildot noteiktu kārtību, kas šajā gadījumā nenotika.
title_translated: Animal guards from Rezekne catch those who do not follow the rules of propagation of pet pet
description_translated: Noticing an ad on a Facebook site that a landlord is looking for a month old puppies, and knowing that a particular person was not for the first time deploying this type of announcements, animal guards from Rezekne posted a trap to prosecute the irresponsible host. Changes in the Animal Protection Act stipulate that room pets can be reproduced, only by fulfilling a certain procedure that did not happen in this case.

title: Pat nelieli ievainojumi būs nāvējoši. Antibiotiku rezistence kļūst par globālu problēmu
title_translated: Even minor injuries will be deadly. Antibiotic resistance becomes a global problem

title: Režisore Antra Cilinska – Jurim Podniekam un labākai pasaulei pa pēdām
description: Antras Cilinskas profesionālā karjera kino nozarē jau pašos pirmsākumos saistījās ar Juri Podnieku, kura degsme laikā, kad šķita, ka nekas nemainīsies, Cilinskā pamodināja interesi par dokumentālo kino. Sākot kā filmas "Vai viegli būt jaunam?" montāžiste Podnieka studijā, viņa dokumentālistam pēcāk devās līdzi starptautiskos projektos. Pēc pāragrās dokumentālista nāves Cilinska turpinājusi viņa iesākto, kļūstot par "Jura Podnieka studijas" vadītāju un neļaujot pasaulei aizmist par režisora jautājumiem.
title_translated: Director Antra Cilinska - Juris Podnieks and better world in the footsteps
description_translated: Anthra Cilinsk's professional career in the film industry was at the very beginning with Yuri Podnieks, whose passion, when it seemed that nothing would change, woke interest in documentary cinema. Starting as a movie "Is Easy to Be Young?" The assembly of the Podnieks studio, his documentary, later went on with international projects. After the death of the premature documentaryist, Cilinskaya continued his ongoing, becoming the head of the "Juris Podnieks studio" and preventing the world from falling asleep on the director's questions.

title: Cilvēku viedokļi: “normālas” lietas, kas notiek filmās, bet būtu ļoti dīvaini, ja notiktu reālajā dzīvē
description: Cik daudzas reizes, skatoties filmu, esi teicis: "Kas tas ir, neviens tā nedara?" Ar mirkļiem, kas filmās tiek attēloti kā pilnīgi "normāli", bet dzīvē būtu diezgan neikdienišķi, dalās sociālo tīklu ietotāji.
title_translated: People's opinions: "normal" things that happen in movies, but it would be very strange to happen in real life
description_translated: How many times have you said, "What is it, no one does?" The moments that are depicted in the movies as completely "normal", but in life would be quite unusual, social networkers are shared.

description: Sestdiena kļūs par siltāko dienu šajā nedēļā - gaiss varētu iesilt pat līdz +18 grādiem, prognozē Latvijas Vides, ģeoloģijas un meteoroloģijas centrs (LVĢMC).

description_translated: Attempts to normalize the relations between the great powers have taken place earlier, and it can be said that both the US and China's Ping Pong diplomacy, and then the Canadian and USSR hockey games, really helped in the political field. Is it possible to repeat it?

description: Sešās Spānijas futbola meistarsacīkšu spēlēs pēc kārtas uzvarējusi Seviljas "Real Betis", šovakar derbijā atspēlējoties un ar 2:1 pieveicot "Sevilla".
title_translated: "Real Betis" rarely in Seville Derby and the league reaches a six -win string
description_translated: Six Seville's "Real Betis" won six Spanish football championship games, defeating Sevilla in a 2: 1 win in the Derby.

title: A sērijas galvenie favorīti “Inter” un “Napoli” tiek pie uzvarām
description: Svētdien, 30. martā, Itālijas A sērijas 30. kārtas mačos uzvaras svinēja divas vadošās komandas – Milānas “Inter” un “Napoli”.
title_translated: The main favorites of Series A "Inter" and "Napoli" are at victories
description_translated: On Sunday, March 30, two leading teams - Milan's Inter and Napoli - celebrated victories in the 30th Series.

title: "Sievas klātbūtnē mīļākajai nopirka dzīvokli." Trakākie patiesie īpašuma iegādes stāsti
description: Kad ir runa par īpašuma pirkšanu vai pārdošanu, šķiet, ka tā ir lietišķa, lai arī nervus kutinoša pieredze. Bet kā būtu, ja kāds teiktu, ka aiz nekustamo īpašumu darījumiem dažkārt slēpjas stāsti, kas pārsniedz jebkuras iztēles robežas? No negaidītiem pārsteigumiem līdz dramatiskām situācijām – šie ir neticamākie un trakākie stāsti, kas pieredzēti nekustamo īpašumu pasaulē un varētu kalpot par materiālu Holivudas filmām.
title_translated: "In the presence of a wife, a lover bought an apartment." The craziest true property acquisition stories
description_translated: When it comes to buying or selling property, it seems to be a businessy, albeit nerve -spectacular experience. But what if someone said that real estate transactions sometimes hide stories above any limits of imagination? From unexpected surprises to dramatic situations - these are the most incredible and crazy stories experienced in real estate in the world and could serve as a material for Hollywood films.

title: "Jo vairāk tic, jo vairāk aplipina pārējos." Kāpēc cilvēki mistiskajam tic visā pasaulē?
description: Kāpēc cilvēki visā pasaulē, arī Baltijas valstīs, joprojām meklē atbildes pie zīlniekiem, šamaņiem un ezoteriķiem? Psihiatrs, psihoterapeits un Rīgas Stradiņa universitātes pasniedzējs Doc. dr. med. Artūrs Utināns skaidro iemeslus un piedāvā ieskatu cilvēces dziļākajās saknēs un smadzeņu uzbūvē - no senas vēstures līdz astroloģiskajiem horoskopiem "Instagram" lentē.
title_translated: "The more believes, the more the others are." Why do people believe in the mysterious world?
description_translated: Why are people around the world, including in the Baltic States, still looking for answers to fortune -tellers, shamans and esoterics? Psychiatrist, psychotherapist and lecturer at Riga Stradins University doc. dr. med. Arthur Utinan explains the reasons and offers an insight into the deepest roots of mankind and the brain - from ancient history to astrological horoscopes on Instagram.

title: Pārtikas drošība saldētavā: noderīgs triks ar monētu un ledu
description: Pirms doties ceļojumā un aizmirst uz laiku visas ikdienas rūpes, vai citu iemeslu dēļ uz ilgāku laiku atstājot savas mājas, der parūpēties par kārtību mājās. Viens no uzdevumiem – pārbaudīt ledusskapja un saldētavas saturu, lai izvairītos no produktu sabojāšanās.
title_translated: Food Safety in Freezer: A useful trick with coin and ice
description_translated: Before going on a trip and forgetting for a while, leaving your home for a longer period of time for a longer period of time, take care of your home order. One of the tasks is to check the contents of the refrigerator and freezer to avoid damaging the products.

title: Nekādu eņģeļu, nekādu tuneļu. Trīs reāli klīniskās nāves stāsti
description: Kas notiek, kad cilvēks uz brīdi... nomirst? Te būs trīs latviešu sieviešu stāsti. Viņas pieredzējušas to, ko sauc par klīnisko nāvi, – divām no viņām tam ir medicīnisks apstiprinājums, vienai ārsti nespēj atrast izskaidrojumu notikušajam. Neviena no viņām nav redzējusi eņģeļus, ko tikko notikušajā Eiropas svarcelšanas čempionātā redzējusi Rumānijas sportiste Andre Kotruta, zaudējot samaņu, – tā viņa stāstījusi žurnālistiem. Pieredze, ar ko dalījās manas trīs sarunu biedrenes, ir daudz neparastāka. Vispār arī baisāka.
title_translated: No angels, no tunnels. Three real clinical death stories
description_translated: What happens when a person for a while ... dies? There will be three Latvian women's stories. They have experienced what is called clinical death - two of them have a medical confirmation, one of the doctors is unable to find an explanation for what has happened. None of them have seen the angels seen by Romanian athlete Andre Kotruta, which has just seen in the European Weightlifting Championship, losing consciousness, she told reporters. The experience shared by my three interlocutors is much more unusual. In general, even more scary.

title: Abāšins: Šobrīd nav priekšnoteikumu OCTA cenu straujām izmaiņām
description: Šobrīd nav priekšnoteikumu, lai transportlīdzekļu īpašnieku obligātās civiltiesiskās atbildības (OCTA) apdrošināšanas polišu cenas strauji mainītos, otrdien intervijā Latvijas Televīzijas raidījumam _Rīta panorāma_ sacīja Latvijas Apdrošinātāju asociācijas prezidents Jānis Abāšins.
title_translated: Abashin: There are currently no prerequisites for OCTA prices for rapid changes
description_translated: There are currently no prerequisites for the prices of the compulsory civil liability (OCTA) insurance policies to change rapidly, said Janis Abashins, president of the Latvian Association of Insurers, in an interview with the Latvian Television broadcast on Tuesday.

title: Asociācija: Šobrīd nav priekšnoteikumu straujam OCTA cenu kāpumam
description: Šobrīd nav priekšnoteikumu straujam transportlīdzekļu obligātās civiltiesiskās atbildības (OCTA) apdrošināšanas polišu cenas kāpumam, Latvijas Televīzijas raidījumā "Rīta panorāma" atzina Latvijas Apdrošinātāju asociācijas prezidents Jānis Abāšins.
title_translated: Association: There are currently no prerequisites for rapid rise in OCTA prices
description_translated: There are currently no prerequisites for the rapid increase in the price of compulsory vehicle liability (OCTA) insurance policies, Janis Abashins, president of the Latvian Association of Insurers, acknowledged in the Latvian Television program "Morning Panorama".

title: Pie Taivānas sākušās apjomīgas Ķīnas militārās mācības
description: Taivānas tuvumā otrdien sākušās apjomīgas Ķīnas militārās mācības, kurās piedalās komunistiskās valsts sauszemes spēki, jūras spēki un gaisa spēki. Ķīnas bruņoto spēku pārstāvji paziņoja, ka mācību mērķis ir "stingri brīdināt" Taivānas neatkarības atbalstītājus un apliecināt Pekinas gatavību aizstāvēt "Ķīnas suverenitāti un nacionālo vienotību".
title_translated: A large -scale Chinese military training began at Taiwan
description_translated: A large -scale Chinese military training began near Taiwan, with the participation of the Communist State Land Forces, the Navy and the Air Force. The Chinese Armed Forces have stated that the aim of the training was to "strictly warn" the supporters of Taiwan's independence and to demonstrate Beijing's readiness to defend "China's sovereignty and national unity".

description: Itin bieži lībiešu kopienas asociē tikai ar Latvijas Kurzemes krastu, taču pēdējo gadu laikā uzmanība tiek vērsta arī uz Vidzemi, kur lībiešu kopienas savas tradīcijas ir kopušas un attīstījušas tikpat cītīgi, vēsta Latvijas Universitātes Ekonomikas un sociālo zinātņu fakultātē veidots televīzijas raidījums "Kivi".

description_translated: LETA. Vegas "Golden Knights" center striker Jack Aikel has been recognized as the first star of the National Hockey League (NHL) month of March, the championship organizers said.

title: Foto ⟩ Publicēti attēli, kuros redzama Lietuvā no purva izceltā bruņumašīna "M88 Hercules"
description: 25. martā Lietuvas Pabrades militārajā poligonā pazuda militārā bruņumašīna M88, kurā atradās četri karavīri. Tā nogrima purvā, bet tika izvilkta pirmdien. Tajā pašā dienā trīs no pazudušajiem karavīriem tika atrasti miruši, bet otrdien ceturtais pazudušais karavīrs atrasts miris. Lietuvas militārpersonas notikuma vietā ielaidušas žurnālistus, kuri nofotogrāfējuši izvilkto transportlīdzekli, vēsta Lietuvas izdevums "15min.lt".
title_translated: Photo⟩ Published images shown in Lithuania's M88 Hercules highlighted armored car "M88 Hercules"
description_translated: On March 25, a military armored car M88 disappeared at the Lithuanian Pabrades Military Landfill, which housed four soldiers. It sank into the swamp but was pulled on Monday. On the same day, three of the missing soldiers were found dead, but on Tuesday the fourth missing soldier was found dead. Lithuanian military personnel have entered journalists at the scene who have photographed a pull -out vehicle, according to Lithuanian edition "15min.lt".

description: 25. martā Lietuvas Pabrades militārajā poligonā pazuda militārā bruņumašīna M88, kurā atradās četri karavīri. Tā nogrima purvā, bet tika izvilkta pirmdien. title: Sākas "Openkart" kartinga āra trašu sezona
description: Sestdien, 5. aprīlī, Sporta kompleksā "Rullītis" Jelgavā notiks 2025. gada Openkart čempionāta āra trašu sezona. Āra trasēs iepriekšējo reizi notika 2024. gada sezonas noslēdzošais 17. posms Bačiūnu kartodromā Šauļos un tas bija pirms akurāt pieciem mēnešiem un divām dienām - 3. novembrī. Toreiz sezonu ar uzvaru slapjajā trasē izcīnīja Andrejs Laipnieks. Āra sezonu pērn sākām nedaudz vēlāk - 14. aprīlī, arī Jelgavas "Rullītī", toreiz bija saulains, bet auksts un ļoti vējains laiks un pirmo no divām uzvarām sezonā izcīnīja Edgars Sproģis, kurš sezonu otro reizi noslēdza trešajā vietā.
title_translated: "Openkart" Karting Outdoor Track Season begins
description_translated: On Saturday, April 5th, the Rollītis sports complex will host the OPENKART Championship Outdoor Season in Jelgava. For the last time of the outdoor tracks, the closing 17th season of the 2024 season took place in the Bachiūnu karting track in Šiauliai, and it was up to five months and two days ago on November 3. At that time, Andrejs Laipnieks won the season with a victory on the wet track. We started the outdoor season a little later - on April 14th, also in Jelgava's "Roll", it was sunny but cold and very windy and the first of two wins was won by Edgars Sproģis, who finished third in the season.

title: Grila ballīte uz balkona: laba ideja vai garantēts sods?
description: Pavasaris ir tas laiks, kad pēc garās, tumšās ziemas ķeram katru saules staru, katru silto dienu un baudām, cik vien iespējams. Vairāk pastaigu, vairāk svaiga gaisa un, protams, pikniks, kurā bieži grilēšana ir galvenais notikums. Tiem, kam savas privātmājas ar dārzu vai vasarnīcas, bēdu nezina – dodas uz sev ierastu vidi, kur grils gaida un atliek vien kurināt un šmorēt, bet ne visiem ir šāda iespēja. Bet tiem, kam ir dzīvokļi ar balkonu vai lodžiju, noteikti ir ienākusi prātā doma par grila ballīti uz tā. Drīkst vai nedrīkst? Skaidro Rīgas valstspilsētas pašvaldības policijas un Valsts ugunsdzēsības un glābšanas dienesta pārstāves.
title_translated: Grill party on the balcony: a good idea or guaranteed penalty?
description_translated: Spring is the time when we catch every sunlight after a long, dark winter, every warm day and enjoy as much as possible. More walks, more fresh air and, of course, a picnic, where grilling is often the main event. For those who have their own private homes with a garden or summer cottages, they do not know - go to their usual environment where the grill is waiting and remaining to be fired and shmed, but not everyone has this opportunity. But those with apartments with a balcony or loggia have definitely come to mind the idea of ​​a barbecue party on it. May or not? Explains representatives of the Riga National Municipal Police and the State Fire and Rescue Service.

title: Trampa Amerika izskatās pēc problēmu māktas attīstības ekonomikas
description: Daudzus gadus esmu strādājis par attīstības tirgu ekonomistu, vispirms Starptautiskajā Valūtas fondā (SVF), bet pēc tam Volstrītā, tāpēc es uzreiz pamanu, ja attīstības tirgus ekonomika ir nonākusi grūtībās. Man ir sāpīgi to teikt, bet Amerikas Savienotās Valstis uzrāda daudzas brīdinājuma pazīmes. Vēl ļaunāk, Amerikas rīcībai tās mēroga dēļ ir daudz lielāka ietekme uz pasaules ekonomiku nekā jebkurai citai šāda veida ekonomikai.
title_translated: Trump America looks like a problem -driven development economy
description_translated: For many years I have worked as a development market for economists, first in the International Monetary Fund (IMF), but then in Wall Street, so I immediately notice if the development market economy is in trouble. It is painful for me to say this, but the United States shows many warning signs. Worse, American action has a much greater impact on the global economy than any other economy of its kind.

title_translated: The US withdraws from an investigation group called Russian leaders for aggression crimes in Ukraine
description_translated: The United States has left the international group investigating Russian dictator Vladimir Putin and other persons responsible for Russia's repeated invasion of Ukraine, Michael Schmid, head of the European Union (EU) Agency's judicial authorities, said on Thursday.

title: «VEF Rīga» tiek galā ar BK «Ogre» pretestību un uzvar pirmajā Latvijas-Igaunijas basketbola līgas pusfināla spēlē
description: Ceturtdien pirmo pusfināla spēli Latvijas-Igaunijas basketbola līgā aizvadīja "VEF Rīga" un BK "Ogre" komandas. Lai gan trīs ceturtdaļas viesi punktu starpībā savus pretiniekus turēja sasniedzamā attālumā, izšķirošajās desmit minūtēs rīdzinieki veica pamatīgu izrāvienu, uzvarot spēli ar 80:63. Rezultatīvākie uzvarētāju rindās bija Harisons Klīrijs ar 20 punktiem, bet Isufs Sanons pievienoja 16 punktus.
title_translated: VEF Riga deals with BC Ogre resistance and wins the first Latvian-Estonian Basketball League semi-final game
description_translated: On Thursday, the first semi-final game in the Latvian-Estonian Basketball League was played by "VEF Riga" and BK "Ogre" teams. Although three -quarters of the visitors kept their opponents at a distance, the Rigans made a major break in the decisive ten minutes, winning the game with 80:63. The top scorer was Harrison Clear with 20 points, while Isuel Sanon added 16 points.

title: Video ⟩ Vesels bērns izdzisa sešās dienās. E. coli infekcija 2023. gadā Latvijā laupīja četrgadnieces dzīvību
description: Zalucku ģimene 2023. gadā piedzīvoja traģēdiju - dažu dienu laikā izdzisa viņu četrus gadus vecās meitas Elianas dzīvība. Meitene bija inficējusies ar E. coli infekciju, vēsta Latvijas Televīzijas raidījumā "4. studija".
title_translated: Video⟩ A healthy child disappeared in six days. E. coli infection in 2023 in Latvia robbed the life of a four -year -old
description_translated: The Zaluck family experienced a tragedy in 2023 - the life of their four -year -old daughter Eliana disappeared within a few days. The girl was infected with E. coli infection, reports on Latvian television program "Studio 4".

title: LVM MTB un Gravel seriāla sezona aprīlī startēs ar klasiku: Cēsis – Valmiera
description: Šī mēneša pēdējā svētdienā, 27. aprīlī, ar Latvijas riteņbraukšanas klasiku – posmu Cēsis – Valmiera – startēs 2025. gada Latvijas valsts mežu MTB un Gravel seriāla jaunā sezona. Kopumā tā ietvers sešus posmus. Pieteikšanās un plašāka informācija ērti pieejama mājaslapā Velosipēdu maratoni Latvijā - velo.lv
title_translated: LVM MTB and Gravel Series Season in April will start with classics: Cesis - Valmiera
description_translated: On the last Sunday of this month, April 27, with the Latvian Cycling Classic - the stage of Cesis - Valmiera - will start the new season of the Latvian State Forest MTB and Gravel series. In total, it will include six stages. Applying and more information is conveniently available on the bicycle marathon in Latvia - velo.lv

title: Profesors: Ja nenāk un nemācās, tad šādi “studenti” ir jādeportē!
title_translated: Professor: If you do not come or learn, such "students" must be deported!

title: "Ferrari" veikuši milzīgu darbu, lai jau Japānā būtu konkurētspējīgi
description: Pēc Ķīnas GP sacensībām, kad tika diskvalificēti abi tās piloti, “Ferrari” komanda veikusi ļoti apjomīgus testus simulatorā un, iespējams, jau šonedēļ Suzukas trasē būs radusi risinājumus, lai Šarls Leklērs un Lūiss Hamiltons varētu cīnīties par augstākajām pozīcijām.
title_translated: Ferrari has done a huge job to be competitive in Japan already
description_translated: Following the Chinese GP race, when both of its pilots were disqualified, the Ferrari team has conducted very large -scale tests in the simulator, and may have been solutions to Charles' track this week to allow Charles Lekler and Lewis Hamilton to fight for higher positions.

title: Čārlstonas 1/8 finālā Ostapenko piekāpjas pērnajai čempionei Kolinsai
description: Dienvidkarolīnas lielākajā pilsētā Čārlstonā turpinās "WTA 500" māla turnīrs. Latvijas tenisa līdere Aļona Ostapenko šovakar 1/8 finālā zaudēja pagājušā gada čempionei, amerikānietei Danielai Kolinsai - 5:7, 3:6.
title_translated: Charleston 1/8 finals Ostapenko concedes last year champion Colins
description_translated: The WTA 500 Clay Tournament continues in the largest city in South Carolina. Latvian tennis leader Alona Ostapenko lost to last year's champion in 1/8 finals tonight, Daniel Collins, an American - 5: 7, 3: 6.

title: LVRTC zemūdens kabeļa bojājuma novēršana bijusi ļoti grūta, atklāj Somijas uzņēmums
description: VAS "Latvijas Valsts radio un televīzijas centrs" (LVRTC) zemūdens optisko šķiedru kabeļa starp Latviju un Gotlandi bojājuma novēršana bijusi ļoti sarežģīta un izaicinājumiem bagāta, pauda LVRTC, atsaucoties uz Somijas uzņēmuma "Lilaco Offshore" vadītāja Olli Peteri Linnaluoto teikto.
title_translated: LVRTC Underwater Cable Damage Prevention was very difficult, the Finnish company reveals
description_translated: SJSC "Latvian State Radio and Television Center" (LVRTC) Underwater Optical Fiber Cable between Latvia and Gotlands prevented damage to the lesion, said LVRTC, referring to Olli Peter Linnaluoto, head of the Finnish company "Lilaco offshore".

title: NATO amatpersona paziņo, ka Krievijas zaudējumi karā Ukrainā sasniedz 900 000 karavīru
description: Krievija kopš atkārtotā iebrukuma Ukrainā 2022.gada februārī zaudējusi aptuveni 900 000 karavīru, no kuriem krituši līdz 250 000, ceturtdien paziņojusi augsta ranga NATO amatpersona.
title_translated: A NATO official announces that Russia's loss of war in Ukraine reaches 900,000 soldiers
description_translated: Russia has lost about 900,000 troops in Ukraine since the re -invasion of Ukraine, of whom up to 250,000, a high -ranking NATO official said on Thursday.

title: Video: „Riga“ un „Liepāja“ aizvada vārtu guvumiem bagātāko spēli sezonā
description: Septiņu vārtu spēlē Virslīgā „Riga FC“ viesos ar 5:2 pārspēja „FK Liepāja“. Šis panākums „Riga“ vienībai ļauj pacelties uz otro vietu Virslīgas tabulā.

description_translated: In a seven -goal game, Riga FC beat FK Liepaja by 5: 2. This success allows the Riga unit to rise to second place in the Super League table.

description: Krievijas armija 4. aprīļa vakarā ar droniem uzbruka Ukrainas pilsētai Harkivai, nogalinot vismaz trīs cilvēkus un ievainojot 32, paziņoja Ukrainas Valsts ārkārtējo situāciju dienests.

description_translated: On the evening of April 4, the Russian army attacked the Ukrainian city of Harkiv with drones, killing at least three people and injuring 32, the Ukrainian state's emergency service said.

title: Talsos medaļas dalīs 1. un 2. līgas spēcīgākās komandas
description: 5. un 6. aprīlī Talsu Valsts ģimnāzijā tiks sadalītas medaļas Latvijas čempionāta florbolā 1. līgā un 2. līgā. Kopš septembra komandas lēja sviedrus regulārajā turnīrā, lai noskaidrotu izslēgšanas spēļu dalībnieces, kuras pavasarī turpināja cīņu par godalgām un čempionu kausiem. Labāko četriniekā iekļuvušās vienības sestdien un svētdien Talsos aizvadīs izšķirošos mačus.

description_translated: On April 5 and 6, the Talsi State Gymnasium will distribute medals in the Latvian Football Championship in League 1 and League 2. Since September, the teams have been sweating in the regular tournament to find out the playoffs, who continued their battle for prizes and champions in the spring. The top four teams will play crucial matches in Talsi on Saturday and Sunday.

title: Jēkabpilietēm svarīga uzvara pār vicelīderi "REIR/Dobele SS"
description: Latvijas čempionāta handbolā sieviešu Virslīgā panākumu izcīnījusi "Jēkabpils SS", kas šovakar Dobelē ar 32:27 (21:14) pārspēja komandu "REIR/Dobele SS". Dobelnieces regulāro turnīru noslēgušas 2. vietā, bet jēkabpilietes rīt dosies izbraukumā uz Rīgu, lai aizvadītu izšķirošo cīņu par 3. vietu.
title_translated: An important victory over Jekabpils over vice -leader "Reir/Dobele SS"
description_translated: Jekabpils SS has won the success of the Latvian Handball Championship in the Women's League, which beat the team "Reir/Dobele SS" by 32:27 (21:14) tonight. The Dobelniece has finished in 2nd place, but Jekabpils will go to Riga tomorrow to take the decisive battle for 3rd place.

title: Krievija izmantojusi seksa rotaļlietu sūtījumus, lai nogādātu Eiropas valstīs sprāgstvielas
description: Krievija varētu būt organizējusi sabotāžas Eiropas valstīs, maskējot sprāgstvielas kosmētikas un seksa rotaļlietu sūtījumos. Par to, atsaucoties uz izmeklēšanai tuviem avotiem, ziņo aģentūra Reuters. 2024. gada jūlijā notika vairāki sprādzieni kurjerpasta uzņēmumu noliktavās Birmingemā, Leipcigā un netālu no Varšavas. Polijas tiesībsargājošās iestādes pēc tam atklāja vēl vienu aizdomīgu sūtījumu, kas nedetonēja. Tieši tās saturs ļāva detalizēti izpētīt, kā tika organizēta sprāgstvielu piegādes shēma.
title_translated: Russia has used Sex Toys to deliver explosives to European countries
description_translated: Russia could have organized sabotage in European countries by masking explosives in cosmetics and sex toys. Reuters reports, referring to sources close to the investigation. In July 2024, several explosions were held in courier companies in Birmingham, Leipzig and near Warsaw. The Polish law enforcement authorities then discovered another suspicious shipment that did not detect. It was its content that allowed in detail to explore how the explosive delivery scheme was organized.

description_translated: Actor Terens Hauard has made a shocking statement in a new interview that Sean Diddy Combs, who is currently facing federal accusations of trafficking in human beings and several litigation of sexual violence, has tried to sleep with him.

description: Čehijas otrās spēcīgākās hokeja līgas finālsērijā vadību atguva (2-1) Jihlavas "Dukla", savā laukumā ar 1:0 papildlaikā pieveicot Zlīnas "Berani". Cīņas 75. minūtē precīzi meta Patriks Ozols (52 spēlēs 7+6), kuram jau otrais vārtu guvums finālā.
title_translated: For guard Patrick Ozols Victory Puck in the final series in the Czech Republic
description_translated: In the Czech second-strongest hockey league final, Jihlava's "Dukla" regained the lead (2-1), beating Zlina's "Berani" in a 1-0 overtime. Patrick Ozols (52 games 7 6), who had the second goal in the final, made a precise fight in the 75th minute.

description_translated: Latvian tennis player Alona Ostapenko won the Charleston WTA 500 series doubles tournament title with Erin Rutlife from New Zealand on Sunday.

title: Valdība LMT un "Tet" daļu izpirkšanā nevēlas iesaistīt investorus no malas
description: Ministru kabinets pirms divām nedēļām iepazinās ar progresu sarunās par sakaru uzņēmumu "Tet" un LMT nākotni. Valdība vēlas ar savu partneri abās kompānijās – Zviedrijas koncernu "Telia Company" – panākt jaunu vienošanos. Politiķi signalizē, ka mērķis ir nostiprināt Latvijas valsts ietekmi abās kompānijās, bet nav skaidrs, cik tieši tas izmaksās un kā par to samaksās. Taču, kā ziņo LTV raidījums "de facto", visai noraidoši valdībā izsakās par privātu investoru, piemēram, pensiju fondu iesaisti darījuma finansēšanā.
title_translated: The government LMT and "tet" in redemption are not reluctant to involve investors from the sidelines
description_translated: Two weeks ago, the Cabinet of Ministers got acquainted with the progress of the communication company "Tet" and the future of LMT. The government wants to reach a new agreement with its partner in both companies - the Swedish concern "Telia Company". Politicians signal that the goal is to strengthen the influence of the Latvian state in both companies, but it is not clear how exactly it will cost and how it will be paid. However, according to LTV's "De facto" broadcast, the government is rather in the government of a private investor, such as the involvement of pension funds in financing the transaction.

title: Jaunais talants ar pirmo vārtu guvumu La Liga izrauj atlētiem trīs punktus
description: Vien ceturto uzvaru pēdējās 12 spēlēs izcīnīja Madrides "Atlético" futbolisti, kuri Spānijas futbola meistarsacīkstēs izbraukumā atguvās pēc neveiksmīga sākuma un gavilēja (2:1) Seviljā.
title_translated: The new talent with the first goal scorer in La Liga pulls the athletes three points
description_translated: Only the fourth victory in the last 12 games was won by Madrid's Atlético football players, who recovered in the Spanish football championship after a failed start and rejoiced (2: 1) in Seville.

title: Militāro preču ražotāji cieš no birokrātiskā sloga
description: Nesaskaņās starp industriālo parku attīstītāju, uzņēmumu "Piche" un Mārupes novada Būvvaldi par ķīlnieku kļuvis militāro preču ražotājs, uzņēmums "Ammunity". Tas šonedēļ palika bez biroja telpām, vēsta Latvijas Televīzijas raidījums "de facto".
title_translated: Military goods manufacturers suffer from bureaucratic burdens
description_translated: Disagreement between industrial park developers, company Piche and Marupe County Construction Board has become a hostage manufacturer of military goods, company Ammunity. It was left without office space this week, reports Latvian Television's "De facto".

title: RSU uzvar "Jēkapils SS" un nosargā trešo vietu
description: Šovakar Latvijas čempionāta handbolā sieviešu Virslīgas regulārā turnīra noslēdzošajā un izšķirošajā cīņā uzvaru izcīnījusi Rīgas Stradiņa universitātes (RSU) komanda, savā laukumā ar 28:26 (18:12) apspēlējot tiešo konkurenti - "Jēkabpils SS". Līdz ar šīs spēles rezultātu kļuva zināmi pusfināla pāri.
title_translated: RSU wins "Jacob SS" and protects third place
description_translated: Tonight, the Latvian Handball Championship in the final and crucial battle of the women's League regular tournament was won by Riga Stradins University (RSU) team, playing direct competitors - "Jekabpils SS" with 28:26 (18:12). With the result of this game, the semi -finals became known.

title: Aleksandrs Ovečkins kļūst par NHL visvairāk vārtu guvušo hokejistu, pārspējot leģendārā Veina Grecka rekordu
description: Aleksandrs Ovečkins svētdien kļuva par Nacionālajā hokeja līgā (NHL) visvairāk vārtu guvušo hokejistu, pārspējot Veina Grecka rekordu. Krievijas diktatora Vladimira Putina atbalstītājs Ovečkins NHL guvis 895 vārtus, par vieniem vairāk, nekā to iespēja leģendārais Greckis.
title_translated: Alexander Ovechkin becomes the most goal -scoring hockey player, beating the legendary Vein Greck's record
description_translated: Alexander Ovechkin on Sunday became the most goal -scoring hockey player in the National Hockey League (NHL), beating Vein Greck's record. Russian dictator Vladimir Putin's supporter Ovechkin has scored 895 goals in the NHL, one more than their legendary Greckis.

title: Vai tavam mājdzīvniekam ir alerģija? Kā palīdzēt, skaidro veterinārārsts
description: Ja tavam mājas mīlulim izkrīt spalva, tas sācis šķaudīt, kasās, smagi elpo, un ir skaidri redzams, ka dzīvnieks jūtas slikti, iespējams, tā ir alerģija. Mājdzīvnieki tāpat kā cilvēki var ciest no dažādām alerģijām, tāpēc svarīgi laikus atpazīt pazīmes un palīdzēt.
title_translated: Is your pet allergic? How to help, explains the veterinarian
description_translated: If your pet's pet falls out, it begins to sneeze, in the box, breathing heavily, and it is clear that the animal feels bad, it is probably allergic. Pets, like people, can suffer from various allergies, so it is important to recognize the signs in a timely manner and help.

title: Pirmdien saule mīsies ar mākoņiem
description: Pirmdien Latvijā sauli palaikam aizklās mākoņi, kas vietām atnesīs īslaicīgus nokrišņus - galvenokārt sniegu un lietu, prognozē sinoptiķi.
title_translated: Monday the sun will mumble with clouds
description_translated: On Monday, the sun will be covered by clouds in Latvia, which will bring temporary rainfall in some places - mainly snow and rain, forecasts by the opticians.

title: VEF Rīga basketbolisti sasniedz Latvijas-Igaunijas līgas finālu
description: "VEF Rīga" komanda svētdien sasniedza "Optibet" Latvijas-Igaunijas Basketbola līgas (LIBL) finālu.
title_translated: VEF Riga basketball players reach the final of the Latvian-Estonian League
description_translated: VEF Riga team reached Optibet's Latvian-Estonian Basketball League (LIBL) final on Sunday.

title: Kas notiek ar mūsu nākotnes pensijām? Latvijas miljardi pārsvarā silda ASV, nevis pašmāju ekonomiku
description: Katrs no mums cer uz labām vecumdienām, bet vai esam pārliecināti, ka mūsu pensiju uzkrājumi tiešām strādā mūsu pašu valsts labā? Šobrīd tikai neliela daļa no 8,7 miljardiem eiro, ko esam sakrājuši pensiju 2. līmenī, tiek ieguldīta Latvijas ekonomikā. Kāpēc tā, un ko darīt, lai šie līdzekļi palīdzētu attīstīt mūsu uzņēmumus, infrastruktūru un dzīves līmeni? To skaidro “Kas Jauns Avīze”.
title_translated: What happens to our future pensions? Latvia's billion is mostly heated by the US rather than the domestic economy
description_translated: Each of us hopes for good old age, but are we convinced that our pension savings really work for our own country? Currently, only a small part of the 8.7 billion euros, which we have accumulated at the 2nd level, is invested in the Latvian economy. Why so, and what to do to help develop our companies, infrastructure and standard of living? This is explained by "What's New Avīze".

title: Sporta un uztura pētnieki pēta fiziskas slodzes labvēlīgo ietekmi uz krūts vēža šūnām
description: Sporta un uztura pētnieki pēta fiziskas slodzes labvēlīgo ietekmi uz krūts vēža šūnām. Rīgas Stradiņa universitātes (RSU) laboratorijā brīvprātīgajām vēža pacientēm un arī veselām sievietēm veic slodzes testus, lai noteiktu to ietekmi uz dzīves kvalitāti onkoloģiskās slimības laikā. Pētījumu rezultāti liecina par personalizētas terapijas nepieciešamību, lai nodrošinātu efektīvāku pacientu aprūpi un ārstēšanu.
title_translated: Sports and nutrition researchers study the beneficial effects of exercise on breast cancer cells
description_translated: Sports and nutrition researchers study the beneficial effects of exercise on breast cancer cells. Riga Stradins University (RSU) laboratory is undergoing load tests for voluntary cancer patients and also healthy women to determine their impact on the quality of life during oncological illness. Research results indicate the need for personalized therapy to ensure more effective patient care and treatment.

title: Ostapenko pakāpjas uz 24. vietu, Semeņistaja 131.
description: Sieviešu tenisa asociācija (WTA) publiskojusi jaunāko pasaules rangu. Latvijas tenisa līdere Aļona Ostapenko pakāpusies no 25. un 24. pozīciju, bet valsts otrā rakete Darja Semeņistaja pacēlusies no 165. uz 131. vietu.
title_translated: Ostapenko ranks 24th, Semenista 131.
description_translated: The Women's Tennis Association (WTA) has released the latest world rank. Latvian tennis leader Alona Ostapenko has risen from position 25 and 24, but the country's second racket Darja Semenista has risen from 165 to 131.

title: Kuru nozaru uzņēmumu akcijas ASV noteiktie muitas tarifi ietekmēs visvairāk?
description: ASV prezidents Donalds Tramps aprīļa sākumā paziņoja par jaunu muitas tarifu noteikšanu preču importam un Eiropas Savienībā ražotajām precēm noteikts tarifs 20% apmērā. Jau iepriekš Tramps noteica tarifus tērauda un alumīnija importam, kā arī automašīnām un automobiļu detaļām.
title_translated: Which companies of companies in the US will affect the customs tariffs in the US most?
description_translated: US President Donald Trump announced the determination of new customs tariffs in early April and a 20% tariff for imports of goods and goods produced in the European Union. Previously, Trump set tariffs for steel and aluminum imports, as well as cars and car parts.

title: JV Saeimas frakcijas vadītājs pērn nopelnījis teju 80 000 eiro
description: "Jaunās vienotības" (JV) Saeimas frakcijas vadītājs Edmunds Jurēvics pērn kopumā guvis vairāk nekā 79 000 eiro ienākumus, liecina viņa amatpersonas deklarācija par pērno gadu.
title_translated: The leader of the JV Saeima faction earned almost 80,000 euros last year
description_translated: Edmunds Jurēvics, leader of the "New Unity" (JV) Saeima faction, has generated more than € 79,000 in total, according to his official's declaration for last year.

title: Video: Kubuliņš daļu EMX125 brauciena Sardīnijā aizvada kā līderis
description: Labu otro braucienu EMX125 Eiropas motokrosa čempionāta posmā Sardīnijā aizvadīja Jēkabs Kubuliņš, spējot izvirzīties līderpozīcijā un kādu laiku tajā noturoties. Latviešu braucējs piekāpās tikai ļoti ātrajam ungāram Āronam Katonam, kurš kļuva gan par abu sacīkšu, gan posma uzvarētāju.
title_translated: Video: Kubulins part EMX125 rides in Sardinia as a leader
description_translated: A good second race at the EMX125 European Motocross Championship in Sardinia was played by Jacob Kubulins, being able to take the lead and hold on to it for a while. The Latvian rider bowed only to the very fast Hungarian Aaron Katon, who became the winner of both racing and the stage.

title: Meklējam atbildes: vai no vēja rotoriem sāp galva un rodas citas veselības problēmas?
description: Latvijā pilnā sparā rit sabiedriskās apspriešanas un plānu prezentācijas par vēja parku būvniecību visā valsts teritorijā. Pēc dažiem gadiem mūsu valsts ainava var krasi mainīties, jo visos novados debesīs sliesies no 100 līdz 200 metriem augsti torņi ar milzīgām vēja turbīnām.
title_translated: Looking for answers: Does the wind rotors hurt and other health problems arise?
description_translated: Public consultation and plans presentations on the construction of wind parks throughout the country are in full swing in Latvia. A few years later, our country's landscape can change dramatically, as the 100 to 200 meters high towers with huge wind turbines will fall into the sky.

title: ES tirdzniecības ministri tiksies, lai apspriestu reakciju uz ASV tarifiem
description: Pirmdien Luksemburgā pulcēsies Eiropas Savienības (ES) dalībvalstu tirdzniecības ministri, lai spriestu, kā reaģēt uz jaunajiem muitas tarifiem, ko blokam piemērojis ASV prezidents Donalds Tramps.
title_translated: EU trade ministers will meet to discuss the response to US tariffs
description_translated: On Monday, European Union (EU) Member States' trade ministers will gather in Luxembourg to judge how to respond to the new customs tariffs applied by US President Donald Trump.

title: Serbijas prezidents valdības veidošanu uztic mazpazīstamam mediķim
description: Serbijas prezidents Aleksandrs Vučičs jaunās valdības veidošanu svētdien uzticējis politiskās aprindās mazpazīstamajam medicīnas profesoram Dzjuro Macutam.
title_translated: Serbian President is entrusted by the formation of a government for a little -known medical doctor
description_translated: Serbian President Alexander Vučič has entrusted the formation of the new government on Sunday in political circles for the little -known medical professor Juro Macut.

title: Spānijā tūkstošiem cilvēku protestos pieprasa risināt mājokļu krīzi; Brazīlijā ielās iziet Bolsonaru atbalstītāji
description: Protesti nedēļas nogalē bijuši ne tikai ASV. Ar saukli "Izbeigsim mājokļu biznesu" sestdien aptuveni 40 Spānijas pilsētu ielās izgāja tūkstošiem cilvēku, pieprasot risinājumus valstī samilzušās mājokļu krīzes risināšanā.
title_translated: In Spain, thousands of people in protests are demanded to address the housing crisis; Bolssonaru supporters go out in the streets of Brazil
description_translated: Protests were not only in the US at the weekend. With the slogan "Let's put an end to the housing business" on Saturday, thousands of people went out on the streets of about 40 Spanish cities, demanding solutions to solve the crisis in the country.

title: Celtics bez Porziņģa sastāvā droši pieveic Wizards
description: Uzvaru Nacionālās basketbola asociācijas (NBA) regulārā čempionāta mačā svētdien bez Latvijas basketbolista Kristapa Porziņģa sastāvā izcīnīja Bostonas "Celtics" komanda, kas savā laukumā droši pārspēja Vašingtonas "Wizards" vienību.
title_translated: Celtics without Porzģģis in the Wizards Safe
description_translated: The winner of the National Basketball Association (NBA) regular championship match on Sunday was won by the Boston Celtics team in addition to Latvian basketball player Kristaps Porziņģis, who surely beat the Washington Wizards unit on their field.

title: Latvijas Televīzija aicina pieteikties seniorus jaunam iepazīšanās šovam
description: Latvijas Televīzija (LTV) no 7. aprīļa līdz 12. maijam plkst. 23.59 aicina pieteikties seniorus jaunam, sirsnīgam un iedvesmojošam iepazīšanās šovam, kura mērķis ir mazināt vientulību un iedrošināt socializēties – atrast sarunu biedru, kopīgu pastaigu partneri vai kultūras pasākumu apmeklētāju. Piedalīties aicināti cilvēki vecumā no 60 līdz 80+ gadiem.
title_translated: Latvian Television invites seniors to apply for a new dating show
description_translated: Latvian Television (LTV) from April 7 to May 12 23.59 invites seniors to apply for a new, sincere and inspiring dating show aimed at reducing loneliness and encouraging socializing - finding a interlocutor, a joint walking partner or a visitor to cultural events. People between the ages of 60 and 80 are invited to participate.

title: Nākamnedēļ gaisa temperatūra Latvijā var sasniegt +25 grādus
