title: Rīsu un mannas pudiņš - sajūti bērnību katrā karotē!
description: Kad meklē ko vienkāršu, sildošu un mājīgu, rīsu vai mannas pudiņš var kļūt par tavu iecienītāko desertu. Šie klasiskie saldumi apvieno bērnības atmiņas ar iespēju radoši izpausties virtuvē. Tie nav tikai deserti – tie ir arī mierinājums brīžos, kad nepieciešams kaut kas patiesi mājīgs un sirsnīgs.
title_translated: Rice and semolina - Feel your childhood in every spoon!
description_translated: When looking for something simple, warm and cozy, rice or semolina can become your favorite dessert. These classic sweets combine childhood memories with the ability to express themselves in the kitchen. They are not just desserts - they are also comforting when you need something truly cozy and sincere.

title: Pieaug ar "Rail Baltica" būvniecību saistītie riski, ziņo FDP
description: Joprojām pastāv un pieaug riski, kas saistīti ar dzelzceļa projekta "Rail Baltica" būvniecību, turklāt līdzšinējais projekta finansējuma modelis vairs nav ilgtspējīgs, teikts Fiskālās disciplīnas padomes (FDP) uzraudzības starpziņojumā par Finanšu ministrijas (FM) izstrādāto Latvijas Fiskāli strukturālo plānu 2025.-2028.gadam.
title_translated: Increases with Rail Baltica building -related risks, reports FDP
description_translated: There are still increased risks related to the construction of the Rail Baltica railway project, and the current project funding model is no longer sustainable, according to the Fiscal Discipline Council (FDP) supervision of the Latvian Fiscal Structural Plan developed by the Ministry of Finance (MoF) for 2025-2028.

title: Rūdolfs Balcers ar piespēli tuvina Šveices čempioni "Lions" iekļūšanai finālā
description: Ar rezultatīvu piespēli Šveices augstākās hokeja līgas (NL) pusfināla mačā otrdien izcēlās Latvijas uzbrucējs Rūdolfs Balcers, sekmējot Cīrihes "Lions" vienības panākumu sērijas piektajā spēlē pret "Davos" komandu.
title_translated: Rudolfs Balcers with a pass brings the Swiss champion "Lions" to enter the finals
description_translated: Latvian striker Rudolfs Balcers stood out with a successful pass in the Swiss Supreme Hockey League (NL) semi -final match on Tuesday, promoting the Zurich Lions team's fifth game against Davos.

title: Nedēļas nogalē koncertzālē Cēsis norisināsies festivāls Pētera Vaska mūzikas aprīlis
description: Nedēļas nogalē, 12. un 13. aprīlī, koncertzālē _Cēsis_ notiks tradicionālais festivāls _Pētera Vaska mūzikas aprīlis_, kas veltīts komponista mūzikai un viņa radošajai personībai. Sestdienas programmā _Viatore_ pasaulslavenais vijolnieks Gidons Krēmers un kamerorķestris _Kremerata Baltica_ iekļāvuši ne tikai Pētera Vaska skaņdarbus, bet arī viņa garīgo domubiedru – Arvo Perta, Gijas Kančeli, Bendžamina Britena un pat Baha opusus
title_translated: At the weekend, Cesis will host the festival Peter Wax Music April
description_translated: On the weekend, April 12 and 13, the traditional festival _Peter's Wax Music in April, dedicated to the composer's music and his creative personality, will take place in the concert hall _Cesis_. Saturday's program _Viator_ World -famous violinist Gidon Kremer and Chamber Orchestra _Kremerata Baltica have included not only Peter Wax's compositions, but also his spiritual like -minded - Arvo Pert, Guy Kanchel, Benjamin Briten and even Bach Opus

title: Ceļu satiksmes negadījumos aizvadītajā diennaktī cietuši 11 cilvēki
description: Aizvadītajā diennaktī valstī reģistrēti 116 ceļu satiksmes negadījumi, dažos no tiem traumas guvuši 11 cilvēki, aģentūru LETA informēja Valsts policijā.
title_translated: 11 people were injured in road accidents last day
description_translated: Last night, 116 road accidents were registered in the country, with some of them injured by 11 people, LETA informed the State Police.

title: Video: 'Auda'' nokārto sauso uzvaru pret ''Liepāju”
description: “TonyBet'' futbola Virslīgas 6. kārtā ''Auda'' spēlē ar “Liepāju” brīdi pirms pirmā puslaika beigām spēj izvirzīties vadībā, dodoties uz pārtraukumu labā omā. Otrajā puslaikā četru minūšu laikā gūst vēl divus vārtus un atstāj savus vārtus neskartus 3:0. Piedāvājam jums spēles spilgtākos momentus.
title_translated: Video: 'Auda' 'settles dry victory over' 'Liepaja' '
description_translated: Tonybet in Round 6 of the Football Super League in the Auda game with "Liepaja" before the end of the first half is able to take the lead, heading for a break in good mood. In the second half, two more goals in four minutes and leave your goals 3: 0.

title: Levandovskis sekmē pārliecinošu "Barcelona" uzvaru pār "Borussia"
description: Roberts Levandovskis trešdien guva divus vārtus "Barcelona" uzvarā pār Dortmundes "Borussia" UEFA Čempionu līgas ceturtdaļfināla pirmajā spēlē savā laukumā, bet Parīzes "Saint-Germain" mājās pieveic. Anglijas premjerlīgas klubu Birmingemas "Aston Villa".
title_translated: Levandovsky promotes a convincing Barcelona victory over Borussia
description_translated: Robert Levandovsky scored two goals on Wednesday in Barcelona's victory over Dortmund Borussia in the first game of the UEFA Champions League quarter-finals on his field, while Paris "Saint-Germain" was beaten at home. English Premier League club Birmingham "Aston Villa".

title: Apsīte atvaira visus 56 metienus, latvietes PČ ievadā revanšējas britu hokejistēm
description: Pasaules hokeja meistarsacīkšu pirmās divīzijas B grupas sacensības Skotijas pilsētā Damfrīsā iesākās ar Kazahstānas, Itālijas un Latvijas sieviešu valstsvienību panākumiem. Vēlajā spēlē latvietes ar vārtsardzes Kristiānas Apsītes gādību izturēja pamatīgu spiedienu, pieveicot (3:0) mājinieci Lielbritāniju un reabilitējoties par decembrī notikušajā Olimpisko spēļu kvalifikācijas turnīrā piedzīvoto zaudējumu.
title_translated: Apsīte repels all 56 shots, Latvians in PCs revolutionize British hockey players
description_translated: The World Hockey Championship first division B Group B competition in Scotland started with the success of Kazakhstan, Italy and Latvian women's units. In the late game, Latvians with the care of the goalkeeper Christian Apsīte withstood severe pressure, defeating (3: 0) housewives for Britain and rehabilitating to the loss of the Olympic Games qualifying tournament in December.

title: Video: RFS atgriežas uz uzvaru takas
description: "TonyBet" futbola Virslīgas sestajā kārtā, čempione RFS savā laukumā uzņēma "Tukums 2000" komandu. RFS pēc zaudējuma "Mettai" bija noskaņoti šajā spēlē punktus neatdot, novedot spēli līdz sev pozitīvam iznākumam - 2:0. Jūsu uzmanībai spēles labāko momentu apkopojums.
title_translated: Video: RFS returns to victory trails
description_translated: In the sixth round of the Tonybet Football League, the champion RFS hosted the Tukums 2000 team on the field. RFS after the loss to Metta was in the mood not to give points in the game, leading the game to a positive outcome - 2: 0. A compilation of the best moments of the game for your attention.

title: Rodrigo Ābols tiek nosūtīts uz AHL
description: Nacionālās hokeja līgas (NHL) vienība Filadelfijas "Flyers" uz Amerikas Hokeja līgas (AHL) fārmklubu Alentaunas "Lehigh Valley Phantoms" ir nosūtījusi Latvijas uzbrucēju Rodrigo Ābolu, trešdien paziņoja "Flyers".
title_translated: Rodrigo apple is sent to AHL
description_translated: National Hockey League (NHL) unit Philadelphia Flyers to the American Hockey League (AHL) Farm Club Alentauna's Lehigh Valley Phantoms has sent Latvian striker Rodrigo Apple, Flyers said Wednesday.

title: Parsifāls, Norma un Pjēra Bulēza simtgades svinēšana Lieldienu festivālā Berlīnē
description: Piektdien, 11. aprīlī, sāksies Berlīnes Valsts operas _Unter den Linden_ rīkotais Lieldienu festivāls _Festtage_
title_translated: Parsifal, Norma and Pierre Boule's Centennial Celebration at the Easter Festival in Berlin
description_translated: On Friday, April 11, the Easter Festival _Festtage_ organized by the Berlin State Opera _unter Den Linden_

title: Harijs Vītoliņš: "Sākumā mēs pārāk daudz respektējam pretiniekus"
description: Latvijas vīriešu hokeja izlase trešdien Rīgā pārbaudes spēlē uzvarā pār Somijas valstsvienību pirmajā periodā pārāk respektēja pretiniekus, pēcspēles preses konferencē teica Latvijas izlases galvenais treneris Harijs Vītoliņš.
title_translated: Harry Vitolins: "At first we respect too many opponents"
description_translated: The Latvian men's hockey team in Riga on Wednesday in a test match over the Finnish national team in the first period was too respected by opponents, said Harry Vitolins, head coach of the Latvian national team at a press conference.

title: FOTO: eksprezidenti, mūziķi, influenceri – tikai daži no tiem, kuri apmeklējuši filmas "Debitants" pirmizrādi
description: 9. aprīlī pirmizrādi piedzīvoja Matīsa Spailes dokumentālā filma “Debitants”.
title_translated: Photo: Ex -President, Musicians, Influencers - just a few of those who attended the premiere of the movie "Debutant"
description_translated: On April 9, Matisse Klail's documentary "Debutant" premiered.

title: TESTS. Vai vari nosaukt galda spēles, kas redzamas attēlā? Tikai retais atbild nekļūdoties
title_translated: Test. Can you name the board games shown in the picture? Only a few responds without mistake

title: Latvijas hokejistes pasaules čempionātu sāk ar svarīgu uzvaru pār Lielbritāniju
description: Latvijas sieviešu hokeja izlase trešdien Damfrīzā ar uzvaru pār Lielbritāniju sāka pasaules čempionāta pirmās divīzijas B grupas turnīru.
title_translated: The Latvian Hockey World Championship starts with an important victory over Britain
description_translated: The Latvian women's hockey team started the World Championship first division Group B tournament with a victory over Britain on Wednesday.

title: Īsfilmu festivālā «2Annas» triumfē filmas no Filipīnām un Latvijas
description: 29. Rīgas Starptautiskā īsfilmu festivāla "2Annas" noslēguma ceremonijā pasniegtas balvas šī gada izcilākajām īsfilmām. "Grand Prix" un "Zelta Anna" piešķirta Filipīnu režisora Don Josephus Raphael Eblahan filmai "Cilvēka balss", savukārt par labāko Baltijas īsfilmu atzīta Ildzes Felsbergas dokumentālā filma "Sliktie dzīvnieki".
title_translated: At the Short Film Festival «2Annas» triumphs films from the Philippines and Latvia
description_translated: 29th Riga International Short Film Festival "2Annas" at the closing ceremony awards for this year's outstanding short films. "Grand Prix" and "Golden Anna" were awarded the Philippine director Don Josephus Raphael Eblahan's "Human Voice", while Ilze Felsberg's "Bad Animals" was recognized as the best Baltic short film.

title: Ārste: Grūti prognozēt E.coli infekcijas sekas uz bērnu kopējo veselības stāvokli
description: ​Rīga, 10.apr., LETA. Grūti prognozēt, kādas būs Šiga toksīnu producējošās E.coli infekcijas atstātās sekas uz bērnu kopējo veselības stāvokli, sacīja Bērnu klīniskās universitātes slimnīcas (BKUS) Bērnu slimību klīnikas infekciju slimību profila virsārste Gunta Laizāne.
title_translated: Doctor: Hard to predict the effects of E.coli infection on the overall health condition of children
description_translated: Riga, Apr. 10, LETA. It is difficult to predict the consequences of this year's toxin producing E.coli infection on the overall health of children, said Gunta Laizāne, Chief of Infectious Diseases of the Children's Clinical University Hospital (BKUS).

title: Tik gardas ribiņas, ka pirkstus aplaizīsi. Recepte, kurā viena sastāvdaļa tevi pārsteigs
description: Šīs ir ribiņas, kas vienkārši pārsteigs – ar sulīgu gaļu, bagātīgu garšu un īpašu sastāvdaļu, kas padara tās vēl garšīgākas. Viegli pagatavojamas, bet rezultāts būs tāds, ka pirkstus gribēsies aplaizīt!
title_translated: So delicious ribs that you will be tired of your fingers. A recipe where one ingredient will surprise you
description_translated: These are ribs that will simply surprise - with juicy meat, a rich taste and a special ingredient that makes them even tastier. Easy to make, but the result will be that your fingers will want to bend!

title: Sākta Daugavpils šosejas četru joslu posmu pārbūve no Nīcgales līdz Daugavpilij
description: Šonedēļ sāk pārbūvēt daļu no Daugavpils šosejas (A6) četru joslu posma no Nīcgales līdz Daugavpilij, ar kopējām būvdarbu izmaksām 37,6 miljonu eiro apmērā, informēja VSIA _Latvijas valsts ceļi_ (LVC).
title_translated: Removing the four -lane section of the Daugavpils highway from Nicgale to Daugavpils has been started
description_translated: This week, part of the Daugavpils highway (A6) four -lane section from Nicgale to Daugavpils is beginning to be rebuilt, with a total cost of construction of EUR 37.6 million, VSIA _Latvian State Roads (LVC) said.

title: Mišela Obama pārtrauc klusēšanu: pastāsta visu par šķiršanās baumām un pazušanu no politikas
title_translated: Michel Obama stops silence: tells everything about divorce rumors and disappearance from politics

title: Prestižo Cimzes balvu šogad saņems skolotāji Baiba Klepere un Dzintars Krūmiņš
description: Latvijas Nacionālā kultūras centra iedibināto Cimzes balvu 2025. gadā saņems Lielvārdes Mūzikas un mākslas skolas skolotāja un diriģente Baiba Klepere un Mākslu izglītības kompetences centra “Nacionālā Mākslu vidusskola” Jaņa Rozentāla Mākslas skolas skolotājs Dzintars Krūmiņš.
title_translated: Teachers Baiba Klepere and Dzintars Krūmiņš will receive the prestigious Cimze Award this year
description_translated: Baiba Klepere, a teacher and conductor of the Lielvarde Music and Arts School, established by the Latvian National Culture Center in 2025, and Dzintars Krūmiņš, a teacher at the Janis Rozentāls Art School of the Center for Education Competence "National High School of Arts".

title: WRC ralllijs Latvijā varētu atgriezties jau 2027. gadā
description: Starptautisku sacensību rīkotājs Latvijā “RA EVENTS” uzsācis sarunu procedūru ar FIA Eiropas rallija čempionāta (ERC) un FIA pasaules rallija čempionāta (WRC) rīkotāju “WRC Promoter” par iespēju Latvijai atgriezties starptautisko čempionātu kalendāros – 2026. gadā sarīkojot ERC posmu un 2027. un 2028. gadā uz Latviju vēlreiz atvedot WRC sacensības.
title_translated: WRC Rally could return to Latvia as early as 2027
description_translated: The organizer of international competitions in Latvia "RA Events" has launched a negotiated procedure with the FIA ​​European Rally Championship (ERC) and the FIA ​​World Rally Championship (WRC) organizer "WRC Promoter" on the possibility of Latvia return to the International Championship calendars - in the ERC stage in 2026 and 2027 and 2028.

title: Turcijā aizturēti divi ietekmīgi žurnālisti
description: Turcijā ceturtdien aizturēti divi plaši pazīstami žurnālisti Timurs Soikans un Murats Āgirels.
title_translated: Two influential journalists were detained in Turkey
description_translated: Two well -known journalists Timur Soikan and Murat Agirel were arrested in Turkey on Thursday.

title: Ārste: Grūti prognozēt E.coli infekcijas sekas uz bērnu kopējo veselības stāvokli
description: Grūti prognozēt, kādas būs Šiga toksīnu producējošās E.coli infekcijas atstātās sekas uz bērnu kopējo veselības stāvokli, aģentūrai LETA sacīja Bērnu klīniskās universitātes slimnīcas (BKUS) Bērnu slimību klīnikas infekciju slimību profila virsārste Gunta Laizāne.
title_translated: Doctor: Hard to predict the effects of E.coli infection on the overall health condition of children
description_translated: It is difficult to predict the consequences of this year's toxin -producing E.coli infection on the overall health of children, Gunta Laizāne, Chief of Infectious Diseases of the Children's Clinical University Hospital (BKUS), told LETA.

title: Igaunijas armijai būs tiesības reaģēt uz infrastruktūras apdraudējumu jūrā
description: Igaunijas Aizsardzības spēkiem būs tiesības reaģēt uz jūras infrastruktūras apdraudējumu, paredz Igaunijas parlamenta pieņemti likuma grozījumi.
title_translated: The Estonian army will have the right to respond to infrastructure threats to sea
description_translated: The Estonian Defense Forces will have the right to respond to the threat of maritime infrastructure, according to amendments to the law adopted by the Estonian Parliament.

title: “Mēs ļoti daudz laika pavadām kaut ko klikšķinot...” Ainis Dzalbs stāsta, kas apgrūtina ģimenes ārstu darbu
title_translated: “We spend a lot of time clicking something ...” Ainis Dzalbs tells the story that makes the work of family doctors

title: Krievijas pensiju kavēšanās: nesenais pārskaitījums no Krievijas izraisījis jautājumus
description: Nepastāv nekādi praktiski šķēršļi, kas kavētu Krievijas pusi veikt pensiju un pabalstu izmaksai paredzētā finansējuma pārskaitījumu uz Latviju, informēja Ārlietu ministrijā (ĀM).
title_translated: Russian Pension Delays: A recent transfer from Russia has raised questions
description_translated: There are no practical obstacles that would hinder the transfer of funding for the Russian side to pay for pensions and benefits to Latvia, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (MFA) informed.

title: "Labas gribas koalīcija" apsver karavīru izvietošanu Ukrainā, ko Krievija pasludinājusi par kategoriski nepieņemamu
description: Aptuveni 30 valstu aizsardzības ministri, kas pārstāv tā dēvēto labas gribas koalīciju, ceturtdien tiekas Briselē, lai turpinātu darbu pie plāniem par karavīru izvietošanu Ukrainā potenciālā miera līguma nodrošināšanai. Krievija jau sen paziņojusi, ka jebkāda Rietumu karavīru izvietošana tai ir kategoriski nepieņemama.
title_translated: "The Coalition of Goodwill" is considering the deployment of soldiers in Ukraine, which Russia has declared categorically unacceptable
description_translated: About 30 countries' defense ministers, representing the so -called goodwill coalition, meet in Brussels on Thursday to continue working on plans to place soldiers in Ukraine for the potential peace treaty. Russia has long announced that any placement of Western soldiers is categorically unacceptable for it.

title: Video: „Liepājai“ uzmirdz hokeja zelts
description: Latvijas čempionu titulu hokejā U-17grupā izcīnījuši „Liepājas SSS“ puiši, kas finālspēlē ar 3:2 pārspēja vienaudžus no „RĪGAS HS 2009“. Spēli drošāk sāka un pirmo trešdaļu ar 2:0 savā labā noslēdza rīdzinieki, tomēr pēc pirmā pārtraukuma mača ritējums aizgāja pretējā virzienā. Liepājinieki guva trīs bezatbildes vārtus un ieguva čempionu kausu.
title_translated: Video: "Liepaja" hockey gold
description_translated: The Latvian Championship title in hockey in the U-17 team was won by "Liepaja SSS" guys, who outscored their peers from Riga HS 2009 by 3: 2. The game started safer and the first third with a 2: 0 ended with Rigans, but after the first break, the match went in the opposite direction. Liepaja scored three unanswered goals and won the Champions Cup.

title: Aizsardzības ministri Briselē spriež par potenciālo karavīru izvietošanu Ukrainā
description: Aptuveni 30 valstu aizsardzības ministri, kas pārstāv tā dēvēto labas gribas koalīciju, ceturtdien tiekas Briselē, lai turpinātu darbu pie plāniem par karavīru izvietošanu Ukrainā potenciālā miera līguma nodrošināšanai.
title_translated: Defense ministers in Brussels are judging the placement of potential soldiers in Ukraine
description_translated: About 30 countries' defense ministers, representing the so -called goodwill coalition, meet in Brussels on Thursday to continue working on plans to place soldiers in Ukraine for the potential peace treaty.

title: Vācijas jaunās valdības mērķis būs organizēt regulārus deportāciju lidojumus uz Afganistānu un Sīriju
description: Vācijas nākamās valdības mērķis būs organizēt regulārus deportāciju lidojumus uz Afganistānu un Sīriju, ceturtdien paziņoja Kristīgo demokrātu savienības (CDU) likumdevējs Torstens Freijs.
title_translated: The goal of the new German government will be to organize regular deportation flights to Afghanistan and Syria
description_translated: Germany's next government aims to organize regular deportation flights to Afghanistan and Syria, Torsten Frey, the legislature of the Christian Democratic Union (CDU) said Thursday.

title: Video ⟩ "Jelgavas" futbolisti virslīgas spēlē pieveic "Daugavpili"
description: "Jelgava" ceturtdien savā laukumā svinēja uzvaru "Tonybet" Latvijas futbola virslīgas sestās kārtas spēlē.
title_translated: Video⟩ "Jelgava" football players in the Super League game defeat "Daugavpils"
description_translated: "Jelgava" celebrated victory on Tonybet on Thursday in the sixth round of the Latvian Football League.

title: Vēsturisko ūdenstorni Alīses ielā plāno nodot Jūgendstila centram
description: Pēc arhitekta Vilhelma Bokslafa projekta celto Rīgas vēsturisko ūdenstorni Alīses ielā plānots nodot Jūgendstila centram.
title_translated: The historic water tower plans to transfer to the Art Nouveau Center on Alice Street
description_translated: According to the architect Wilhelm Boxlaf's project, the historic water tower of Riga on Alice Street is planned to be transferred to the Art Nouveau Center.

title: "Jelgavas" futbolisti virslīgas spēlē sakauj "Daugavpili", pērn pret viņiem neguva nevienus vārtus četrās spēlēs
description: Jelgava" ceturtdien savā laukumā svinēja uzvaru "Tonybet" Latvijas futbola virslīgas sestās kārtas spēlē. "Jelgava" ar 4:1 (2:1) sakāva "Daugavpili". Jāpiebilst, ka pērn jelgavnieki četrās spēlēs pret "Daugavpili" neguva nevienus vārtus.
title_translated: "Jelgava" football players defeat "Daugavpils" in the Super League game, last year did not score any goals in four games
description_translated: Jelgava "celebrated victory on Tonybet on Thursday in the sixth round of the Latvian Football League." Jelgava "defeated" Daugavpils "by 4: 1 (2: 1). It should be noted that last year Jelgava players did not score in four games against" Daugavpils ".

title: “Kremlis nesēdēs un “nekasīs riekstus””, Slaidiņš skaidro, ko ietekmētu 100 000 vīru izvietošana uz frontes līnijas
title_translated: "The Kremlin will not sit and" nothing nuts ", Slide explains what the placement of 100,000 men on the front line would be affected

title: Makrons: Eiropai visiem līdzekļiem sevi jāaizsargā ASV sāktajā tirdzniecības karā
description: Francijas prezidents Emanuels Makrons piektdien paziņoja, ka ASV prezidenta Donalda Trampa lēmums uz 90 dienām atlikt paaugstināto muitas tarifu ieviešanu Eiropas Savienībai (ES) ir vien trausla atelpa, tāpēc Eiropai jāmobilizē visi pieejamie līdzekļi, lai sevi aizsargātu.
title_translated: Macron: Europe must protect itself in the US trade war on all means
description_translated: French President Emmanuel Macron said on Friday that US President Donald Trump's decision to postpone the introduction of increased customs tariffs for the European Union (EU) is only a fragile respite for 90 days, so Europe must mobilize all available funds to protect itself.

title: Par Rīgas pilsētas tiesas priekšsēdētāja vietnieku iecelta tiesnese Doloresa Bambere
description: Tieslietu padome piektdien, 11. aprīlī, par Rīgas pilsētas tiesas priekšsēdētāja vietnieku uz pieciem gadiem iecēla līdzšinējo tiesas priekšsēdētāja vietnieci Doloresu Bamberi.
title_translated: Judge Dolores Bamber was appointed Deputy Chairman of the Riga City Court

title: Pēc 5 gadiem veselības nozarē varētu trūkt ap 2400 darbinieku
description: Pēc pieciem gadiem veselības aprūpes jomā varētu trūkt aptuveni 2400 darbinieku. Lai meklētu risinājumu, nozares pārstāvji piektdien par situāciju diskutēja tam speciāli veltītā konferencē. Cerības liek uz medicīnas profesiju popularizēšanu jauniešu vidū un tehnoloģijām. OECD norāda, ka jārisina arī algu jautājums. Veselības ministrs gan uzskata, ka ārstu trūkuma risināšanai būs vajadzīgi vismaz pieci gadi.
title_translated: About 2,400 employees could be missing in the health sector after 5 years
description_translated: Five years later, about 2,400 employees could be lacking in health care. In order to look for a solution, industry representatives on Friday discussed the situation at a special conference. Expectations put on the promotion of medical professions among young people and technology. The OECD points out that wage issues should also be addressed. The Minister of Health, however, believes that it will take at least five years to deal with the lack of doctors.

title: Valsts valodas pārbaudei nav reģistrējušies 1332 Krievijas pilsoņi
description: Valsts valodas pārbaudei vēl nav reģistrējušies 1332 Latvijā dzīvojošie Krievijas pilsoņi, uz kuriem attiecas Imigrācijas likuma grozījumi par dokumentu iesniegšanu Eiropas Savienības (ES) pastāvīgā iedzīvotāja statusa pieprasīšanai, liecina Valsts izglītības attīstības aģentūras (VIAA) apkopotā informācija.
title_translated: 1332 Russian citizens have not registered for checking the official language
description_translated: 1332 Russian citizens living in Latvia, which are subject to amendments to the Immigration Law on submission of documents to request the status of a permanent resident of the European Union (EU), have not yet registered for examination of the official language, according to information compiled by the State Education Development Agency (VIAA).

title_translated: Five years in health care could be missing about 2,400 employees

description: 2025. gada aprīlī Francijā sociālajos tīklos strauji izplatījās pārsteidzošs foto. Bijušais valsts futbola izlases aizsargs bija redzams sporta preču veikalā, tērpies darbinieka vestē. Tas ir joks vai mākslīgais intelekts? Kā to apstiprināja Francijas vadošie mediji – nē. Bijušais futbolists tiešām bija atradis darbu pazīstamā veikalā.
title_translated: Eight years ago played with Messi, now working in a sporting goods store
description_translated: In April 2025, a surprising photo spread on social networks in France. The former national football team guard was seen in a sporting goods store, dressed in a vest. Is it a joke or artificial intelligence? As confirmed by the French leading media - no. The former footballer had really found a job in a familiar store.

title: Kā Putins nozaga ūdenskritumu un pie tā novietoja pretgaisa aizsardzības sistēmu
description: Krievijas diktators Vladimirs Putins ir apmāts ar naudu un greznību. Viņam ir virkne jahtu un rezidenču. Vienā no šīm “vasarnīcām” atrodas arī Putina privātais ūdenskritums.Raksts no TVNET+ arhīva. Pirmo reizi publicēts 2024.gada 5.februārī.
title_translated: As Putin stole a waterfall and placed an anti -aircraft protection system at it
description_translated: Russian dictator Vladimir Putin is covered with money and luxury. He has a number of yachts and residences. One of these "summer cottages" also has Putin's private waterfall. The article from the TVNET archive. First published on February 5, 2024.

title: Saldā lellīte ar vīrieša pasi. Lindas ceļš uz sapni
description: Noslēpumainā lapsa, saldā lellīte. Pašas radītajās kompozīcijās un video viņa iemieso visus pasaules stereotipus par sievišķību. Feministes tikai noelšas. Lai! Linda Šulce, aizvien vēl vīrietis pēc Latvijas pases, ir izdarījusi visu, lai būtu skaista, - ielikusi krūšu implantus, veikusi liposakciju, lai viduklis šaurs, pacēlusi plakstiņus, lai seja sievišķīgāka. To visu, strādājot fiziski smagu darbu Vācijā, kur viņu oficiālos dokumentos uzrunā “Frau”. Briesmīgākais nakts murgs, no kura Linda mostas nosvīdusi, – viņai nav krūšu! Raksts no TVNET+ arhīva. Pirmo reizi publicēts šī gada februārī.
title_translated: Sweet doll with a man's passport. Linda's Way to Dream
description_translated: Mysterious fox, sweet doll. In her own compositions and videos, she embodies all the stereotypes of femininity in the world. Feminists only rush. Have! Linda Schulce, still a man after the Latvian passport, has done his best to be beautiful - putting breast implants, making a liposuction so that the waist narrow, lifted his eyelids to make his face more feminine. All this by working physically hard in Germany, where they speak "Frau" in their official documents. The worst nightmare of the night, from which Linda wakes up - she has no breasts! An article from the TVNET archive. First published in February this year.

title: Mokteiļu mode. Vai veselīga?
description: Iespējams, ka arī tu esi dzirdējis un redzējis vārdu mokteilis, un, nē, tā nav drukas kļūda vai pārteikšanās. Mokteiļi ir kā jaunākie brāļi, kas pāraug lielos brāļus kokteiļus. Ieviešam skaidrību par mokteiļiem, uztura trenerei ir, ko teikt!
title_translated: Mocteil fashion. Healthy?
description_translated: You may have heard and seen the name Mokteil too, and no, this is not a print error or a waste. Moktei are like the younger brothers who grow big brothers cocktails. We put clarity about the mocteas, the nutrition coach has something to say!

title: Pakistānu pametuši vairāk nekā 127 000 afgāņu, lai izvairītos no deportēšanas
description: Kopš aprīļa sākuma Pakistānu pametuši vairāk nekā 127 000 afgāņu, no kuriem vairums brīvprātīgi atgriezušies Afganistānā, lai izvairītos no deportēšanas, pirmdien paziņojusi ANO Bēgļu aģentūra (UNHCR).
title_translated: Pakistan has left over 127,000 Afghans to avoid deportation
description_translated: More than 127,000 Afghans have left Pakistan since the beginning of April, most of whom have returned to Afghanistan to avoid deportation, the UN Refugee Agency (UNHCR) said on Monday.

title: Lavrovs: Krievija neatzīst valstu tiesības tikai uz "teritoriālo integritāti"
description: Krievijas ārlietu ministrs Sergejs Lavrovs paziņojis, ka Krievija neatzīst valstu tiesības tikai uz teritoriālo integritāti. Viņš pieprasa, ka valstīm ir jāciena arī tautu tiesības uz pašnoteikšanos. Tiesa, pašā Krievijā par aicinājumiem graut valsts teritoriālo integritāti draud ilgstošs ieslodzījums.
title_translated: Lavrov: Russia does not recognize the right of countries solely to "territorial integrity"
description_translated: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov has announced that Russia does not recognize the rights of national only territorial integrity. He demands that countries also have to respect the rights of nations to self -determination. True, in Russia itself, prolonged imprisonment is threatened by calls for the destruction of the country's territorial integrity.

title: Navarro kļūst par Ostapenko oponenti Štutgartē
description: Vācijas pilsētā Štutgartē risinās "WTA 500" māla turnīrs hallē. Šonakt pirmo kārtu pārvarēja amerikāniete Emma Navarro un kļuva par Latvijas tenisa līderes nākamo pretinieci.
title_translated: Navarro becomes Ostapenko's opponent in Stuttgart
description_translated: The WTA 500 Clay Tournament in the Hall will be held in Stuttgart, Germany. Tonight's first round was won by American Emma Navarro and became the next opponent of the Latvian tennis leader.

title: Artūra Žagara "Fenerbahce" ULEB Eirolīgas ceturtdaļfinālā spēlēs pret "Paris", Rolanda Šmita "Anadolu Efes" - pret "Panathinaikos"
description: "Paris" basketbolisti otrdien izcīnīja uzvaru "play-in" mačā un nodrošināja vietu ULEB Eirolīgas izslēgšanas spēlēs, kurās ceturtdaļfinālā tiksies ar Artūra Žagara pārstāvēto Stambulas "Fenerbahce". "Paris" viesos ar 81:73 (27:22, 19:14, 16:22, 19:15) pārspēja Madrides "Real".
title_translated: Arthur Jagar's Fenerbahce will play in the ULEB Euroleague quarterfinals against Paris, Roland Schmit's "Anadolu Efes" - against "Panathinaikos"
description_translated: The Paris basketball player on Tuesday won the play-in match and secured a place in the ULEB Euroleague playoffs, where Istanbul's Fenerbahce, represented by Arthur Zagar, will meet in the quarterfinals. "Paris" beat Madrid's Real with 81:73 (27:22, 19:14, 16:22, 19:15).

title_translated: Test. If you can answer at least 8 questions, you may not even know that you are a genius

title: Video: "Super Nova" spraigā cīņā izrauj neizšķirtu pret "Daugavpili"
description: 2025.gada 15.aprīļa vakarā tika aizvadīta Tonybet Virslīgas 7.kārtas spēle, kurā savā starpā spēkiem mērojās BFC "Daugavpils" un SK "Super Nova". Mačs noslēdzās neizšķirti 1:1 (1:0 ; 0:1). Jūsu uzmanībai piedāvājam noskatīties video apskatu no abu komandu dueļa.
title_translated: Video: "Super Nova" pulls out a tie against "Daugavpils" in an intense fight
description_translated: On the evening of April 15, 2025, Tonybet's 7th round game was played, with BFC "Daugavpils" and SK "Super Nova". The match ended with a draw 1: 1 (1: 0; 0: 1). Here's a look at the video review of the two teams.

title: Parīzieši uzvar Madridē un tiek Eirolīgas ceturtdaļfinālā, "Bayern" izslēdz serbus
description: ULEB Eirolīgas izslēgšanas turnīra kvalifikācijas kārtu pārvarējusi Parīzes komanda, kura augstāk izsēto vienību duelī izbraukumā ar 81:73 pārspēja Madrides "Real". Karaliskajam klubam piektdien būs iespēja mēģināt vēlreiz – jāuzņem Minhenes "Bayern", kura papildlaikā tika galā (97:93) ar Belgradas "Crvena zvezda". Serbijas klubam gan Eirolīgas sezona līdz ar šo klupienu ir noslēgusies.
title_translated: The Parisians win in Madrid and are in the Euroleague quarterfinals, "Bayern" turns off Serbs
description_translated: The ULEB Euroleague elimination tournament qualifiers have been won by the Paris team, which outscored Madrid's Real by 81:73 in a duel. The Royal Club will have the opportunity to try again on Friday - Munich's "Bayern", which was over time (97:93) with Belgrade's Crvena Zvezda. For the Serbian club, however, the Euroleague season is over.

title: PULSS ⟩ Kad ideja kļūst par vairogu: Latvijas militārās inovācijas Ukrainas frontē
description: Kopš Krievijas pilna mēroga iebrukuma Ukrainā ir pagājuši jau vairāk nekā trīs gadi. Arī Latvija šo gadu laikā strādā pie savu aizsardzības spēju stiprināšanas, tādēļ mūsu militārā industrija saskaras gan ar dažādiem izaicinājumiem, gan vienlaikus piedzīvo arī strauju izaugsmi. Viens no šādiem veiksmes stāstiem ir uzņēmums "Natrix", kura izstrādātā sauszemes bezpilota platforma sniedz atbalstu Ukrainas bruņotajiem spēkiem cīņā ar agresora spēkiem.
title_translated: Pulse⟩ When the idea becomes a shield: Latvian military innovation on the Ukrainian front
description_translated: More than three years have passed since Russia's full invasion of Ukraine. Latvia is also working on strengthening its defense capabilities during these years, so our military industry is facing various challenges and at the same time experiencing rapid growth. One such success stories is Natrix, which developed a land unmanned platform provides support for the Ukrainian armed forces in the fight against the aggressor.

title: Pēdējais lidojums: ģimenes traģiskais liktenis virs Ņujorkas
description: Hudzonas upē Ņujorkas Manhatanas rajonā ceturtdien, 10. aprīlī, nogāzās helikopters. Neviens no pasažieriem neizdzīvoja. Vēlāk noskaidrots, ka starp bojāgājušajiem bija starptautiskās kompānijas "Siemens Mobility" dzelzceļa infrastruktūras nozares vadītājs Augustins Eskobars, viņa sieva un trīs bērni. Ģimene bija ieradusies Ņujorkā, lai ceļotu, un izvēlējās izbaudīt helikoptera sniegto pakalpojumu kā īpašu notikumu, lai kopā izbaudītu pilsētas panorāmu no augšas un nosvinētu sievas 40. dzimšanas dienu. Diemžēl šis mirklis pārvērtās traģēdijā — dzīves, kas bija pilnas ar nākotnes sapņiem un cerībām, aprāvās vien dažās sekundēs...
title_translated: Last flight: Family tragic fate above New York
description_translated: On Thursday, April 10, a helicopter crashed into the Hudson River in the New York Manhatan area. None of the passengers survived. Later, it was found that the fatalities were Augustin Eskobar, his wife and three children, the head of the international company "Siemens Mobility". The family had arrived in New York to travel and chose to enjoy the service provided by the helicopter as a special event to enjoy the city panorama from above and celebrate his wife's 40th birthday. Unfortunately, this moment turned into a tragedy - life that was full of future dreams and hopes was in just a few seconds ...

title: Trampa pasaules kārtība – haoss un "sistēmiska zemestrīce"
description: Donalda Trampa pirmā pilnvaru termiņa sākumā Baltajā namā es apgalvoju, ka šī nebūs parasta prezidentūra. Starptautiskā kārtība, kuru jau tā nomāc fundamentāli trūkumi un strīdi par tās pamatvērtībām un institūcijām, piedzīvoja seismiskas pārmaiņas. Trampa otrā pilnvaru termiņa sākums iezīmējās ar vēl lielāku haosu, un tas, kas reiz šķita kā izolēts satricinājums, ir pārtapis pilna mēroga "sistēmiskā zemestrīcē".
title_translated: Trump World Order - Chaos and "Systemic Earthquake"
description_translated: Donald Trump at the beginning of the first term of office at the White House I claim that this will not be a common presidency. The international order, which is already overwhelmed by fundamental shortcomings and disputes over its core values ​​and institutions, underwent seismic changes. Trump's second term of power was marked with even greater chaos, and what once seemed to be an isolated concussion has turned into a full -scale "systemic earthquake".

title: Madrides "Real" ar blīkšķi noliek Čempionu līgas uzvarētāju pilnvaras
description: Londonas "Arsenal" futbolisti Madridē un Milānas "Inter" komanda savā laukumā trešdien iekļuva UEFA Čempionu līgas pusfinālā.
title_translated: Madrid's Real with a thumbs down the Champions League winner powers
description_translated: London's Arsenal footballers in Madrid and Milan's Inter team reached the UEFA Champions League semifinals on Wednesday.

title: Kremlis gatavo augsni agresijai pret Igauniju: analītiķi norāda uz līdzību ar notikumiem pirms iebrukuma Ukrainā
title_translated: The Kremlin prepares soil for aggression against Estonia: Analysts point to the resemblance to events before the invasion of Ukraine

title: "Dzimtenes aizstāvji" Krievijā masveidā tiek notiesāti krimināllietās
description: Krievijas propagandisti un diktators Vladimirs Putins nepārtraukti stāsta, ka Krievijas armija godprātīgi "aizstāv dzimteni” – ar to tiek saprasta dalība Krievijas agresīvajā un noziedzīgajā karā pret Ukrainu. Realitātē gan okupantu armijas kareivji Krievijā masveidā stājas tiesas priekšā dažādās krimināllietās un šādu krimināllietu skaits tikai palielinās.
title_translated: "Homeland Defenders" in Russia are massively convicted in criminal cases
description_translated: Russian propagandists and dictator Vladimir Putin are constantly saying that the Russian army "defends homeland" in good faith - it is understood by the participation of Russia's aggressive and criminal war against Ukraine. In reality, however, the Occupant Army soldiers in Russia are enormous in court in various criminal cases and the number of such criminal cases is only increasing.

title: "Gaisma, kas spīd, kad visas pārējās ir izdzisušas": kas notiek leģendārajā "Lauvas namā"
description: Rīgā, Brīvības ielā, iepretim Dailes teātrim jau vairāk nekā 30 gadus izsalkušos baro vieta, kas īpaši izslavēta ar to, ka turp var doties visu diennakti – ēdnīca "Lauvas nams". 14. aprīlī plašu rezonansi medijos un sociālajos tīklos sacēla ziņa no SIA "Lauvas nams" vadības ziņojuma, kurā pārstāvji norādījuši, ka "Nākotnes vīzija ir neskaidra, un, ja nekas nemainīsies, uzņēmumu nāksies slēgt".
title_translated: "Light shining when all the rest have disappeared": what's going on in the legendary "Lion House"
description_translated: In Riga, Brivibas Street, opposite the Daile Theater for over 30 years of hungry, a place that is particularly renowned that you can go around the clock - the canteen "Lauvas Nams". On April 14, a wide resonance in the media and social networks revealed news from the management report of SIA "Lauvas nams", in which the representatives stated that "the vision of the future is unclear, and if nothing changes, the company will have to close".

title: Remontada izpaliek – ''Arsenal'' no Madrides mājās ved uzvaru un ČL pusfinālu, tālāk soļo arī ''Inter''
description: UEFA Čempionu līgā šovakar noskaidrojās atlikušās pusfinālistes – Londonas ''Arsenal'', kas galotnē pārspēja Madrides ''Real'' ar 2:1, un Milānas ''Inter'', kas cīnījās neizšķirti 2:2 pret Minhenes ''Bayern''.
title_translated: The repair is missed - '' Arsenal '' from Madrid is home to winning and ČL semi -finals, and "Inter" is also walking.
description_translated: The rest of the semi -finalists, London's Arsenal, found out in the UEFA Champions League tonight, beating Madrid's Real at the end with a 2: 1, and Milan's Inter, who fought 2: 2 against Munich's Bayern.

title: Horoskops ceturtdienai - 17. aprīlim
description: Ceturtdiena iezīmē pāreju uz racionālāku, praktiskāku skatījumu. Mēness pāriet Skorpionā, rosinot iekšējo pārvērtību tēmas. Tā ir diena, kad būtiskas lietas var atrisināties aizkulisēs, klusumā, pārdomās. Vērts pievērsties tam, ko ilgstoši esi atlicis – īpaši attiecību un karjeras jomā. Emocionālais fons kļūst dziļāks un intensīvāks, bet arī jūtīgāks – vārdi šodien var aizskart dziļi, tāpēc runā atbildīgi.
title_translated: Horoscope Thursday - April 17
description_translated: Thursday marks the transition to a more rational, more practical view. The Moon passes into Scorpio, encouraging the themes of internal transformations. It is the day when important things can be resolved behind the scenes, silence, reflection. It is worth focusing on what you have left for a long time - especially in the relationship and career. The emotional background becomes deeper and more intense, but also more sensitive - the words today can offend deep, so speak responsibly.

Tomēr līdz šim neviens nav atklājis konkrēto vēža veidu. Kāpēc tā? Lūk, iespējamie iemesli – tostarp arī potenciāli ticamākie –, kāpēc karaļnams joprojām izvēlas klusēt...

In the interview, he talks about the disease of the mouth and nail, the "blue tongue" disease and possible protective measures on the Latvian borders, as well as market trends and the rise in beef prices.

title_translated: Mother in the US accuses the child in changing an exotic monkey

title: Tests: Vai tu būtu "laba sieva" 1955. gadā?
description: Pagājušā gadsimta vidus nav nemaz tik sena pagātne, taču sabiedrība un uzskati par dzimumu vienlīdzību kopš tā laika ir krietni mainījušies. 1955. gada maijā amerikāņu žurnālā "Housekeeping Monthly" tika publicēts raksts "Labas sievas noteikumi". Tajā minēti "likumi", kas jāievēro, lai vīrs būtu apmierināts ar sievas uzvedību.
title_translated: Test: Would you be a "good wife" in 1955?
description_translated: The middle of the last century is not such a long time ago, but society and views on gender equality have since changed significantly. In May 1955, an article "Good Wife's Rules" was published in the American magazine "Housekeeping Monthly". It mentions the "laws" that must be followed to make the husband satisfied with his wife's behavior.

title: Horoskops sestdienai - 19. aprīlim
description: Šī diena nes vieglu, uz pārmaiņām vērstu enerģiju – Mēness pāriet Strēlniekā, un Saule tuvojas pēdējām stundām Auna zīmē. Sestdiena piemērota atbrīvošanai no rutīnas, jaunu iespaidu meklēšanai un aktīvai atpūtai. Diena var atmodināt vēlmi mainīt ierasto kārtību, doties ceļā, iepazīt cilvēkus vai idejas, kas iedvesmo. Attiecībās svarīga kļūst brīvība un uzticēšanās. Labs brīdis, lai izkāptu no ierastajiem rāmjiem.
title_translated: Horoscope for Saturday - April 19
description_translated: This day brings easy, changes to change - the moon is moving to the Sagittarius, and the sun is approaching the last hours of Aries. Saturday is suitable for release of routine, searching for new impressions and active recreation. The day can awaken the desire to change the usual order, to go, get to know people or ideas that inspire. Freedom and trust become important in the relationship. A good time to get off the usual frames.

title: Jēzus mīļotā? Prostitūta? Marija Magdalēna – sieviete, kuru vēsture centās apklusināt
description: Cieši rokā satvērusi pīto groziņu, kurā lina audeklā bija ievīstīts cienasts, viņa steidzās uz alu. "Vai palīgiem, kuri novels akmeni no alas ieejas, pietiks ar manis vārītajām olām?" ātrā solī ejot, domāja rudmatainā sieviete. Liels bija pārsteigums, kad viņa atskārta, ka akmens no ieejas alā jau ir novelts malā. Viņa devās alā, kur atrada uz zemes nomestu līķautu. "Viņš ir augšāmcēlies!" iesaucās Jēzus uzticamā sekotāja. Liels bija viņas pārsteigums, ka oliņas grozā bija no baltām iekrāsojušās sarkanas kā asins. Šīs sievietes vārds bija Marija Magdalēna - vismistiskākā persona Bībeles stāstā. Viņas stāsts līdz galam nav skaidrs, tāpat arī viņas attiecības ar Jēzu un kāpēc viņai bija tas gods pirmajai uzzināt šo kristiešiem brīnišķīgo ziņu un sastapt Jēzu augšāmcēlušos. Skaidrs ir viens, Lieldienu olu krāsošanas stāsts nāk no leģendas par šo sievieti, tāpēc šobrīd ir īpaši interesanti uzzināt ko vairāk par viņu!
title_translated: Jesus sweetheart? Prostitute? Mary Magdalene - A woman whose history tried to silence
description_translated: She grabbed a wicker basket in a closely hand, in which she was a treat, she rushed to the beer. "Will the assistants who will remove the stone from the entrance of the cave will suffice with the eggs I cooked?" As a quick step, the red -haired woman thought. It was a big surprise when she realized that the stone from the entrance to the cave had already been set aside. She went to the cave where she found a corpse on the ground. "He's risen!" exclaimed Jesus' trusted follower. It was a great surprise to her that the egg basket was from white red like blood. The name of this woman was Mary Magdalene, the most mild person in the Bible story. Her story is unclear, as well as her relationship with Jesus, and why she was honored to know this Christian wonderful message and meet Jesus' resurrected. One thing is, the Easter egg painting story comes from the legend of this woman, so it is especially interesting at the moment to know more about her!

title: Salātu karaļi: siļķe kažokā un rasols. Izvēlies vienu vai gatavo abus
description: Siļķe kažokā un rasols ir daudzās ģimenēs svētku zvaigznes. Un kāpēc ne – iecienīti produkti, pazīstamas garšas, kas nepieviļ. Laikam ejot, katram no šiem ēdieniem ir radušās versijas, pielāgotas dažādām gaumēm – rasolu var uztaisīt bez desas un gaļas, bet siļķi kažokā var pagatavot arī bez siļķes.
title_translated: Salad kings: herring in fur and rasol. Choose one or cook both
description_translated: Herring Fur and Rasol are festive stars in many families. And why not - popular products, familiar flavors that do not disappoint. As time goes on, each of these dishes has versions that are adapted to different tastes - rasol can be made without sausage and meat, but the herring in the fur can be prepared without herring.

title: Bruņošanās laikmets sola peļņas iespējas
description: Pelnīt biržā nav tikai bagāto privilēģija. To var darīt arī tad, ja ieguldījumiem var atļauties atlikt vien dažus simtus eiro. TVNET+ skaidro, kā to varētu izdarīt, turklāt vēl samazinot potenciālos ieguldījumus riskus.
title_translated: Arming era promises profit opportunities
description_translated: Making the stock exchange is not just the privilege of rich. This can also be done if only a few hundred euros can be afforded for investments. TVNET explains how this could be done, and further reducing potential investment risks.

title: Atļauj LVC turpināt iepirkumu par vidējā braukšanas ātruma mērīšanas sistēmu uzstādīšanu
description: Iepirkumu uzraudzības birojs (IUB), izskatot SIA "Eunomia Traffic AG" un SIA "Fima" sūdzības, atļāvis VSIA "Latvijas valsts ceļi" (LVC) turpināt iepirkumu par jaunu vidējā braukšanas ātruma mērīšanas sistēmu piegādi, uzstādīšanu un uzturēšanu, liecina informācija IUB mājaslapā.
title_translated: Allow LVC to continue procurement for the installation of average speed measurement systems
description_translated: The Procurement Monitoring Bureau (IUB), considering complaints from SIA "Eunomia Traffic AG" and SIA "FIMA", has authorized VSIA "Latvijas Valsts ceļi" (LVC) to continue procurement for the supply, installation and maintenance of new speed measurement systems, according to information on the PMB website.

title: Nemīlestības tēma un princips pāri visam. Dailes teātra izrāde "Brands”
description: "Šī materiāla sarežģītības un lieluma pakāpe ir līdz galam nekad neizdibināma. Katru reizi tie uzdevumi ir no jauna un jauna. Domāt šīs lielās domas ir milzīga privilēģija," tā par Ibsena "Brandu" teic Dailes teātra iestudējuma titullomas atveidotāja Ieva Segliņa. Režisora Viestura Kairiša vērienīgajā uzvedumā ideālists Brands, kurš mēģina pamodināt un vest pie Dieva mietpilsoniski pašapmierināto sabiedrību, ir sieviete. Raidījumā "Teātris.zip" saruna ar diviem Brandiem – aktrisi Ievu Segliņu un Latvijas Kultūras kanonā iekļautā 1975. gada Dailes teātra iestudējuma Brandu – Juri Strengu, kurš jaunajā izrādē spēlē Branda tēvu.
title_translated: The topic and principle of love above everything. Daile Theater performance "Brands"
description_translated: "The complexity and size of this material is never fully unexpected. Every time these tasks are again and new. Thinking these great thoughts are a huge privilege," says Ieva Sadliņa, a title role in the Daile Theater. In the ambitious performance of director Viestur Kairish, the idealist Brands, who is trying to wake up and bring to God's citizen -complacent society, is a woman. In the show "Theater.zip" a conversation with two brands - actress Ieva Segliņš and Latvian Culture Canon, included in the 1975 Daile Theater production, Juris Streng, who plays Brand's father in the new performance.

title: Sakopjam gan laukus un pilsētas, gan digitālo vidi! Šogad jau 18. gadu pēc kārtas Latvija vienosies “Lielajā talkā”
description: Šogad jau 18. reizi visos Latvijas novados, atsevišķos diasporas centros ārvalstīs un pat digitālajā vidē notiks “Lielā talka”. Ar saukli “Esam daba! Esam kopā! Esam Latvija!” ap 1000 reģistrētu talku ietvaros tiks sakopta apkārtējā vide, kā arī pati talku tradīcija tiks pieteikta Latvijas nemateriālās kultūras mantojuma sarakstam.
title_translated: We clean up both the countryside and the city and the digital environment! This year, for the 18th consecutive year, Latvia will agree in the "Great Cleanup"
description_translated: This year, for the 18th time in all regions of Latvia, in some diaspora centers abroad and even in the digital environment, the "Big Talk" will take place. With the slogan "We are Nature! We are together! We are Latvia!" The environment will be cleaned up within the framework of about 1000 registered work, as well as the tradition of the work will be applied for the list of intangible cultural heritage of Latvia.

title: Elitārs Šanhajas restorāns piedāvā šokējošu desertu. Vai tiešām kāds to spēj ieēst?
description: Ekskluzīvs Šanhajas restorāns piesaistījis ievērojamu uzmanību ar to, ka piedāvā izbaudīt maltītes ieturēšanu “autentiskā” lietusmeža atmosfērā. Šī eksotiskā gaisotne ir manāma ne tikai visapkārt viesiem, bet arī viņu šķīvjos. Sevišķu ažiotāžu izraisījis kāds deserts, kuru spētu ieēst tikai cilvēks ar rūdītu kuņģi un nervu sistēmu.
title_translated: Elitar Shanghai restaurant offers a shocking dessert. Is anyone really able to eat it?
description_translated: The exclusive Shanghai restaurant has attracted considerable attention to offer to enjoy the meal with the "authentic" rainforest atmosphere. This exotic atmosphere is not only visible all around guests, but also in their plates. Special stir was caused by a dessert that could only be eaten by a person with a hardened stomach and nervous system.

title: «Labs karavīra ekipējums glābj dzīvības» – kā «Brasa Defence Systems» izvēršas militārajā industrijā
description: Mārupē strādājošā SIA "Brasa Defence Systems" ražoto militāro apģērbu un ekipējumu izmanto ne tikai Latvijas Nacionālie bruņotie spēki (NBS), bet arī karavīri daudzās Eiropas Savienības (ES) valstīs, kā arī Kanādā, Izraēla un Norvēģijā. Karavīrs ar uzņēmuma ražoto produkciju tiek ekipēts no galvas līdz kājām, sākot no termoveļas līdz bruņuvestēm un mugursomām. Lai atvieglotu karavīra gaitas kaujaslaukā, "Brasa Defence Systems" pēdējos gados pievērsies sauszemes dronu izstrādei.
title_translated: "A good soldier's equipment saves lives" - as "Brasa Defense Systems" expands in the military industry
description_translated: Military clothing and equipment manufactured by SIA "Brasa Defence Systems", working in Marupe, are used not only by the Latvian National Armed Forces (NAF), but also by soldiers in many European Union (EU) countries, as well as in Canada, Israel and Norway. The soldier with the company's products is equipped from head to toe, from thermal underwear to armor and backpacks. In order to facilitate the troops' course in the battlefield, "Brasa Defense Systems" has turned to the development of land drones in recent years.

Sākām ar sarkanajām kurpēm, kuras viņš izvēlējās nenēsāt. Turpinājām ar dārglietām jeb insignijām - tagad laiks ielūkoties pašā audumā – pāvesta apģērbā, tā slāņos un krāsās, kas cauri gadsimtiem runā skaļāk par vārdiem.
description_translated: To commemorate the recent Pope Francis, we invite you to go into the "Pope's wardrobe", a series of articles that get to know the Pope's exterior image not only as a costume, but as a symbol of history and faith. We started with the red shoes he chose not to worry. We continued with jewels or insignia - now is the time to look at the fabric itself - in the pope's clothing, its layers and colors that speak louder than the words through the centuries.

title: Pie žoga. Tie, kuriem pēc nāves vārda vietā numurs
description: Melnie. Tā viņus sauc kaprači. Katru gadu Jaunciema kapsētā tiek apglabāti 100 līdz 150 mirušie, kuriem nav piederīgo. Bezpiederīgo sektorā 50 gadu laikā kopumā apglabāti ap 8 tūkstošiem cilvēku. Skumjākais, ka aizvien biežāki ir gadījumi, kad mirušajam ir tuvinieki, bet viņi atsakās apglabāt aizgājēju, atstājot to pašvaldības ziņā, saka Rīgas Kapsētu pārvaldes vadītājs Gints Zēla. Netālu atrodas bērnu bāreņu apbedījumi - mazas, necilas kapu kopiņas, ko iezīmē vien piemineklis ar uzrakstu “Maziem eņģelīšiem”.
title_translated: At the fence. Those who, after the death of the name, the number
description_translated: Black. This is what they call them capers. Each year, 100 to 150 dead are buried in Jaunciems cemetery. About 8 thousand people have been buried in the non -sector sector in 50 years. The saddest thing is that there are cases where the dead has relatives, but they refuse to bury the deceased, leaving it to the municipality, says Gints Zeel, head of the Riga Cemetery Administration. Nearby, orphan's burials are located - small, humble graves, which are marked by a monument with the inscription "Small angels".

title: Pašai malārija, bērniem – kašķis. Brīvprātīgās Eleonoras piedzīvotais Āfrikā
description: Ja uz svaru kausiem noliek Latviju un Āfrikas valsti Keniju, šķiet, ka satikušās divas pilnībā dažādas pasaules. Tam piekrīt arī 26 gadus vecā Eleonora Sušinska, taču viņas pieredze, trīsarpus mēnešus pavadot brīvprātīgo darbā tuksnesī, pierādījusi arī pretējo. Kad dzīvē viss bruka un juka, viņa nolēma piekrist izaicinājumam un doties uz citu pasaules malu, lai iepazītu un izglītotu Āfrikas tuksneša bērnus, kuru ikdienas dzīve ir gan ļoti sūra, gan piepildīta ar pāri plūstošu dzīvesprieku. Sava piedzīvojuma laikā Eleonora izdzīvojusi lielu emociju un notikumu virpuli – sākot no apziņas, ka dzīvei pietiek ar trim mēbelēm, un beidzot ar malārijas izslimošanu pat divkārt.
title_translated: Malaria itself, children - scabies. Voluntary Eleonora experienced in Africa
description_translated: If Latvia and the African state Kenya are placed on the scales, two completely different worlds have met. 26 -year -old Eleonor Sushinsky also agrees, but her experience has also proved the opposite to spend three and a half months volunteering in the desert. When everything was bruce and juka in life, she decided to accept the challenge and go to another edge of the world to get to know and educate the children of the African desert, whose daily life is both very sore and filled with a flowing joy. During his adventure, Eleonora has survived a great whirlwind of emotions and events - from the realization that three furniture is enough for life, and ending with malaria even twice.

title: Vītiņu pļavu noganīšana ar Hailandes govīm attaisnojas – izdodas saglabāt unikālās dabas vērtības
description: Bioloģiski vērtīgās un Latvijas mērogā unikālās Vītiņu pļavas dabas lieguma teritorijā pie Liepājas ezera nu jau vairāk nekā 20 gadus apsaimnieko lauksaimnieks Valdis Ķēde. Pļavas vairs nevarot salīdzināt ar to, kādas tās izskatījušās, pirms tur sāka mājot Hailandes šķrines govju ganāmpulks. Pļavu apsaimniekošanas rezultātus atzinīgi vērtē arī dabas pētnieki. Lauku atbalsta dienests piešķir atbalsta maksājumus par vairāk nekā 80 hektāriem.
title_translated: Ganning meadows with Hailand cows justifies - manage to preserve unique nature values
description_translated: On the scale of the biologically valuable and Latvia, the unique Vītiņi meadow in the territory of nature reserve near Liepaja has been managed by a farmer Valdis Keve for more than 20 years. The meadows can no longer be compared to what they looked before there was a herd of Hailand's cows. Nature researchers are also welcomed by the results of meadow management. The Rural Support Service grants support payments for more than 80 hectares.

title: Klāt vimbu laiks - kā pagatavot šo asakaino, bet izcili gardo zivi
description: Vimba ir sezonāls kārums. Pavasaros tās dodas augšup pa Ventu, Lielupi un Gauju, lai nārstotu, un tad arī ir to ķeršanas laiks. Tā ir ļoti garšīga zivs, un vimbas pagatavošanas iespējas ir bezgalīgas: kūpināšana, cepšana, kotletēs, zupās, kā arī sālīšana vai tartars.
title_translated: Vimbu time is present - how to cook this bay but brilliantly delicious fish
description_translated: Vimba is a seasonal treat. In the spring, they go up Venta, Lielupe and Gauja to spawn, and then there is a time to catch them. It is a very tasty fish, and vimba cooking options are endless: smoking, baking, cutlets, soups, as well as salting or tartar.

title: Cik liela nozīme ir obligātajām veselības pārbaudēm?
description: Cik liela nozīme ir obligātajām veselības pārbaudēm? Arodārsti ir pārliecināti, ka pārbaudes ir vajadzīgas, jo tādā veidā var ne vien uzmanīt nodarbināto veselību, bet arī laicīgi atklāt kādas saslimšanas. Tomēr iedzīvotāju viedokļi šajā jautājumā dalās.
title_translated: How important is compulsory health tests?
description_translated: How important is compulsory health tests? The professional doctors are convinced that tests are needed, as this can not only be careful not only to the health of the employees, but also to detect any illnesses in a timely manner. However, the opinions of the population share this issue.

title: Kas jāņem vērā, uzglabājot un transportējot slīpēšanas diskus?
description: Slīpēšanas disku uzglabāšana un transportēšana ir būtisks posms, lai saglabātu to kvalitāti un nodrošinātu drošu lietošanu. Disku bojājumi, kas radušies nepareizas uzglabāšanas vai pārvadāšanas laikā, var samazināt to efektivitāti vai pat apdraudēt lietotāja drošību. Lai izvairītos no šādām situācijām, jāņem vērā vairāki būtiski faktori. Šie nosacījumi attiecas uz visiem disku veidiem - no standarta līdz speciālajiem abrazīvajiem risinājumiem. Atbildīga uzglabāšana sākas jau no brīža, kad disks nonāk noliktavā - katrs solis ir svarīgs.
title_translated: What to consider when storing and transporting grinding discs?
description_translated: Storage and transportation of grinding discs is an important step in maintaining their quality and ensuring safe use. Disc damage caused by incorrect storage or transport can reduce their efficiency or even threaten the user safety. Several important factors must be taken into account in order to avoid such situations. These conditions apply to all types of discs, from standard to special abrasive solutions. Responsible storage begins from the moment the disk enters the warehouse - every step is important.

description_translated: The National Basketball Association (NBA) will have two decisive games in the first round. Last night, the Houston Rockets outscored the Golden State's Warriors with 115: 107. In the series, the result has become a draw 3-3.

title: Diddy noraida valdības piedāvāto vienošanos, kas būtu ļāvusi viņam izvairīties no ilga cietumsoda
description: Mūzikas moguls Šons “Diddy” Kombs šonedēļ oficiāli noraidīja ASV valdības piedāvāto vienošanos, tikai trīs dienas pirms tiesas procesa sākuma, kas saistīts ar cilvēku tirdzniecību seksuāliem nolūkiem.
title_translated: Diddy reject the government's agreement that would have allowed him to avoid a long prison sentence

Tāpat Saseksas hercogs intervijā, kas publicēta pēc tam, kad viņš zaudēja tiesvedībā par apsardzi Lielbritānijā, atzina, ka pēc zaudējuma jūtas "sagrauts".

Similarly, the Duke of Sussex, in an interview published after losing to the security guard in the UK, admitted that he feels "destroyed" after the loss.

description: Visintensīvākais saules starojums ir no aprīļa līdz oktobrim, taču optometriste Linda Šilova iesaka valkāt saulesbrilles visu gadu. Viņa arī atklāj, kādu toņu lēcas redzei ir visdraudzīgākās.

title_translated: Prime Minister: Independence is also today's responsibility and choice
description_translated: Independence is not only an achievement of the past, but it is our responsibility and the choices we make today to protect and form Latvia, the Prime Minister Evika Siliņa (JV) emphasizes on the anniversary of the restoration of Latvia's independence.

title: Valsts svētkos daudzviet gaidāms lietus
description: Latvijas Republikas Neatkarības atjaunošanas 35.gadadienā Latviju šķērsos nokrišņu zona, kas teritorijas lielākajā daļā atnesīs lietu, prognozē Latvijas Vides, ģeoloģijas un meteoroloģijas centrs.

description: Pirms 35 gadiem mēs spējām vienoties kopīgam mērķim - brīvai, neatkarīgai Latvijai -, un esmu pārliecināts, ka arī šodien mēs to spējam, apsveikumā Latvijas Neatkarības atjaunošanas gadadienā uzsver Valsts prezidents Edgars Rinkēvičs.

description_translated: 35 years ago, we were able to agree on a common goal - free, independent Latvia - and I am convinced that today we are able to congratulate it on the anniversary of the restoration of Latvia's independence, Edgars Rinkēvičs.

Tiesībsargs vērš uzmanību, ka šo var traktēt ne tikai kā rupjību, bet gan kā seksuālu uzmākšanos, par ko jauniešiem var iestāties administratīvā atbildība. Bet atsevišķos gadījumos pat kā seksuālu izmantošanu, par ko var iestāties kriminālatbildība.
title_translated: Jokes, comments, kisses, massages and more: when minors may have to answer after all the brutality of the law
description_translated: Sexual notes, offense and humiliation at school are not rare. The Ombudsman draws attention to the fact that this can be treated not only as rudeness, but as a sexual harassment that young people may have administrative responsibility. But in some cases, even as sexual abuse, which may be criminal.

description: Austrālijas pilots Oskars Piastri ("McLaren") svētdien ASV svinēja uzvaru Pirmās formulas (F-1) pasaules čempionāta Maiami "Grand Prix".

description_translated: Australian pilot Oscar Piatri ("McLaren") on Sunday in the United States celebrated victory in the first formula (F-1) World Championship Miami "Grand Prix".

description: Latvijas rallija ekipāža Mārtiņš Sesks/Renārs Francis pirms nākamās nedēļas izskaņā gaidāmās atgriešanās pasaules rallija čempionāta (WRC) apritē aizvadītajā nedēļas nogalē piedalījās Portugāles rallija čempionāta trešajā posmā "Terras d'Aboboreira", kur ekipāžu pievīla tehnika.

description_translated: Latvian rally crew Mārtiņš Sesks/Renārs Francis, before the end of next week, attended the third round of the Portuguese Rally Championship "Terra d'Aboboreira" last weekend.

title: Pirmdien saule mīsies ar mākoņiem
description: Pirmdien saule mīsies ar mākoņiem, kas vēl rīta stundās austrumu rajonos nesīs lietu un slapju sniegu, prognozē Latvijas Vides, ģeoloģijas un meteoroloģijas centrā.
title_translated: Monday the sun will mumble with clouds
description_translated: On Monday, the sun will be with clouds, which will bring rain and wet snow in the eastern areas in the morning, according to the Latvian Center for Environment, Geology and Meteorology.

title: "Es salūzu un sabruku..." mūziķis Andžejs Grauds atklāti par depresiju un izdegšanu
description: “Par to nedrīkst kautrēties runāt publiski, ikviens no mums var saskarties ar izdegšanu,” atklāts ir mūziķis Andžejs Grauds, kas beidzot atguvies no smagākās psiholoģiskās krīzes savā dzīvē.
title_translated: "I broke and collapsed ..." musician Andrew Grauds openly for depression and burnout
description_translated: "It is not possible to talk about it publicly, each of us can face burnout," is the revealed musician Andrew Graud, who has finally recovered from the heaviest psychological crisis in his life.

title: "Jābrauc tā, it kā visi gribētu tevi notriekt!" Eksperta padomi drošai motosezonai
description: Sākoties jaunajai moto sezonai, ceļi kļūst dzīvāki, un arvien vairāk motociklistu atgriežas satiksmē. Kā mainās jaunā motobraucēju paaudze, kādas kļūdas tiek pieļautas visbiežāk un kāpēc ekipējums ir dzīvības jautājums? Uz šiem jautājumiem portālam Jauns.lv atbildēja Motoklubu asociācijas eksperts, "MCC Smart Head" viceprezidents un CSDD satiksmes drošības eksperts Oskars Irbītis.
title_translated: "You have to drive as if everyone wanted to knock you down!" Expert Tips for Safe Motor Season
description_translated: With the start of the new motto season, the roads are becoming lively, and more and more motorcyclists are returning to traffic. How does the new generation of motorcyclists change, what mistakes are most common and why is the equipment being a matter of life? These questions were answered by the Motorcycle Club Association expert, Vice President of "MCC Smart Head" and Oskars Irbītis, Vice President of the MCC Smart Head.

title: Vistas gaļa - tiešām tik veselīga? Daži pētnieki to apšauba
description: Itālijas Nacionālā gastroenteroloģijas institūta zinātnieki atklājuši, ka vairāk nekā 19 vistas gabaliņu patēriņš nedēļā (aptuveni četras porcijas) var palielināt priekšlaicīgas nāves risku.
title_translated: Chicken - really so healthy? Some researchers question it
description_translated: Scientists at the Italian Institute of Gastroenterology have discovered that more than 19 pieces of chicken per week (about four servings) can increase the risk of premature death.

title: Vai zombiju apokalipses "Pēdējais no mums" otrā sezona attaisno gaidas?
description: Pirms diviem gadiem televīzijas kanālam HBO ar emocionāli satricinošā zombiju apokalipses stāsta "Pēdējais no mums"/"The Last of Us" pirmo sezonu izdevās uzskatāmi parādīt pasaulei, ka videospēļu ekranizācijas tomēr nav mūžīgai neveiksmei lemts pasākums. Šajā pavasarī mūsu uzmanībai tiek piedāvāts turpinājums, kuram jāspēj vest tālāk oriģināla veiksmes stāsts, tomēr skatītāju un kritiķu atsauksmes līdz šim ir krietni vien remdenākas, un, kā jau mūsdienās ierasts, netrūkst arī karstasinīgas "naida runas" gan autoru, gan galvenās lomas atveidotājas Bellas Remzijas virzienā.
title_translated: Does the second season of the zombie apocalypse "last of us" justify the expectation?
description_translated: Two years ago, the television channel HBO, with the emotionally shaky zombie apocalypse, tells the "Last of us"/"The Last of Us" for the first season of the world to show the world that video game screenings are not destined for eternal failure. This spring, we are offered a sequel to us to be able to bring the original success story, but the reviews of viewers and critics are much more detail so far, and as usual nowadays, there is no shortage of hot "hate speeches" in the direction of the authors and the lead roles.

title: Elmārs un Ilona Taņņi: "Esam atkal viens otrā iemīlējušies!"
description: Šefpavārs un uzņēmējs Elmārs Tannis ar sievu Ilonu Tanni ir kopā teju piecus gadus, pērn vasarā abi mija gredzenus, un pāra attiecībās joprojām valda patiesa mīlestība un prieks.
title_translated: Elmar and Ilona Tanņi: "We are in love with each other again!"
description_translated: Chef and entrepreneur Elmars Tannis and his wife Ilona Tanni have been together for almost five years, last summer both swapping rings, and the couple's relationship still has true love and joy.

title: Štrombaham neliels kritums ATP rangā
description: Tenisa profesionāļu asociācija (ATP) publiskojusi jaunāko pasaules rangu. Latvijas vīriešu tenisa līderis Roberts Štrombahs atkāpies no 328. uz 333. vietu, savukārt mūsu otrais numurs Kārlis Ozoliņš pacēlies no 730. uz 726. pozīciju.
title_translated: A small drop in the ATP ranking for Strombah
description_translated: The Tennis Professionals Association (ATP) has released the latest world rank. Latvian men's tennis leader Robert Strombah has resigned from 328 to 333, while our second number Karlis Ozoliņš has risen from 730 to 726.

title: Madonas novada domes deputātu kandidāti: rūpes par bijušajiem ieslodzītajiem, olimpietis un muzejnieces
description: Tuvojoties pašvaldību vēlēšanām, kas notiks 7. jūnijā, Jauns.lv rakstu sērijā iepazīstina ar visu 42 pašvaldību (novadu un valstspilsētu) deputātu kandidātu sarakstiem, to lokomotīvēm, tajos iekļautajām slavenībām un dīvainībām. Šoreiz stāsts par Madonas novada deputātu kandidātiem, kuri pārvaldīs platības ziņā Latvijas otru lielāko novadu (pirmais ir Dienvidkurzemes novads).
title_translated: Candidates for Madona County Council: Caring for former prisoners, Olympian and museum
description_translated: As the municipal elections, which will take place on June 7, will introduce the lists of candidates for all 42 municipal (county and national) candidates, their locomotives, and the celebrities and strangers they contain. This time the story of candidates for deputies of Madona County, who will manage the second largest region in Latvia (the first is South Kurzeme region).

title: Kristīnes Vītolas komanda pārtrauc Salamankas supersēriju
description: Kristīne Vītola un "Valencia" basketbolistes svētdien, 4. maijā, savā laukumā uzvarēja Salamankas "Avenida" ar 75:62, Spānijas pusfināla spēļu summā izcīnot panākumu ar 151:138.
title_translated: Kristine Vitola's team stops Salamanca's super series
description_translated: Kristine Vitola and "Valencia" basketball players on Sunday, May 4, won Salamanca's "Avenida" with 75:62, winning the Spanish semi -final with 151: 138.

title: Tramps uzdod no jauna atvērt Alkatrasas cietumu
description: ASV prezidents Donalds Tramps svētdien paziņoja, ka devis rīkojumu amatpersonām atjaunot un no jauna atvērt bēdīgi slaveno Alkatrasas cietumu, kas tika slēgts pirms sešiem gadu desmitiem.
title_translated: Trump instructs to reopen the opening prison
description_translated: US President Donald Trump said on Sunday that he ordered officials to restore and re -open the notorious Alcatras prison, which was closed six decades ago.

title: Tramps uzdod no jauna atvērt Alkatrazas cietumu
description: ASV prezidents Donalds Tramps svētdien paziņoja, ka devis rīkojumu amatpersonām atjaunot un no jauna atvērt bēdīgi slaveno Alkatrazas cietumu, kas tika slēgts pirms sešiem gadu desmitiem.

description_translated: US President Donald Trump said on Sunday that he ordered officials to restore and re -open the notorious Alcatraz Prison, which was closed six decades ago.

description: ASV prezidents Donalds Tramps ir devis rīkojumu atkārtoti atvērt Alkatrazas federālo cietumu, norādot, ka tam atkal jākļūst par vietu, kur ieslodzīt nežēlīgākos noziedzniekus, vēsta ārvaltu mediji.
title_translated: Trump has ordered to open one of the most scary prison sites
description_translated: US President Donald Trump has ordered the re -opening of the Alcatraza Federal Prison, stating that it must again become a place to imprison the most brutal criminals, foreign media reports.

title: Svētdien satiksmes negadījumos cietuši deviņi cilvēki; pieķerti vairāki dzērājšoferi
description: Svētdien ceļu satiksmes negadījumos Latvijā cietuši deviņi cilvēki, savukārt pie transportlīdzekļa stūres reibumā pieķerti 11 šoferi, bet vēl viens atradies narkotisko vielu iespaidā, informēja Valsts policijā.
title_translated: Nine people were injured in traffic accidents on Sunday; caught several drunk drivers
description_translated: On Sunday, nine people were injured in road accidents in Latvia, while 11 drivers were caught under the influence of the vehicle, but another was under the influence of drugs, the State Police said.

title: Zvaigznes pēdējais iznāciens izlasē? Krosbijs spēlēs pasaules meistarsacīkstēs
description: Kanādas valstsvienības nometnei pievienojies Sidnijs Krosbijs, kurš pasaules čempionātos piedalījies arī 2006. un 2015. gadā.

description_translated: Sidney Crosby, who also participated in the World Championships in 2006 and 2015, joined the Canadian team camp.

title: Vidzemē norisināsies militārās mācības "Kristāla bulta 2025"
description: No pirmdienas līdz 11.maijam Vidzemes reģiona Aizkraukles, Ādažu, Cēsu, Gulbenes, Madonas, Ogres, Ropažu, Siguldas, Saulkrastu un Smiltenes novados norisināsies Sauszemes spēku Mehanizētās kājnieku brigādes organizētās militārās mācības "Kristāla bulta 2025", informē Nacionālajos bruņotajos spēkos (NBS).
