description_translated: From Monday to May 11, Vidzeme region Aizkraukle, Adazi, Cēsis, Gulbene, Madona, Ogre, Ropazi, Sigulda, Saulkrasti and Smiltene will host the Military Training of Infantry Brigade, Mechanized Mechanized Infantry Brigade, "Crystal Arrow 2025".

title: Ābolam uzvara Kaldera kausa izcīņas spēlē
description: Latvijas uzbrucējs Rodrigo Ābols svētdien kopā ar Alentaunas "Lehigh Valley Phantoms" komandu izcīnīja uzvaru Amerikas Hokeja līgas (AHL) izslēgšanas turnīra jeb Kaldera kausa izcīņas mačā.
title_translated: Apple's victory in the Calder Cup game
description_translated: Latvian striker Rodrigo Apple won the American Hockey League (AHL) elimination tournament or Calder Cup match with Alentauna's Lehigh Valley Phantoms.

title: Esi pavārmākslas karaliene - sāc ar cūkgaļu!
description: Vai Tev patīk gatavot sātīgas maltītes, kas mielo gan vēderu, gan sirdi? Cūkgaļa jau izsenis ir bijusi viena no pamata sastāvdaļām Latvijas virtuvē. To vari izmantot gan ikdienas vakariņām, gan svētku galdam. Šajā rakstā Tu uzzināsi, kāpēc vērts izvēlēties tieši šo gaļu, kādas iespējas tā sniedz un kā to vislabāk iekļaut savā ēdienkartē.
title_translated: Be the Queen of Cooking - Start with pork!
description_translated: Do you like to cook rich meals that feast on both your stomach and your heart? Pork has long been one of the basic ingredients in the Latvian cuisine. You can use it for your daily dinner and the festive table. In this article, you will find out why it is worth choosing exactly this meat, what options it provides and how to best include it in your menu.

title: Mazdārziņi Rīgā ļoti pieprasīti, tomēr ne visur valda kārtība
description: Mazdārziņi kļūst aizvien pieprasītāki, un Rīgas teritorijā brīvu vietu vairs nav. Iedzīvotāji izmanto iespēju iedēstīt kādu gurķi, kartupeļus vai izaudzēt savus ķiplokus. Tomēr ne visur mazdārziņu teritorijas ir sakoptas un perfektā kārtībā. Cilvēki novērojuši, ka īpaši liela nekārtība valda Bolderājas mazdārziņu teritorijās un Jaunciema gatvē.
title_translated: The small gardens in Riga are highly sought after, but not everywhere there is order
description_translated: Small gardens are becoming more and more demanded and there are no free places in the territory of Riga. Citizens take the opportunity to plant a cucumber, potatoes or grow their garlic. However, not everywhere in small garden areas are cleaned and perfect. People have noticed that there is a particularly high disorder in Bolderaja's small garden areas and Jaunciema gatve.

title: Vācijā kancleru maiņa – Šolcs atvadās, vietā stāsies Mercs
description: Sociāldemokrātus pārstāvošais Vācijas federālais kanclers Olafs Šolcs svinīgā ceremonijā atvadījies no sava amata. Jau otrdien par jauno valdības vadītāju kļūs Kristīgo demokrātu līderis Frīdrihs Mercs.
title_translated: Chancellor Changes in Germany - Sholc says goodbye to Mercs instead
description_translated: The German Federal Chancellor Olaf Sholz, representing the Social Democrats, said goodbye to his office at a solemn ceremony. Already on Tuesday, the leader of Christian Democrats, Friedrich Mercs, will become the new head of government.

title: Video ⟩ Balinskis gūst savus pirmos vārtus Stenlija kausa izcīņā
description: Latvijas aizsargs Uvis Jānis Balinskis pirmdien guva savus pirmos vārtus Nacionālās hokeja līgas (NHL) Stenlija kausa izcīņā, viņa pārstāvētajai Floridas "Panthers" komandai otro kārtu sākot ar zaudējumu.
title_translated: Video⟩ Balinsky scores his first goal in the Stanley Cup
description_translated: Latvian guard Uvis Jānis Balinskis scored his first goal on Monday in the National Hockey League (NHL) Stanley Cup, with his second round of the Florida Panthers.

title: Latvijas četru lielāko banku klientiem pirmajā ceturksnī izkrāpti kopumā 2,564 miljoni eiro
description: Latvijas četru lielāko banku klientiem, pašiem apstiprinot maksājumus, šogad pirmajos trijos mēnešos izkrāpti kopumā 2,564 miljoni eiro, liecina Finanšu nozares asociācijas (FNA) publiskotie dati.
title_translated: In the first quarter of Latvia's four largest banks, a total of EUR 2.564 million was scammed in the first quarter
description_translated: In the first three months of this year, the four largest bank customers of Latvia have been scoured of a total of EUR 2.564 million, according to data released by the Financial Industry Association (FNA).

title: Īstajā dzīvē viņam ir pat divi ieroči! "Nelūgto viesu" zvaigzne Niklāvs Kurpnieks par Tirsu, medībām un dzimtenes mīlestību
description: Tauta soctīklos jau pošas vākt parakstus, lai seriāls Nelūgtie viesi turpinātos! Ļaužu tik iemīļotā varoņa Oskara Tirsas atveidotājs aktieris Niklāvs Kurpnieks intervijā žurnālam "Kas Jauns" atzīst, ka arī viņam drusciņ žēl, ka seriāla ēra līdz ar trešās sezonas pēdējo sēriju ir beigusies.
title_translated: He even has two weapons in real life! "Uninvent Guest" star Niklav Kurpnieks for tirs, hunting and homeland love
description_translated: The people are already collecting signatures on social networks to keep the uninvited guests from the series! Actor Niklāvs Kurpnieks, who is so favorite hero, Oscar Tirsas, admits in an interview with the magazine "What's New" that he is also sorry that the series era is over with the last series of the third season.

title: Ukrainas armija turpina operācijas Kurskas apgabalā

title: "Dzemde un olvadi jau bija sākuši pūt..." Kādas komplikācijas var būt ķeizargriezienam, cik drošs tas īstenībā ir?
description: Ne vienu vien nesen pārsteidza un pat šokēja kādas sievietes smagais stāsts par piedzīvoto Ogres rajona slimnīcā. Pēc ķeizargrieziena viņas organismā attīstījās abscess – slēgta, ar strutām pildīta vieta vēdera dobumā, kas plīsa. Rezultātā sāka pūt dzemde un olvadi...
title_translated: "The uterus and the fallopian tubes had already started to blow ..." What complications can be for a caesarean section, how safe it is?
description_translated: More than one recently surprised and even shocked by a woman's heavy story about experienced at the Ogre District Hospital. After a caesarean section, the abscess developed in her body - a closed, purulent filled area of ​​the abdominal cavity, which ruptures. As a result, the uterus and the fallopian tubes began ...

title: Kāpēc labāk izvēlēties sardīnes un skumbriju nekā tunci un lasi: skaidro dietologi
description: Kad runa ir par jūras veltēm, visu uzmanību parasti saņem lielās zivis - tuncis, lasis, menca, foreles un tā tālāk. Tieši tās visbiežāk redzamas restorānu ēdienkartēs, tomēr mazās zivis - sardīnes, anšovi, skumbrijas un siļķes - ir pelnījušas ne mazāku atzinību, raksta "Real Simple".
title_translated: Why better choose sardines and mackerel than tuna and read: explain nutritionists
description_translated: When it comes to seafood, big fish - tuna, salmon, cod, trout and so on - are usually paid attention. They are most often visible in restaurant menus, but small fish - sardines, anchovies, mackerel and herring - deserve no less recognition, writes Real Simple.

title: Ukraina netic Krievijas vienpersoniski izsludinātajam pamieram ap 9. maiju, gatavojas provokācijām
description: Ukraina netic Krievijas vienpersoniski izsludinātajam pamieram ap 9. maiju un gatavojas iespējamām provokācijām no agresorvalsts puses. Abas valstis pēdējo dienu laikā arī turpina uzbrukumus viena otrai – Krievija tradicionāli izmanto kaujas dronus un raķetes uzbrukumiem Ukrainas pilsētām un apdzīvotām vietām, savukārt ukraiņi turpina dronu uzbrukumus Krievijas militārās infrastruktūras objektiem vai ražotnēm, kas apgādā armiju ar karam nepieciešamo.
title_translated: Ukraine does not believe in Russia's single ceasefire around 9 May, preparing for provocations
description_translated: Ukraine does not believe in Russia's one -person ceasefire around 9 May and is preparing for possible provocations on the part of the aggressor. Both countries have also continued their attacks on each other in recent days - Russia has traditionally used combat drones and rocket attacks on Ukrainian cities and populated areas, while Ukrainians continue to attack drone attacks on Russian military infrastructure objects or production facilities supplying the army with war.

description: Anemones ir viena no skaistākajām pavasara puķēm, kas dārzos veido krāsainus paklājus. Šie viegli kopjamie augi ar savu ziedēšanu piešķir dārzam dzīvotspēju un krāsu, radot patiesu pavasara burvību.

title_translated: Swedish rapper Bladee will perform in Riga

title: Eiropas aviokompānijas arvien retāk lido uz Āziju – tas ir neizdevīgi Krievijas gaisa telpas izmantošanas lieguma dēļ
description: Eiropas lidsabiedrības brīdina, ka tām var nākties pilnībā pārtraukt lidojumus uz Āziju. Iemesls tam ir jau trīs gadus spēkā esošais aizliegums izmantot agresorvalsts Krievijas gaisa telpu. Esošo situāciju savā labā izmanto Ķīnas aviokompānijas, kuru lidmašīnas joprojām brīvi šķērso Krievijas teritoriju, tādējādi nodrošinot sev priekšrocības attiecībā pret konkurentiem Eiropā.
title_translated: European airlines are increasingly flying to Asia - this is disadvantageous due to the use of Russian airspace due to the use
description_translated: European airlines warn that they may have to completely stop flights to Asia. The reason for this is the ban for three years in force to use the Russian airspace of aggressor. The current situation is used for its advantage of Chinese airlines, whose aircraft are still freely crossed by Russian territory, thus providing its advantages over competitors in Europe.

Izskanējuši arī dažādi pieņēmumi un spekulācijas par iespējamu Kijivas triecienu.

description_translated: Ukrainian President Volodimir Zelensky has rejected the 72 -hour ceasefire offered by Russian leader Vladimir Putin and replied that he could not guarantee security in Moscow during the May 9 celebration. There have also been various assumptions and speculation about a possible shock.

title_translated: 66 years together: Evald and Anna's love has overcome all the time tests
description_translated: On April 25, Evalds and Anna Skrijas celebrated the wedding 66th anniversary. So many time tests have been held in their lifetime, but the senior relationship still remains warm and love, despite the fact that Evald is already 101st, but Anna is 92 years old.

title_translated: 80 years after the end of World War II continues to look for fallen German soldiers
description_translated: The Western world today celebrates the 80th anniversary of the end of World War II. However, even after such a long period of time, the search for the remains of fallen German and other soldiers will continue to recognize and dispose of them with dignity.

title: Tukuma novadā konstatēts šogad pirmais Āfrikas cūku mēra uzliesmojums mājas cūku novietnē
description: Tukuma novada Džūkstes pagastā, nelielā piemājas saimniecībā ar 36 cūkām, konstatēts Āfrikas cūku mēra (ĀCM) uzliesmojums. Tas ir pirmais šogad konstatētais ĀCM gadījums mājas cūku novietnēs Latvijā, informēja Pārtikas un veterinārajā dienestā (PVD).
title_translated: The first outbreak of African swine fever in Tukums district has been found in a home pig shed
description_translated: The outbreak of African swine fever (ASF) was found in a small backyard farm in Dzukste parish of Tukums district. This is the first case of ASF this year in domestic pigs in Latvia, informed the Food and Veterinary Service (FVS).

description_translated: The car used in the Old Town watch shop's robbery was equipped with license plates that had been stolen from another car a few weeks ago in Riga, Armands Ruk, the head of the State Police, revealed in an interview with TV3's "900 Seconds".

title: Policija jau konstatējusi atsevišķus pārkāpumus saistībā ar 9. maiju
description: Policija jau konstatējusi atsevišķus pārkāpumus saistībā ar 9. maiju, intervijā Latvijas Radio sacīja Valsts policijas priekšnieks Armands Ruks.
title_translated: Police have already detected some violations in connection with May 9
description_translated: Police have already detected some violations of May 9, said Armands Ruks, Chief of the State Police in an interview with Latvian Radio.

title: Meksika vēršas tiesā pret «Google» par Amerikas līča nosaukumu
description: Meksikas valdība vērsusies tiesā pret "Google" jautājumā par Meksikas līča pārdēvēšanu par Amerikas līci. Meksika nav apmierināta, ka "Google" kartēs ASV lietotāji redz nosaukumu Amerikas līcis.
title_translated: Mexico turns to court against Google for the name of the Gulf of America
description_translated: The Mexican government has filed a court against Google for renaming the Gulf of Mexico as the Gulf of America. Mexico is not satisfied that on Google's maps, US users see the name of America.

title: Pakistāna sākusi vērienīgu militāru ofensīvu pret Indiju
title_translated: Pakistan has begun an ambitious military offensive against India

title: Vācijas labākā basketboliste nespēlēs Eiropas čempionātā
description: "Phoenix Mercury" uzbrucēja Satū Sabali (Satou Sabally) nespēlēs "Women`s EuroBasket 2025" finālturnīrā, Vācijas spēlētāja ceturtdien, 8. maijā, pavēstīja sarunā ar mediju pārstāvjiem.
title_translated: Germany's best basketball player will not play at the European Championship
description_translated: Phoenix Mercury will not play in the Women's EuroBasket 2025 final, a German player on Thursday, May 8, said in a conversation with media.

title: Šilovs izcīna "sauso" uzvaru un iekļūst Kaldera kausa trešajā kārtā; Ābolam vārti un gaidāma izšķirošā cīņa
description: Latvijas vārtsargs Artūrs Šilovs piektdien palīdzēja Ebotsfordas "Canucks" komandai izcīnīt "sauso" uzvaru un sasniegt Amerikas Hokeja līgas (AHL) izslēgšanas turnīra jeb Kaldera kausa izcīņas trešo kārtu.
title_translated: Shilov wins a "dry" victory and enters the third round of the Calder Cup; Apple gates and a decisive battle expected
description_translated: Latvian goalkeeper Arthur Shilov on Friday helped Ebotsford Canucks win the "dry" victory and reach the third round of the American Hockey League (AHL) elimination tournament or Calder Cup.

title: Sarežģītos drošības apstākļos Kijivā pulcējas Eiropas līderi
description: Kijivā sestdien, 10. maijā, ieradies Francijas prezidents Emanuels Makrons, Polijas premjers Donalds Tusks, Lielbritānijas premjers Kīrs Stārmers un Vācijas kanclers Frīdrihs Mercs, lai klātienē piedalītos tā dēvētās labas gribas koalīcijas valstu sanāksmē. Tik augsta līmeņa viesu vienlaicīga ierašanās Kijivā sen nav bijusi, un šī tikšanās notiek ļoti sarežģītos drošības apstākļos.
title_translated: In difficult security, European leaders gather in Kijiv
description_translated: On Saturday, May 10, French President Emmanuel Macron, Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk, British Prime Minister Kyr Kyr Starmer and German Chancellor Friedrich Mercs arrived to attend the so -called goodwill of the coalition. The simultaneous arrival of such a high level of guests in Kijiv has long been, and this meeting takes place in very difficult safety conditions.

title: Ukrainas un Eiropas līderi vienojas par bezierunu 30 dienu pamieru no 12. maija
description: Ukrainas un Eiropas līderi sestdien Kijivā vienojās par beznosacījumu 30 dienu pamieru no 12. maija, ko atbalstīja ASV prezidents Donalds Tramps, piedraudot Krievijas līderim Vladimiram Putinam ar jaunām "milzīgām" sankcijām, ja viņš to neievēros. Par to paziņoja Lielbritānijas, Francijas, Vācijas, Polijas un Ukrainas līderi pēc tikšanās Kijivā, kuras laikā viņi telefonsarunājās ar Trampu.
title_translated: Ukraine and European leaders agree on an unconditional 30 -day ceasefire from May 12
description_translated: Ukraine and European leaders on Saturday in Kiev agreed on an unconditional 30 -day ceasefire from May 12, supported by US President Donald Trump, threatening Russian leader Vladimir Putin with new "huge" sanctions if he did not respect it. This was announced by leaders in the UK, France, Germany, Poland and Ukraine after a meeting in Kiev, during which they talked to Trump.

title: Video ⟩ Šilovam "sausā" uzvara AHL "play-off" mačā; Ābols gūst vārtus zaudējumā
description: Latvijas vārtsargs Artūrs Šilovs piektdien palīdzēja Ebotsfordas "Canucks" komandai izcīnīt "sauso" uzvaru un sasniegt Amerikas Hokeja līgas (AHL) izslēgšanas turnīra jeb Kaldera kausa izcīņas trešo kārtu.
title_translated: Video⟩ Shilov "Dry" victory in the AHL play-off match; Apple scores the gate in the loss
description_translated: Latvian goalkeeper Arthur Shilov on Friday helped Ebotsford Canucks win the "dry" victory and reach the third round of the American Hockey League (AHL) elimination tournament or Calder Cup.

title: Cenu kritums turpinās – degviela Baltijā kļūst lētāka
description: Pagājušajā darba nedēļā Baltijas valstu galvaspilsētās samazinājās degvielas cenas, liecina aģentūras LETA apkopotie dati.
title_translated: Price fall continues - fuel in the Baltics becomes cheaper
description_translated: Fuel prices fell in the capitals of the Baltic States last week, according to data compiled by LETA.

title: Mātes dienā
description: Trīs receptes, ko pagatavot pusdienās mīļajām mammām.
title_translated: On Mother's Day
description_translated: Three recipes to make for lunch for dear moms.

title: Dārziņš par skaitlisko vairākumu: Būsim draudīgi no dažādām pozīcijām
description: Latvijas hokeja izlases vairākums ir trenēts un ir dažādi tā izspēles varianti, kuri būtu jārealizē, sarunā ar aģentūru LETA pirms pasaules čempionāta pirmās spēles pret Franciju sacīja valstsvienības treneris Lauris Dārziņš.
title_translated: Dārziņš on the numerical majority: let's be threatening from different positions
description_translated: The majority of the Latvian hockey team has been trained and there are different variants of play that should be realized, said Lauris Dārziņš, a national team coach, in a conversation with LETA before the first game of the World Cup against France.

title: Zinātnieki noskaidrojuši, kādās ģimenēs visbiežāk izaug ģēniji: būsi pārsteigts!
description: Intuitīvi šķiet, ka bērna intelektuālā un radošā attīstība vislabāk norit mīlošā un gādīgā ģimenē. Tomēr jaunais pētījums atklāj, ka tā ne vienmēr ir, raksta zinātniskais vēstnesis "The Conversation".
title_translated: Scientists have found out which families are most commonly grown in geniuses: you will be surprised!
description_translated: Intuitively, the child's intellectual and creative development seems to be the best in a loving and caring family. However, the new study reveals that this is not always the case, writes the scientific messenger "The Conversation".

title: Stāv kails uz jumta un skatās prom... Kas ir šis noslēpumainais tēls, kas vēro Kuldīgu?
title_translated: Standing naked on the roof and looking away ... What is this mysterious image watching Kuldiga?

title: VIDEO: pamests ciems Latvijā turpina piesaistīt ziņkārīgos
description: Stirnu ciems, kas atrodas Dobeles novadā, Latvijas vidienē ir viens no daudzajiem ciemiem, kas piedzīvojis iedzīvotāju aizplūšanu un ir gandrīz pilnībā pamests, bet tajā joprojām ir saglabājušies daži vēsturiskie objekti.
title_translated: Video: An abandoned village in Latvia continues to attract curious
description_translated: The village of Stirnu, located in Dobele County, is one of the many villages in the middle of Latvia who has experienced the outflow of the population and is almost completely abandoned, but there are still some historical objects.

title: Vai bažas piepildījās? Gads pēc latviešu un mazākumtautību skolas apvienošanās Jūrmalā
description: Pērn Jūrmalā tika reorganizētas Jaundubultu pamatskola un Pumpuru vidusskola, rezultātā izveidojot vienu Jūrmalas valstspilsētas Pumpuru vidusskolu. Ir pagājis gads kopš reorganizācijas un portāls "Delfi" atgriežas pie Jūrmalas skolu stāsta, lai apskatītu, kā notikusi apvienošanās.
title_translated: Did the concern come true? Year after the merger of the Latvian and minority school in Jurmala
description_translated: Last year, Jaundubulti Elementary School and Pumpuri Secondary School were reorganized in Jurmala, resulting in a single Jurmala National Pumps Secondary School. A year has passed since the reorganization and the Delfi portal returns to the Jurmala school story to see how the merger has happened.

title: Latvijas hokejisti pasaules čempionātā tiekas ar zvaigžņoto Kanādas izlasi
description: Latvijas vīriešu hokeja izlase šodien Stokholmā pasaules čempionāta otrajā spēlē tiksies ar vienu no galvenajām favorītēm Kanādas valstsvienību.
title_translated: Latvian hockey players meet with the Star Canadian team at the World Cup
description_translated: The Latvian men's hockey team will meet one of the top favorites in the second game of the World Cup in Stockholm today.

title: Arī svētdien saule mīsies ar mākoņiem
description: Nedēļas pēdējā dienā Latvijas debesis brīžiem aizklās mākoņi, bet brīžiem tie izklīdīs un spīdēs saule, prognozē Latvijas Vides, ģeoloģijas un meteoroloģijas centrs.
title_translated: Also on Sunday the sun will be with clouds
description_translated: On the last day of the week, the Latvian sky will occasionally cover the clouds, but at times they will scatter and shine, predicts the Latvian Center for Environment, Geology and Meteorology.

title: Vītoliņš: Lūzuma brīdis bija mazākumā gūtie vārti
description: Izšķirošais brīdis pasaules čempionāta pirmajā spēlē pret Francijas valstsvienību bija mazākumā gūtie vārti, sarunā ar masu medijiem sestdien sacīja Latvijas hokeja izlases galvenais treneris Harijs Vītoliņš.
title_translated: Vitolins: The moment of fracture was a minority gate
description_translated: The decisive moment in the first game of the World Cup against the French national team was a minor goal, said Harry Vitolins, head coach of the Latvian hockey team in a conversation with the media on Saturday.

title: Putins aicina Ukrainu uz «tiešām sarunām»
description: Krievijas diktators Vladimirs Putins uzaicinājis Ukrainu piedalīties "tiešās sarunās" 15.maijā, dažas stundas pēc tam, kad Eiropas un ASV līderi mudināja Maskavu izsludināt 30 dienu beznosacījuma uguns pārtraukšanu, vēsta BBC.
title_translated: Putin calls Ukraine to «Really Talk»
description_translated: Russian dictator Vladimir Putin has invited Ukraine to participate in "direct talks" on May 15, a few hours after European and US leaders urged Moscow to announce a 30 -day unconditional cessation of fire, the BBC reports.

title: Porziņģis spēlē piesardzīgā režīmā Celtics uzvarā Ņujorkā
description: Latvijas basketbolists Kristaps Porziņģis, turpinot atlabt no saslimšanas, sestdien Nacionālās basketbola asociācijas (NBA) izslēgšanas spēļu otrās kārtas trešajā mačā guva piecus punktus un bloķēja trīs metienus, kamēr Bostonas "Celtics" izcīnīja pirmo uzvaru šajā sērijā.
title_translated: Porzģis plays in a cautious mode in the Celtics victory in New York
description_translated: Latvian basketball player Kristaps Porziņģis continued to recover from the illness on Saturday in the third round of the National Basketball Association (NBA) playoffs in the third round of the playoffs and blocked three shots, while the Boston Celtics won their first victory in the series.

title: "Nereāla sajūta, kad pasaulē ienāk jauna dzīvība!" intervija ar Gada vecmāti Kristu Kristiānu Zēbergu no Ventspils
description: Šogad Ārstu biedrības organizētajā ceremonijā “Gada balva medicīnā” Gada vecmātes titulu ieguvusi ventspilniece Krista Kristiāna Zēberga (24), kura šajā profesijā Ziemeļkurzemes reģionālās slimnīcas Dzemdību nodaļā nostrādājusi vien divus gadus.
title_translated: "An unrealistic feeling when a new life comes into the world!" Interview with Midwife Christian Christian Zeberg from Ventspils
description_translated: This year, Ventsa Kristian Zeberga (24), a midwife of the Medical Award of the Year "Medica", has won the title of Annual Medical Award, who has only worked in the Obstetrics Department of the North Kurzeme Regional Hospital for only two years.

title: "Mana ģimene ir kopā": Galkins sociālajos tīklos ievietojis aizkustinošu Pugačovas fotogrāfiju ar Orbakaiti, Ļizu un Gariju
description: Kiprā aizvadīts Allas Pugačovas meitas Kristīnas Orbakaites koncerts. Viņu atbalstīt bija devusies arī Alla kopā ar dzīvesbiedru un šovmeni Maksimu Galkinu, kā arī abu kopīgajiem bērniem - Gariju un Ļizu.
title_translated: "My family is together": Galkin posted a touching photo of Pugachova with Orbakaite, Liza and Garry
description_translated: The concert of Alla Pugachova's daughter Kristina Orbakaite was held in Cyprus. Alla had also gone to support her with her spouse and show Maxim Galkin, as well as both common children - Garry and Liza.

title: Pacers nonāk vienas uzvaras attālumā no NBA izslēgšanas spēļu trešās kārtas
description: Indiānas "Pacers" svētdien nonāca viena panākuma attālumā no iekļūšanas Nacionālās basketbola asociācojas (NBA) izslēgšanas spēļu trešajā kārtā.
title_translated: Pacer comes one victory away from the third round of NBA playoff games
description_translated: The Indian "Pacers" on Sunday came one success from entering the National Basketball Association in the third round of (NBA) playoffs.

title: Ministrs: Sociālie darbinieki strādā uz izdegšanas robežas
description: Sociālie darbinieki strādā uz izdegšanas robežas, intervijā Latvijas Televīzijas raidījumā "Rīta panorāma" sacīja labklājības ministrs Reinis Uzulnieks (ZZS).
title_translated: Minister: Social workers are working on the scope of burnout
description_translated: Social workers work on the verge of burnout, Welfare Minister Reinis Uzulnieks (ZZS) said in an interview on Latvian Television "Morning Panorama".

title: Video ⟩ "Panthers" bez Balinska izcīna "sauso" uzvaru Stenlija kausa mačā
description: Floridas "Panthers", ārpus pieteikuma mačam atstājot Latvijas aizsargu Uvi Balinski, svētdien Nacionālās hokeja līgas (NHL) Stenlija kausa izcīņas otrās kārtas ceturtajā mačā izcīnīja panākumu un sērijā panāca neizšķirtu.
title_translated: Video⟩ "Panthers" Without Balinsky Winning "Dry" victory in the Stanley Cup match
description_translated: Florida's Panthers, leaving Latvian guard Uvi Balinski out of the application, on Sunday in the fourth round of the National Hockey League (NHL) Stanley Cup in the fourth round of the match and won the tie in the series.

title: Starp vislabāk atalgotajiem amatiem Lielbritānijā – piloti, ārsti un skolu direktori
description: "Euronews" ir izpētījis 40 vislabāk un viszemāk apmaksātos darbus Apvienotajā Karalistē, pamatojoties uz pagājušā gada datiem. Starp 10 visaugstāk atalgotajiem amatiem ir arī piloti, ārsti un skolu direktori.
title_translated: Among the best paid posts in the UK - pilots, doctors and school principals
description_translated: Euronews has studied the 40 best and lowest paid jobs in the UK based on last year's data. Among the 10 highest paid positions are pilots, doctors and school principals.

title: Atkritumu liga Latvijā – vecās riepas pamanās atnest pat uz kapsētām
description: Pavasarī cilvēki arvien biežāk dodas dabā, tomēr patīkamu atpūtu nereti sabojā nepatīkams skats – izgāzti būvgruži, automašīnu riepas, mēbeles. Valsts vides dienestā (VVD) norādīja, ka pieaudzis ziņojumu skaits mobilajā aplikācijā "Vides SOS". Negodprātīgi ļaudis atkritumus mēdz atnest pat uz kapsētām, kur sāk uzstādīt videonovērošanas kameras pārkāpēju fiksēšanai.
title_translated: Garbage league in Latvia - old tires are noticed even to cemetery
description_translated: In the spring, people are increasingly going out in nature, but a pleasant rest is often damaged by an unpleasant view - dumped debris, car tires, furniture. The State Environmental Service (VVD) stated that the number of messages in the mobile application "Environmental SOS" has increased. Unscrupulous people tend to bring waste even to the cemetery, where the video surveillance camera is set to fix the offenders.

title: Vēl meklē pārstāvjus iedzīvotāju padomei
description: Alūksnes novadā iedzīvotāju padome vēl nav izveidota, taču process ir sācies. Plānots, ka novadā darbosies viena kopēja padome, kurā katru pagastu un pilsētu pārstāvēs viens pārstāvis. Aprīļa sākumā izsludināja kandidātu pieteikšanos, taču atsaucība nebija pietiekoša un no katras teritorijas nebija...
title_translated: Still looking for representatives to the Population Council
description_translated: The Population Council has not yet been established in Aluksne County, but the process has begun. It is planned that one joint council will be operating in the county, where each parish and the city will be represented by one representative. At the beginning of April, candidates were announced, but the response was not enough and there was no ...

title: Ukraina: Krievijas dzīvā spēka zaudējumi sasniedz 967 060
description: Krievijas karaspēka dzīvā spēka zaudējumi Ukrainā līdz pirmdienas rītam sasnieguši 967 060 karavīrus, ziņo Ukrainas armijas ģenerālštābs.
title_translated: Ukraine: The loss of Russia's live power reaches 967 060
description_translated: The loss of Russian troops in Ukraine has reached 967,060 soldiers in Ukraine by Monday morning, the Ukrainian army's General Staff reports.

title: “Pūķa lietošanas instrukcija” ir klāt! “Prāta Vētra” atklāj savu 13. albumu un jauno videoklipu
description: 12. maijā “Prāta Vētra” prezentē ilgi gaidīto jauno albumu “Pūķa lietošanas instrukcija”. Albuma pirmajam singlam “Pirmajā dienā” seko nākamais - “Gribēju būt rokstārs”, kas dzirdams radiostacijās un populārākajos straumēšanas servisos, kā arī vinilā un CD. “Rokstārs” ticis arī pie videoklipa Kaspara Rogas režijā, Prāta Vētras un Kārļa Arnolda Avota izpildījumā.
title_translated: The "Dragon's Use Instruction" is here! Brainstorming reveals its 13th album and new video
description_translated: On May 12, Brainstorming will present the long -awaited new album, "The Dragon's Use Instruction". The first single on the album "On the first day" is followed by the next one - "I wanted to be a rocket", which is heard on radio stations and the most popular streaming services, as well as vinyl and CD. "Rockstone" has also been a video directed by Kaspar Rog, performed by Brainstorm and Karl Arnolds Avota.

title: "Panthers" bez Balinska panāk izlīdzinājumu sērijā pret "Maple Leafs"
description: Floridas "Panthers", ārpus pieteikuma mačam atstājot Latvijas aizsargu Uvi Balinski, svētdien Nacionālās hokeja līgas (NHL) Stenlija kausa izcīņas otrās kārtas ceturtajā mačā izcīnīja panākumu un sērijā panāca neizšķirtu.
title_translated: "Panthers" without Balinsky's leveling in the series against "Maple Leafs"
description_translated: Florida's Panthers, leaving Latvian guard Uvi Balinski out of the application, on Sunday in the fourth round of the National Hockey League (NHL) Stanley Cup in the fourth round of the match and won the tie in the series.

title: Robežsargi novērsuši 65 cilvēku mēģinājumus šķērsot Latvijas robežu ar Baltkrieviju
description: Pirmdien, 12. maijā, Valsts robežsardzes amatpersonas novērsušas 65 cilvēku mēģinājumus nelikumīgi šķērsot Latvijas-Baltkrievijas valsts robežu, portālu "Delfi" informēja Valsts robežsardzē.
title_translated: Border guards have eliminated 65 people's attempts to cross Latvia's border with Belarus
description_translated: On Monday, May 12, officials of the State Border Guard have prevented 65 people from crossing the Latvian-Belarusian state border illegally, Delfi informed the State Border Guard.

title: Atkal pieaug spriedze uz robežas – dienas laikā aptur 65 nelegālos migrantus
description: Pirmdien, 12. maijā, Valsts robežsardzes amatpersonas novērsušas 65 cilvēku mēģinājumus nelikumīgi šķērsot Latvijas-Baltkrievijas valsts robežu, portālu "Delfi" informēja Valsts robežsardzē.
title_translated: Tension on the border is growing again - 65 illegal migrants stop during the day
description_translated: On Monday, May 12, officials of the State Border Guard have prevented 65 people from crossing the Latvian-Belarusian state border illegally, Delfi informed the State Border Guard.

title: Bundestāga deputāts: Putins var uzbrukt Rietumiem ātrāk, nekā pieļauts
description: Krievijas Federācija, iespējams, negaidīs 4–5 gadus, lai veiktu militāru uzbrukumu Rietumvalstīm, ziņo Ukrainas ziņu aģentūra UNIAN.
title_translated: Bundestag MEP: Putin can attack the West faster than tolerated
description_translated: The Russian Federation may not wait 4-5 years to conduct a military attack on the West, Ukrainian news agency UNIAN reports.

title: Ravinskis ieskicē Latvijas izlases uzdevumus cīņā pret Slovēniju
description: Lai pieveiktu Slovēnijas izlasi gaidāmajā pasaules hokeja čempionāta spēlē, Latvijas valstsvienībai jāpadara savs darbs un jārealizē savi vārtu gūšanas momenti, sarunā ar aģentūru LETA pirms turnīra trešās spēles norādīja uzbrucējs Anrī Ravinskis.
title_translated: Ravinsky outlines the tasks of Latvia's national team in the fight against Slovenia
description_translated: In order to defeat the Slovenian national team in the upcoming World Hockey Championship game, the Latvian national team must do its own work and carry out their goals, striker Henri Ravinskis said in a conversation with LETA before the tournament.

title: 1,8% varbūtība. Dalasas "Mavericks" apbrīnojama veiksme ļauj tikt pie NBA drafta pirmās izvēles
description: Nacionālās basketbola asociācijas (NBA) ) šī gada jauno spēlētāju drafta pirmās izvēles tiesības ieguvusi Dalasas "Mavericks" vienība, noskaidrojās pirmdien notikušajā loterijā.
title_translated: 1.8% probability. Dallas "Mavericks" amazing success allows you to get NBA draft first choice
description_translated: The National Basketball Association's (NBA) draft new player drafted this year's first choice has been the Dallas Mavericks, found out in the lottery on Monday.

title: Būtu muļķīgi nepieņemt Kataras dāvināto lidmašīnu, paziņo Tramps
description: ASV prezidents Donalds Tramps pirmdien noraidīja bažas par saviem plāniem pieņemt dāvanā no Kataras lidmašīnu, kas tiks izmantota kā prezidenta lidmašīna "Air Force One", sakot, ka šādu dāvanu nepieņemt būtu muļķīgi.
title_translated: It would be foolish not to accept Qatar's donated airplane, Trump announces
description_translated: US President Donald Trump on Monday rejected concerns about his plans to take a gift from Qatar's aircraft, which will be used as a presidential aircraft Air Force One, saying not to accept such a gift.

title: Video ⟩ "Oilers" un "Hurricanes" nonāk uzvaras attālumā no iekļūšanas Stenlija kausa izcīņas nākamajā kārtā
description: Karolīnas "Hurricanes" un Edmontonas "Oilers" pirmdien nonāca vienas uzvaras attālumā no iekļūšanas Nacionālās hokeja līgas (NHL) Stenlija kausa izcīņas trešajā kārtā.
title_translated: Video⟩ "Oilers" and "Hurricanes" run away from the next round of the Stanley Cup
description_translated: Carolina's Hurricanes and the Edmonton Oilers came one victory away from entering the National Hockey League (NHL) Stanley Cup in the third round on Monday.

title: Eiropas eksāmens pulcē gandrīz 44 tūkstošus dalībnieku – 5% iegūst maksimālo punktu skaitu
description: Atzīmējot Eiropas dienu, jau 11 gadu pēc kārtas Latvijā notika Eiropas eksāmens – zināšanu un izpratnes pārbaudes tests.
title_translated: The European Exam gathers nearly 44 thousand participants - 5% get the maximum score
description_translated: Celebrating Europe Day, for the 11th consecutive year, the European Exam - a Knowledge and Understanding Testing Test - took place in Latvia.

title: MH17: ANO aģentūra atzīst, ka par katastrofu 2014. gadā atbildīga Krievija
description: ANO aviācijas aģentūra pirmdien paziņoja, ka Krievija ir atbildīga par Malaizijas pasažieru lidmašīnas notriekšanu Donbasā 2014. gadā, nogalinot 298 cilvēkus.
title_translated: MH17: The UN Agency recognizes that Russia is responsible for the disaster in 2014
description_translated: The UN Aviation Agency on Monday announced that Russia was responsible for killing a Malaysian passenger plane in Donbass 2014, killing 298 people.

title: Uģis Mitrevics: Tauta skrien, bet valsts bremzē
description: Fiziskas aktivitātes nav tikai sports – tās ir arī veselības pamats. Aktīvs, sportisks dzīvesveids stiprina ķermeni un līdzsvaro prātu. Taču Latvijā šo vienkāršo patiesību par tautas sportu atbildīgā iestāde Izglītības un zinātnes ministrija (IZM) pauž tikai vārdos un preses relīzēs, bet praksē jau otro gadu tiek būtiski un nepamatoti aizkavēta līdzekļu piešķiršana. Atbalsts tautas sportam un fiziskajām aktivitātēm joprojām ir neregulārs, sadrumstalots un nepietiekams. Rezultāts – biedējošs.
title_translated: Uģis Mitrevics: The people are running but the state is braking
description_translated: Physical activity is not just a sport - it is also the basis of health. Active, athletic lifestyle strengthens the body and balances the mind. However, in Latvia, the Ministry of Education and Science (MoES) is responsible for this simple truth about the sport of sports only in words and press releases, but in practice, for the second year running, the allocation of funds is significantly and unjustifiably delayed. Support for folk sports and physical activity is still irregular, fragmented and insufficient. The result is scary.

title: No 2030. gada Saeimas vēlēšanās drīkstēt startēt partijas ar vismaz 1000 biedriem
description: Sākot ar 2030. gadu, startēt Saeimas vēlēšanās varēs partijas ar vismaz 1000 biedriem līdzšinējo 500 vietā, par to šodien vienojās Saeimas Valsts pārvaldes un pašvaldību komisijas deputāti, skatot grozījumus Saeimas vēlēšanu likumā.
title_translated: From the 2030s, the Saeima elections may be able to start parties with at least 1000 members
description_translated: Starting in the 2030s, parties with at least 1,000 members will be able to start in the Saeima elections instead of the previous 500, which was agreed today by members of the Saeima Public Administration and Local Government Commission, looking at amendments to the Saeima Election Law.

title: Pavasara salnu dēļ Zemgalē varētu samazināties ābolu un skābo ķiršu raža
description: Maija salnu dēļ Zemgalē varētu samazināties ābolu un skābo ķiršu raža, norāda biedrībā "Zemnieku saeima". Postījumi novēroti arī citviet, jo salnas lielu daļu reģionu skārušas augļkoku ziedēšanas sākumā un arī pilnziedā. Arī ogu audzētāji turpina naktīs laistīt dārzus un cer, ka postījumi nebūs lieli. Pagaidām salnās vairāk cietušas ogu platības Kurzemē.
title_translated: Spring frosts in Zemgale could drop apple and sour cherry harvest
description_translated: Apple and sour cherries could be reduced in Zemgale due to Maija's frost, according to the Society of Farmers. The damage has also been observed elsewhere, as frosts have affected a large part of the regions at the beginning of fruit tree flowering and also in full bloom. Berry growers also continue to water the gardens at night and hope the damage will not be large. For the time being, more berry areas in Kurzeme have suffered more frost.

title: "Sasodīts, brauc uz Stambulu": Lula cenšas pierunāt biedru Putinu

title_translated: "Damn, drive to Istanbul": Lula tries to persuade Member Putin
description_translated: Brazilian President Louis Inasiu Lula da Silva said he would try to talk to Russian dictator Vladimir Putin to convince him to go to Istanbul on May 15 and meet Ukrainian leader Volodimir Zelenski in direct talks.

title: Latvijā oficiāli sākusies peldsezona
description: Ceturtdien, 15. maijā, Latvijā oficiāli iesākusies peldsezona - tās laikā Veselības inspekcija (VI) regulāri kontrolēs ūdens kvalitāti oficiālajās peldvietās.
title_translated: In Latvia the officially started bathing season
description_translated: On Thursday, May 15, Latvia has officially launched a bathing season - during which the Health Inspectorate (VI) will regularly control the quality of water in official bathing areas.

description_translated: Russian dictator Vladimir Putin will not go to Ukrainian peace talks in Istanbul, the Kremlin confirmed on Wednesday.

title: Aizsardzības ministrija plāno veidot militāro vidusskolu Rēzeknes novada Maltā
description: Aizsardzības ministrija (AM) plāno veidot profesionālo vidusskolu ar militāru ievirzi Rēzeknes novada Maltā, lai stiprinātu jauniešu patriotisko audzināšanu un nodrošinātu militārās izglītības iespējas arī jauniešiem Latgalē, informēja AM.
title_translated: The Ministry of Defense plans to establish a military high school in Rezekne County in Malta
description_translated: The Ministry of Defense (MoD) plans to establish a vocational secondary school with a military orientation in Malta in Rezekne County to strengthen the patriotic upbringing of young people and to provide military education opportunities for young people in Latgale, informed the MoD.

description: Latvijas gaisa telpā par 56%, salīdzinoši ar attiecīgo periodu aizvadītajā gadā, pieauguši globālās satelītu navigācijas sistēmas traucējumi. Šogad pirmajos četros mēnešos fiksēti 399 šādi gadījumi.
title_translated: In Latvia, significantly increased disorders for navigation systems - they started with war in Ukraine
description_translated: In Latvian airspace by 56%, compared to the same period last year, the global satellite navigation system has increased. In the first four months of this year, 399 such cases were recorded.

title: Kataras aviokompānija pasūtījusi 160 Boeing lidmašīnas
description: Kataras aviokompānija "Qatar Airways" ir pasūtījusi 160 lidmašīnas no ASV aviobūvnieka "Boeing", trešdien paziņoja ASV prezidents Donalds Tramps, Kataras galvaspilsētā Dohā parakstot vairākus darījumus.

description_translated: Qatar's airline Qatar Airways has ordered 160 aircraft from US airline Boeing, US President Donald Trump said on Wednesday, signing several deals in Qatar's capital, Doha.

title_translated: Porzģis difficulty breathing; "Celtics" refuses to give up
description_translated: Latvian basketball player Kristaps Porziņģis played only in the first half on Wednesday and scored one point in the second round of the National Basketball Association (NBA) playoffs, where his Boston Celtics team won.

title: Ceturtdien valsts lielākajā daļā līs

title_translated: On Thursday in the majority of the country
description_translated: On Thursday, May 15, in most parts of Latvia, it will rain for a long time, with some heavy snow in the southeast of the country, the opticians predict.

title: Ministrs: Veselības resors valsts pārvaldes ietaupījumam neatdos nevienu centu
description: Valdība apņēmusies tuvākajos trīs gados samazināt valsts pārvaldes tēriņus par 450 miljoniem eiro, bet Veselības ministrija (VM) šim mērķim neupurēs nevienu centu. To Latvijas Televīzijas raidījumā "Rīta panorāma" sacīja veselības ministrs Hosams Abu Meri ("Jaunā Vienotība").
title_translated: Minister: The health department will not give any cent for the savings of public administration
description_translated: The government is committed to reducing public administration spending by EUR 450 million in the next three years, but the Ministry of Health (MoE) will not sacrifice any cents for this purpose. This was told by Health Minister Hosam Abu Meri ("New Unity") on Latvian Television's "Morning Panorama".

title: Jau naktī uz sestdienu Rīgā sāks kursēt nakts sabiedriskais transports
description: Naktī uz sestdienu, 17. maiju, Rīgā sāks kursēt nakts sabiedriskais transports, informēja SIA "Rīgas satiksme" Sabiedrisko attiecību daļas vadītāja Baiba Bartaševiča-Feldmane.
title_translated: Night public transport will start on Saturday night in Riga
description_translated: On the night of Saturday, May 17, night public transport will start running in Riga, informed Baiba Bartaševiča-Feldmane, Public Relations Department of SIA "Rīgas satiksme".

title: "Hurricanes" nosūta atvaļinājumā Ovečkinu un "Capitals", "Jets" pagarina sēriju
description: Nacionālajā hokeja līgā (NHL) aizvadītas divas Stenlija kausa izcīņas spēles. Karolīnas "Hurricanes" no turpmākās cīņas par Stenlija kausu izslēdza vienu no regulārā turnīra labākajām komandām Vašingtonas "Capitals" (4-1), savukārt Vinipegas "Jets" tika pie ļoti svarīgas uzvaras pret Dalasas "Stars" (sērijā 2-3).
title_translated: "Hurricanes" sends Ovechkin and "Capitals", "Jets" extends the series
description_translated: Two Stanley Cup games have been played in the National Hockey League (NHL). Carolina's Hurricanes excluded one of the best teams in the regular tournament for the Washington Capitals (4-1), while the Winnipeg Jets were a very important victory over Dallas Stars (series 2-3).

title: Kalnciema kvartāls izziņo vasaras ceturtdienu kultūras programmu; lielā atklāšana 22. maijā ar grupu “Dzeltenie pastnieki”
description: Rīdzinieku iemīļotā kultūras un satikšanās vieta Kalnciema kvartāls izziņo leģendāros ceturtdienu brīvdabas kultūras vakarus, kas aktīvi norisinās jau 15 gadus. Šogad pasākumu ciklu 22. maijā atklās grupas “Dzeltenie pastnieki” koncerts, savukārt skatuvi iesildīs DJ Uldis Rudaks. Ieeja pasākumos no plkst. 18.00 un bez maksas.
title_translated: Kalnciems Quarter announces the Summer Thursday cultural program; Great Opening on May 22 with Group “Yellow Postmen”
description_translated: The favorite culture and meeting of the Rigans Kalnciems Quarter announces the legendary Thursday's open -air cultural evenings, which has been active for 15 years. This year's series of events will be opened on May 22, the concert of the band "Yellow Postnieki", while DJ Uldis Rudaks will warm up the stage. Entrance to events from 18.00 and free.

title: Notiks bezmaksas mērījumi un konsultācijas sievietēm
description: 20. maijā no plkst. 16.00 līdz 19.00 “Mēness aptieka” rīko “Veselības pieturu sievietei” tirdzniecības centrā “Akropole Alfa” Brīvības gatvē 372, Rīgā. Rūpējoties par sievietes veselību un labsajūtu, speciālisti aicina pievērt uzmanību hormonālo svārstību nozīmei dzīves ciklā. Pasākuma apmeklētājas varēs konsultēties ar farmaceitu, fizioterapeitu un topošajiem ārstiem, veikt mērījumus, kā arī piedalīties īpašā interaktīvā aktivitātē un izmantot pasākuma partneru sarūpētos piedāvājumus skaistumam un veselības profilaksei.
title_translated: Free measurements and consultations for women
description_translated: May 20th from 16.00 to 7 pm "Moon Pharmacy" is organizing a "health stop for the woman" in the Akropole Alfa shopping center 372, Riga. Taking care of a woman's health and well -being, specialists call for attention to the importance of hormonal oscillations in the life cycle. Visitors to the event will be able to consult a pharmacist, physiotherapist and prospective doctors, take measurements, as well as participate in a special interactive activity and use the offers provided by the event partners for beauty and health prevention.

title: ES otrdien pieņems 17. sankciju paketi pret Krieviju, vēsta Vācijas kanclers
description: Jauna Eiropas Savienības (ES) Krievijas sankciju pakete, jau septiņpadsmitā, tiks pieņemta otrdien, platformā "X" ceturtdien vakarā pavēstīja Vācijas kanclers Frīdrihs Mercs.

description_translated: A new European Union (EU) Russian sanctions package will be adopted on Tuesday on Tuesday, German Chancellor Friedrich Mercs said on Thursday night.

description_translated: The talks between Ukraine and Russian representatives in Istanbul to end the war in Ukraine are postponed to Friday, news sources in the Turkish Foreign Ministry said on Thursday.

description: Nacionālajā basketbola asociācijā (NBA) pie panākuma Rietumu konferences pusfināla sērijā tikusi Denveras "Nuggets", kas savā laukumā ar 119:107 pārspēja Oklahomsitijas "Thunder" un izlīdzināja rezultātu sērijā (3-3).
title_translated: Sweet food in the West: "Nuggets" and "Thunder" will need seventh game
description_translated: In the National Basketball Association (NBA), the Denver Nuggets had success in the Western Conference semi-finals, which outscored Oklahoma City Thunder by 119: 107 and equalized the score in the series (3-3).

title: Normunda Naumaņa biedrībai jauna valde, Gada balvai kritikā – jauni žūrijas locekļi
description: Kopš šā gada pavasara Normunda Naumaņa biedrības valde darbojas jaunā sastāvā – tās priekšsēdētājs ir Ingus Bērziņš, kā arī valdē darbojas Kārlis Vērdiņš un Sarmīte Ēlerte, kura 10 gadus bija līdzšinējā Biedrības valdes priekšsēdētāja, informēja Normunda Naumaņa biedrības vadītājs Ingus Bērziņš

description_translated: Since spring of this year, the board of Normunds Naumanis has been operating in a new lineup - its chairman is Ingus Berzins, and the board has Kārlis Vērdiņš and Sarmīte Ēlerte, who was chairman of the former board of the Society for 10 years, informed Ingus Berzins, Head of the Society of Normunds Naumanis

title: Aizsargājami meži – neaizsargāti īpašnieki
description: Egļu astoņzobu mizgraužu savairošanās un postījumus Gaujas Nacionālais parks (GNP) piedzīvo jau vairākus gadus. Privāto mežu īpašnieki, no kuru tuvu 56% mežu platību pieder GNP meža zemēs, uzskata, ka jaunie Gaujas Nacionālā parka individuālie aizsardzības un izmantošanas noteikumi cīņu ar šo kaitēkli vēl vairāk apgrūtinās. Vaboles negaida ierēdņu lēmumus, bet īpašnieki zaudē gan kokmateriālus, gan uzticību sistēmai.
title_translated: Protected forests - unprotected owners
description_translated: The proliferation and damage of the spruce eight -toothed barks have been experiencing the Gauja National Park (GNP) for several years. Owners of private forests, close to 56% of forests, belong to the GNP forest lands, believe that the new rules of the Gauja National Park will be even more difficult to fight with this pest. The beetles do not expect decisions of civil servants, but the owners lose both timber and confidence in the system.

title: VIDEO ⟩ Balto stārķu pārim Mammai un Tio ģimenes pieaugums
description: Ar tiešraides kameru aprīkotajā balto stārķu ligzdā, kas uzvīta uz AS "Sadales tīkls" elektrolīnijas balsta, 15. maija vakarā izšķīlās pirmie divi cāļi, informē AS "Sadales tīkls".

description_translated: The first two chicks hatched with a live camera in the white stork nest, which was rolled on the power line of JSC "Sadales tīkls", on the evening of May 15, informs JSC "Sadales tīkls".

description_translated: On May 17, the first Latvian Wine Festival in Zemgale will take place in the Honorary of the Rundale Palace.

description_translated: During the battle task, the Ukrainian armed forces reactive fighter F-16 crashed on Friday, the Air Force said.

description: Latvijas rallija ekipāža ar pilotu Mārtiņu Sesku un stūrmani Renāru Franci piektdien pārdūra riepu pasaules rallija čempionāta (WRC) piektā posma - Portugāles rallija - otrajā ātrumposmā.

description_translated: The Latvian Rally crew with pilot Martins Seskas and helmsman Renara Friday pierced the tire World Rally Championship (WRC) fifth stage - Portugal Rally - in the second stage.

title: Red Bull atvērtās skārdenes
description: _Red Bull Racing_ komandas pilotu maiņas, kas notiek ar apskaužamu regularitāti un apšaubāmu loģiku, ir provocējušas daudz diskusiju līdzjutēju vidū un ģenerējušas vielu pārdomām. Svaigākais pavērsiens atvērto, neizdzerto, bet izbrāķēto _Red Bull_ skārdeņu rindā ir jaunā jaunzēlandieša Liama Losona pazemināšana amatā, izmetot no _Red Bull_ komandas tikai pēc diviem 2025. gada sezonas _Grand Prix_ posmiem. Vai tas ir neizskaidrojams stulbums, apzināta agresīva stratēģija vai bezizeja, kurā komanda sevi iedzinusi ar iepriekšējām pilotu izvēlēm?
title_translated: Red Bull open cans
description_translated: _Red Bull Racing_ The change of team pilot pilot, which happens with enviable regularity and dubious logic, has provoked a lot of discussion among fans and generated substance reflection. The freshest turn of the open, indelied, but rejected _Red Bull_ in the queue, is the lowering of the new New Zealand Liam Loson, discarded from the _Red Bull_ team only after two stages of the 2025 season _Grand prix_. Is this an inexplicable stupidity, a deliberate aggressive strategy or a non -instruction where the team has driven themselves with previous pilot choices?

title: Strīdus ābols Kašmīra
description: Pagājušajā nedēļā ar militāro akciju pārtraukšanu un abpusēju sevis pasludināšanu par uzvarētājiem noslēdzās kārtējais konflikts starp Indiju un Pakistānu. Vēsturē tas paliks ar to, ka šī konflikta laikā notika gaisa kauja, kādu pasaule nebija pieredzējusi kopš II pasaules kara laikiem. Tomēr kārtējais pamiers un atgriešanās pie abpusēja aukstā kara neatrisina nevienu no pretrunām, kas jau gadu desmitiem pastāv starp Ņūdeli un Islāmābādu. Kādi ir ilgstošo Indijas un Pakistānas domstarpību cēloņi, un vai vispār iespējams tās atrisināt mierīgā ceļā?
title_translated: Dispute apple cashmere
description_translated: Last week, another conflict between India and Pakistan concluded with the winners of military shares and mutual self -proclaiming. In history, it will remain with the fact that this conflict had an air battle that the world had not experienced since World War II. However, another ceasefire and return to the mutual Cold War does not solve any of the contradictions that have existed between News and Islamica for decades. What are the causes of long -term Disagreements in India and Pakistan, and is it possible to resolve them at all?

title: Krištopāns vareni uzbrūk un palīdz Melzungenei uzvarēt titula pretendenšu kaujā
description: Vācijas Bundeslīgā rokasbumbā vakar Daiņa Krištopāna Melzungenes komanda izbraukumā ar 29:23 apspēlēja Renāra Uščina Hannoveres vienību, saglabājot paritāti punktos ar līdervienību Berlīnes "Füchse".
title_translated: Christopher attacks mighty and helps Melzungene win the title of contenders in the battle
description_translated: In the German Bundesliga Handball Yesterday, Dainis Christian Melzungene team played at 29:23 by Renara Uschin Hannover's unit, maintaining parity with the leader of Berlin's "Füchse".

title: Šovakar braucieni ar vilcienu būs par 50% lētāki
description: Muzeju naktī šodien pilnas cenas braucieniem ar vilcieniem, kas kursēs no plkst.18 līdz pusnaktij, piešķirs 50% atlaidi, informēja AS "Pasažieru vilciens" (PV) pārstāvji.
title_translated: Tonight's train rides will be 50% cheaper
description_translated: Museum Night today, full prices for trains, which will run from 6 pm to midnight, will give a 50% discount, informed JSC "Pasazieru vilciens" (PV) representatives.

title: Pasaules čempionāts spīdvejā turpinās ar posmu Varšavā
description: Šajā nedēļas nogalē Polijā norisināsies FIM pasaules spīdveja čempionāta 2025. gada sezonas otrais posms. Sestdien, 17. maijā, vairāk nekā 50 000 skatītāju klātbūtnē, Varšavas trekā izbrauks 16 braucēji, arī latviešu spīdveja braucējs Andžejs Ļebedevs, kurš iepriekšējo posmu Vācijā noslēdza pirmo reizi savā karjerā kāpjot uz Grand Prix sacensību goda pjedestāla. Orlen Oil FIM Speedway GP of Poland – Warsaw starts sestdien plkst. 20.00 un tiešraides translācija būs skatāma Go3 Sport OPEN.
title_translated: The World Speedway Championship continues with a stage in Warsaw
description_translated: This weekend, the second leg of the FIM World Speedway Championship 2025 will take place in Poland. On Saturday, May 17, in the presence of more than 50,000 spectators, 16 riders will depart in Warsaw's track, including Latvian speedway rider Andrew Lebedev, who closed the previous stage in Germany for the first time in his career as he climbed to the Grand Prix's podium. Orlen Oil Fim Speedway GP of Poland - Warsaw starts on Saturday 8pm and live broadcast will be on view at Go3 Sport Open.

title: Kurdi atsakās no bruņotas cīņas pret Turciju
description: Kurdistānas Strādnieku partija (PKK) savā 12. kongresā paziņojusi par izformēšanos, apliecinot, ka pārtrauc bruņotu cīņu pret Turcijas valsti. Četrdesmit gadu ilgā konflikta laikā dzīvību zaudējuši vairāk nekā 40 000 cilvēku.
title_translated: Kurds give up an armed fight against Turkey
description_translated: The Kurdistan Workers' Party (PKK) has announced in its 12th Congress of Designation, confirming that it stops an armed fight against the Turkish country. More than 40,000 people have lost their lives during the forty -year conflict.

title: Latvijas hokejisti ar maču pret Slovākiju turpina cīņu par iekļūšanu ceturtdaļfinālā
description: Latvijas vīriešu hokeja izlase šodien Stokholmā pasaules čempionāta grupu turnīra pirmspēdējā spēlē tiksies ar Slovākiju, turpinot cīņu par iekļūšanu ceturtdaļfinālā.
title_translated: Latvian hockey players with a match against Slovakia continue their fight to qualify for the quarterfinals
description_translated: The Latvian men's hockey team will meet Slovakia today in Stockholm's penultimate game of the World Championship Group Tournament, continuing the fight to qualify for the quarterfinals.

title: Nosaukta "nākotnes profesija": viegli apgūt un neaizstās mākslīgais intelekts
description: Mākslīgo intelektu dēvē tieši par to izgudrojumu, kas izraisīs cilvēces pāreju uz jaunu tehnoloģisko laikmetu. Un šajā procesā daudzi cilvēki zaudēs darbu, jo viņu pienākumus varēs veikt neirotīkli. Tomēr dažus darbiniekus mākslīgais intelekts nomainīt precīzi nevarēs, vismaz tuvāko dažu desmitu gadu laikā. Tā raksta "Think Stewartville".
title_translated: Named "Future Profession": Easy to master and not replace artificial intelligence
description_translated: Artificial intelligence is called exactly the invention that will cause humanity to transition to a new technological age. And in the process, many people will lose their jobs because their responsibilities will be able to do the neurotens' networks. However, some employees will not be able to replace the artificial intelligence exactly, at least in the next few decades. It writes "Think Stewartville".

title: STIRNAS pasaule
description: STIRNA jeb Lilita Vīdnere (22) īsā laikā ieguvusi miljoniem atbalstītāju ar vienu dziesmu, kas radusies, uzmundrinot sevi Santjago ceļā, bet neplāno mesties koncertdzīvē kā viena hita autore un uzskata, ka skarbā dzīves pieredze viņai nav tikusi dota tāpat vien.
title_translated: Roe world
description_translated: Stirna, or Lilita Vidner (22), has gained millions of supporters with one song created by cheering herself on Santiago's way, but does not plan to go into concert life as one hita author and believes that the harsh life experience has not been given to her.

title: Kā viņa tik ilgi nodzīvoja? Zinātnieki izpētījuši 117 gadus vecas sievietes zarnu mikrobiomu un nonākuši pie negaidītiem secinājumiem
description: Marija Branjasa Morera, kas nodzīvoja līdz 117 gadu vecumam, pusotru gadu tika uzskatīta par vecāko cilvēku uz Zemes. Kā raksta "The Telegraph", pētnieki, kas cenšas atklāt viņas ilgdzīvošanas noslēpumu, izpētījuši viņas zarnu mikrobiomu un nonākuši pie negaidītiem secinājumiem.
title_translated: How did she live so long? Scientists have studied the gut microbiome of an 117 -year -old woman and came to unexpected conclusions
description_translated: Mary Branjas Morera, who lived until the age of 117, was considered the oldest man on Earth and a half. According to The Telegraph, researchers who are trying to discover the mystery of her longevity have studied her gut microbiome and came to unexpected conclusions.

title: Vienatnē pāri Klusajam okeānam. Tapusi dokumentālā filma par pasaules apceļotāju Kārli Bardeli
description: Kā okeānā cilvēkam vienam pašam var nebūt bail? Atbildi uz šo jautājumu var meklēt dokumentālajā filmā "Aizsniegt dzelmi", kas šonedēļ piedzīvojusi pirmizrādi kinoteātrī "Splendid Palace", Rīgā. Tā ir filma par latvieti Kārli Bardeli – pirmo cilvēku pasaulē, kurš airu laivā šķērsojis Kluso okeānu gandrīz divu gadu laikā.
title_translated: Alone across the Pacific Ocean. A documentary about the world's tourist Karl Bardeli
description_translated: How may not be afraid of a person alone in the ocean? The answer to this question can be searched for in the documentary "Reaching Dzelm", which has premiered this week at Splendid Palace, Riga. It is a film about Latvian Karl Bardel, the first man in the world to cross the Pacific Ocean for almost two years.

title: Hokeja čempionāta rīkotāju izgāšanās, Latvijas bobsleja renesanse un krievu daiļslidotāju Pirra uzvara
description: Latvijas un pasaules sportā aizejošā nedēļa bija bagāta ar daudziem spraigiem un skandaloziem brīžiem. Latvijas sportā centrālā uzmanība, protams, hokejam, bet pasaulē arī citi interesanti notikumi, ja visam nesanāca izsekot, portāls Jauns.lv piedāvā atskatīties uz notikušo.
title_translated: Hockey Championship organizers' failure, Latvian bobsleigh Renaissance and victory of Russian figure skaters Pirra
description_translated: The past week in Latvia and the world was rich in many strenuous and scandalous moments. In Latvian sports, the central attention, of course, for hockey, but in the world, other interesting events, if everything could not be tracked, offers to look back on what happened.

title: Izstrādāts jauns dabas aizsardzības plāns dabas liegumam «Liepājas ezers»
description: Jūnija vidū gaidāma sabiedriskā apspriešana par jauno dabas aizsardzības plānu dabas liegumam "Liepājas ezers", kas tapis divu gadu garumā. Tas paredz dažādas izmaiņas, kas atvieglos apsaimniekošanu Liepājas ezerā, kā arī paplašinās lieguma aizsardzības zonu Vītiņu pļavu apkārtnē. Gan Dabas aizsardzības pārvaldei (DAP), gan pašvaldībām un plāna izstrādātājiem līdz šim izdevies vienoties par svarīgākajiem punktiem, izstrādājot plānu, tagad savu viedokli varēs paust iedzīvotāji.
title_translated: A new nature protection plan for nature reserve «Lake Liepaja» has been developed
description_translated: In mid -June, a public consultation on the new nature protection plan for the nature reserve "Lake Liepaja", which has been created for two years. It provides a variety of changes that will facilitate management in Lake Liepaja, as well as expanding the reserve protection zone in the vicinity of Vītiņš meadows. Both the Nature Conservation Agency (DAP) and the municipalities and the developers of the plan have so far been able to agree on the most important points in developing the plan, now the population will be able to express their opinion.

title: "Mana nonākšana te bija likteņa nejaušība," - Roberts Buivids jau 30 gadu strādā Latvijas Radio
description: Latvijas Radio 2 nesen nosvinēja 30. dzimšanas dienu, un Roberts Buivids tajā strādā kopš pašiem pirmsākumiem.
title_translated: "My arrival here was a coincidence of destiny," Robert Buvid has been working on Latvian Radio for 30 years
description_translated: Latvian Radio 2 recently celebrated his 30th birthday, and Robert Buvid has been working there since its inception.

title: Kultūršoks: amerikāņus Eiropas lidostās pārsteidz viens pasažieru paradums
description: Kādu amerikānieti satriecis piedzīvotais lidostā Lielbritānijā. Viņa pamanīja vienu pārsteidzošu kopīgu iezīmi britiem.
title_translated: Culture Shock: Americans at European airports are surprised by one passenger habit
description_translated: An American was shocked at the airport in the UK. She noticed one amazing common feature of the British.

title: Pasaules hokeja čempionātā pirmdien notiks "izdzīvošanas" cīņas
description: 2025. gada pasaules hokeja čempionātā pirmdien Stokholmā (Zviedrija) un Herningā (Dānija) notiks cīņas par "izdzīvošanu" jeb spēles par vietas saglabāšanu elites divīzijā.
title_translated: "Survival" battles will be held at the World Hockey Championship on Monday
description_translated: The 2025 World Hockey Championships in Stockholm (Sweden) and Herning (Denmark) on Monday will take place in the fight for "survival", or games to preserve the place in the elite division.

title: Ostapenko pirms French Open izlozes WTA rangā atkāpjas uz 21.vietu
description: Latvijas pirmā rakete Aļona Ostapenko jaunākajā Sieviešu tenisa asociācijas (WTA) rangā atkāpusies par trīs pozīcijām uz 21.vietu.
title_translated: Ostapenko Before the French Open draw in WTA rankings retreat to 21st place
description_translated: Latvia's first racket, Alona Ostapenko's latest women's tennis association (WTA) ranked three positions to 21st.

title: Jānis Rumkovskis: Kā kvantu revolūcija pārveidos uzņēmumu pieeju kiberdrošībai?
description: Kvantu skaitļošana vairs nav tikai teorētiska iespējamība – tā kļūst par realitāti, būtiski mainot tehnoloģiju vidi un vienlaikus radot jauna līmeņa kiberdrošības riskus. Līdz 2029. gadam kvantu datori būs spējīgi apdraudēt šobrīd izmantotos šifrēšanas algoritmus, piemēram, RSA un ECC, uzlaužot tos dažu stundu laikā. Tas nozīmē, ka visi šodien aizsargātie dati, sākot no klientu informācijas līdz uzņēmumu intelektuālajam īpašumam, var kļūt viegli pieejami trešajām pusēm.
title_translated: Jānis Rumkovskis: How will the quantum revolution transform the company's approach to cyber security?
description_translated: Quantum computing is no longer only theoretical possibility - it becomes a reality, significantly changing the technology environment and at the same time creating a new level of cyber security risks. By 2029, quantum computers will be able to threaten the currently used encryption algorithms, such as the RSA and the ECC, breaking them within hours. This means that all protected data today, from customer information to the intellectual property of companies, can become easily accessible to third parties.

title: Jānis Rumkovsis: Kā kvantu revolūcija pārveidos uzņēmumu pieeju kiberdrošībai?
description: Kvantu skaitļošana vairs nav tikai teorētiska iespējamība – tā kļūst par realitāti, būtiski mainot tehnoloģiju vidi un vienlaikus radot jauna līmeņa kiberdrošības riskus. title: Kritiķu atsauksmes, sensācijas un patveršanās cilvēcībā Kannu kinofestivālā
description: Līdz nedēļas beigām norisinās 78. Kannu kinofestivāls. Te pastāv krasi atšķirīgas pasaules – kamēr vieni lūko rast iespēju palūkoties uz kinozvaigznēm pie festivāla mītnes sarkanā paklāja, citi dienas lielāko daļu pavada kinoteātrī. Šā gada uzvarētājus noteiks žūrija, kuras priekšsēdētāja ir franču aktrise Žiljeta Binoša.
title_translated: Critics' reviews, sensations and shelters in humanity at the Cannes Film Festival
description_translated: The 78th Cannes Film Festival will take place by the end of the week. There are drastically different worlds - while some are looking at the opportunity to look at the movie stars at the festival's red carpet, others spend most of the day in the cinema. This year's winners will be determined by a jury chaired by French actress Jillet Binosh.

title: Jauna elpa senām ēkām: garīgo prakšu centra Stacija.lv būvniecības stāsts
description: Ar pārdomātu pieeju un kvalitatīviem Bauroc materiāliem atdzimusi ēka – garīgo prakšu centrs Stacija.lv. Uzzini par atjaunošanas procesu rakstā!
title_translated: New breath for ancient buildings: Construction story of Spiritual Prakšu Center.lv
description_translated: With a thoughtful approach and high quality Bauroc materials, the building was reborn - the Spiritual Prakšu Center at Stacija.lv. Find out about the restoration process in the article!

title: FOTO: Aicina pieteikties Linstow Art Award: jauno Latvijas mākslinieku atbalstam
description: No 6. līdz 30. maijam Latvijas Mākslas akadēmijas (LMA) maģistrantūras absolventi aicināti pieteikties Linstow Art Award – Latvijas jauno mākslinieku mērķa atbalsta programmai, kas nodrošina strukturētu un ilgtspējīgu palīdzību radošo industriju attīstībai, vienlaikus veicinot jauno talantu konkurētspēju un redzamību Latvijas un starptautiskajā kultūras vidē.
title_translated: Photo: invites you to apply for Linstow Art Award: to support young Latvian artists
description_translated: From May 6 to May 30, graduates of the Latvian Academy of Arts (LAA) are invited to apply for Linstow Art Award, a Latvian young artists' target support program, which provides structured and sustainable assistance to the development of creative industries, while promoting the competitiveness and visibility of new talents in Latvia and international cultural environment.

title: Kad sirds ritms nojūk: kas jāzina par aritmiju?
description: Sirds ir mūsu organisma motors – tā strādā nepārtraukti, nodrošinot dzīvībai nepieciešamo asiņu plūsmu. Tomēr dažkārt tās ritms var izjukt, radot sirdsklauves, pārsitienus vai pat reiboni un elpas trūkumu. Šādus stāvokļus dēvē par aritmiju – sirdsdarbības traucējumiem, kad sirds sitas pārāk ātri, pārāk lēni vai neregulāri.
title_translated: When the heart rhythm breaks down: What do you need to know about arrhythmia?
description_translated: The heart is the engine of our body - it works continuously, providing the life of the blood needed. However, sometimes its rhythm can break down, causing palpitations, strokes or even dizziness and shortness of breath. Such states are called arrhythmia, a heart problems when the heart beats too quickly, too slowly or irregularly.

title: Izgaršo bērnību ar pašceptu rabarberu plātsmaizi!
description: Kad dārzā parādās pirmie rabarberi, zini – pienācis laiks atdzīvināt kādu no vismīļākajām latviešu mājas garšām – rabarberu plātsmaizi. Šis vienkāršais, taču neatkārtojami gardais deserts nav tikai saldums – tas ir atmiņu stāsts, kas atgriež bērnībā, vasarā, mājas smaržās un vecmammas virtuvē.
title_translated: Tastes childhood with a self -baked rhubarb plaque!
description_translated: When the first rhubarb appears in the garden, you know - it is time to revive one of the most beloved flavors of a Latvian home - rhubarb. This simple but unique delicious dessert is not just a sweetness - a memory story that returns to childhood, summer, home scent and grandmother's kitchen.

title: Valodnieki “grūmingu” rosina pārdēvēt par “iedraudzināšanu”
description: Latvijas Zinātņu akadēmijas Terminoloģijas komisija rosina "grūmingu" latviskot kā "iedraudzināšanu".
title_translated: Linguists "Gruming" encourage renaming "Feature"
description_translated: The terminology commission of the Latvian Academy of Sciences encourages "Grooming" Latvian as "Controlled".

description_translated: Before the crucial match on qualifying for the quarter -finals of the World Cup, the Latvian team has advantages over the Austrian national team, striker Harald Egle said in a conversation before the final match of the group.

description: Krievija palielina savu militāro klātbūtni pie robežas ar Somiju, pastiprinot spriedzi Arktikā uz kara Ukrainā fona, vēsta laikraksts "The New York Times", atsaucoties uz satelītattēlu analīzi.

description_translated: Russia increases its military presence at the border with Finland, reinforcing tensions in the Arctic against the background of war in Ukraine, reports The New York Times, referring to satellite image analysis.

description: _Sirano_ – tā sauc komēdiju, kuru slavenais režisors nodeva skatītāju vērtējumam 2023. gada decembrī, trīs mēnešus pirms savas priekšlaicīgās aiziešanas mūžībā. Teātris _Gešer_ šo izrādi Latvijā spēlēs tikai šo vienīgo reizi

description: Neilgi pirms tam, kad ASV prezidents Donalds Tramps sazvanījās ar Krievijas diktatoru Vladimiru Putinu, ASV viceprezidents Džeimss Deivids Venss žurnālistiem sacīja, ka Vašingtona apzinās, ka "šeit ir zināms strupceļš.”
title_translated: Putin is "not really clear how to get out of the war," says Venss
description_translated: Shortly before US President Donald Trump contacted Russian dictator Vladimir Putin, US vice president James David Wens told reporters that Washington was aware that "there is a deadlock here."

description_translated: The municipalities spent four times more education in education in 2024 than for social protection.

title: Nedēļas nogalē "SWS eSprint Cup" Pasaules fināls Beļģijā ar četriem latviešiem ierindā
description: Šajā nedēļas nogalē, 23. un 24. maijā, Beļģijas pilsētā Vavrā notiks trešais "Sodi World Series" Pasaules fināls elektrokartingā. Šogad Latviju pārstāvēs četri braucēji - rīdzinieki Andrejs Laipnieks un Edijs Maļinovskis, siguldietis Māris Liepiņš un cēsinieks Edvards Keziks.
title_translated: At the weekend "SWS esprint Cup" world final in Belgium with four Latvians
description_translated: This weekend, May 23 and 24, the third "penalties in the World Series" World Finals will be held in the Belgian city of Vavr. This year Latvia will be represented by four riders - Rigans Andrejs Laipnieks and Edijs Malinovskis, Sigulda Maris Liepiņš and Cēsis Edward Keziks.

title: LSM uzraugu uzdevums – arī atrisināt politiski nokaitēto jautājumu par krievu valodu sabiedriskajā medijā
description: Kas nākamos četrus gadus pārvaldīs Latvijas Sabiedrisko mediju? Atbildi uz šo jautājumu līdz Jāņiem apņēmušies sniegt politiķi. Pašreizējās Sabiedrisko elektronisko plašsaziņas līdzekļu padomes (SEPLP) vadībā ir paveikts vēsturisks, bet neviennozīmīgi vērtēts Latvijas Radio un Latvijas Televīzijas (LTV) apvienošanas process. Tuvākajā nākotnē apvienotajam medijam ne tikai formāli, bet arī pēc būtības jāsāk strādāt vienoti. Turklāt politiski nokaitēts un neatrisināts arvien ir jautājums, vai sabiedriskajā medijā ir vieta krievu valodai. Šis aspekts ir galvenais, kādēļ daļa politiķu grib uzraugošās padomes nomaiņu pret nacionāli konservatīvāku.
title_translated: The task of LSM supervisors is also to resolve the politically annoyed issue of Russian in public media
description_translated: Who will manage Latvian social media for the next four years? The answer to this question is determined by politicians before Midsummer. The current public electronic media council (SEPP) has been accomplished by a historic but ambiguous process of combining Latvian Television (LTV). In the near future, the combined media not only formally, but also in essence, should start working united. In addition, politically annoyed and unresolved is still the question of whether public media is a place for Russian. This aspect is the key to the fact that some politicians want to replace the supervisory council with more conservative.

title: "Thunder" NBA Rietumu konferences finālsēriju sāk ar graujošu uzvaru
description: Šejam Gildžesam-Aleksandram gūstot 31 punktu, Nacionālās basketbola asociācijas (NBA) šīs sezonas pamatturnīra uzvarētāja Oklahomasitijas "Thunder" otrdien ar uzvaru sāka Rietumu konferences finālsēriju.
title_translated: "Thunder" NBA Western Conference Finals start with a disruptive victory
description_translated: With 31 points, the winner of the National Basketball Association (NBA) this season's Main Event Oklahoma City Thunder on Tuesday started the Western Conference Finals on Tuesday.

title: Video: Portugāles rallijs bez komentāriem - tikai auto rūkoņa, sānslīdes un tramplīni
description: Pasaules rallija čempionāts piedāvā ieskatu aizvadītajā Portugāles rallijā - bez komentāriem, vien baudot sacīkšu auto rūkoņu un iespaidīgu braukšanu.
title_translated: Video: Portuguese Rally without comment - only car roar, sidewalk and springboard
description_translated: The World Rally Championship offers an insight into the Portuguese Rally - without comment, just enjoying the racing car roar and impressive driving.

description: Vai esi meklējusi veselīgus un dabiskus veidus, kā ieviest ko jaunu savā ēdienkartē? Griķi ir ne tikai vērtīgs ogļhidrātu avots, bet arī lieliski piemēroti dažādiem gardumiem – no griķu pankūkām līdz plācenīšiem un cepumiem. Šie ēdieni būs piemēroti gan ikdienai, gan īpašiem brīžiem, kad gribas palutināt sevi vai savus mīļos ar ko siltu, mājīgu un sātīgu.

title: Lietuvas mediju asociācija tiesājas par LRT finansēšanu un uzvar; EK būs jāsāk izmeklēšana
description: Lietuvā Interneta mediju asociācija (IZA) uzvarējusi Eiropas Savienības (ES) Vispārējā tiesā Eiropas Komisiju (EK) par sabiedriskā medija LRT finansēšanas modeļa atbilstību valsts atbalsta noteikumiem. Tas nozīmē, ka EK būs jāuzsāk izmeklēšana par modeļa likumību, vēsta "delfi.lt".
title_translated: The Lithuanian Media Association is in court for financing LRT and wins; EC will have to start an investigation
description_translated: In Lithuania, the Internet Media Association (IZA) has won the European Union (EU) General Court for the European Commission (EC) on the compliance of the financing model of the public media LRT with the provisions of the State aid. This means that the EC will have to launch an investigation into the legality of the model, Delfi.lt reports.

title: Basketbolists Lomažs par sezonu, izlases spēku un gatavību «EuroBasket 2025»
description: Kamēr ziemas sportisti ir jaunās olimpiskās sezonas gaidās, pirms tam pie mums norisināsies viens nozīmīgākajiem notikumiem Latvijas sporta vēsturē – Eiropas čempionātu basketbolā, kur viena apakšgrupa, kā arī izslēgšanas spēles augustā tiks uzņemts Rīgā. Lai gan līdz tam atlikuši nedaudz vairāk kā trīs mēneši, Latvijas izlases uzbrucējs Rihards Lomažs intervijā "Sporta Studijai" atzina, ka spēlētājiem "tas tepat ap stūri vien ir".
