description_translated: While winter athletes are in the anticipation of the new Olympic season, we will have one of the most important events in the history of Latvian sports - the European Basketball Championship, where one sub -group, as well as the playoffs in August, will be hosted in Riga. Although just over three months remaining, Latvian national striker Rihards Lomažs admitted in an interview with "Sports Studio" that the players "are just around the corner."

title: Govis saļima dažās minūtēs. Plūdi, karstuma vilnis un strauja knišļu savairošanās pirms 20 gadiem
description: Šis maijs Latvijā ir vēss un ļoti mitrs, līdzīgi bija 2005. gadā. Pirms 20 gadiem Latgalē maija lietavas izraisīja plūdus, tiem sekoja straujš karstums, kas veicināja knišļu savairošanos. No knišļu uzbrukumiem bojā gāja vairāk nekā 500 lopu, lielākoties govis, arī zirgi un cūkas.
title_translated: Cows in a few minutes. Floods, heat wave and rapid multiplication of knits 20 years ago
description_translated: This May is cool and very humid in Latvia, similar to 2005. 20 years ago in Latgale, the May rains caused floods, followed by rapid heat, which contributed to the proliferation of knees. More than 500 livestock, mostly cows, including horses and pigs, were killed in the attacks.

Kā kopumā vērtējams izlases sniegums aizvadītajā turnīrā? Un kura komanda šogad kļūs par pasaules čempioniem? Par to Almants Poikāns un Jānis Bendziks raidījumā "D sektors" runā ar bijušo Latvijas hokeja izlases spēlētāju Edgaru Kuldu.

And which team will become the world champions this year? Almant Poikans and Jānis Bendziks talk about former Latvian hockey team player Edgar Kuld on this.

Parādīšu tev četrus veidus, kā padarīt šo tradicionālo produktu par īstu gardumu - ceptas marinētas siļķes, marinētu siļķi biešu krēmā un marinētu siļķi vikingu gaumē. Katrs variants ir īpašs un palīdzēs tev izbaudīt šo zivi dažādās garšu niansēs.

description_translated: Are you ready to get to know the pickled herring from a different perspective? I'll show you four ways to make this traditional product a real delicacy - fried pickled herring, marinated herring in beet cream and pickled herring in Viking. Each option is special and will help you enjoy this fish in different tastes.

title: Gan maijpuķītes, gan mirušo ofīcijs. Jaunie talanti izpaudīsies baleta vakarā Iespējams...

This is the tradition of Aivars Leimanis, the artistic director of the Latvian National Ballet (LNB), which will be cultivated this year at the Latvian National Opera's new hall on May 23. 18.30

description_translated: On May 10 this year, the State Police inspector noticed an intoxicated man on the driveway in Salaspils. The law enforcement officer spoke to the man, after which the man addressed with a knife tried to attack the State Police inspector. Criminal proceedings have been initiated and a man born in 1973 was detained.

The semi -finals of the season, in which Arthur Jagar and Istanbul's "Fenerbahce" will play against the champion Athens '' Panathinaikos '', while Piraeus 'Olympiacos' will compete against Monaco. title: Ogu raža Latvijā gaidāma vēlāk
description: Mainīgie pavasara laikapstākļi, mijoties aukstumam un salnām, kā arī pēkšņam siltumam un stiprām lietusgāzēm, ir radījuši izaicinājumus lauksaimniekiem, īpaši ogu audzētājiem. Biedrība “Zemnieku saeima” norāda, ka auksto nakšu un pastiprinātā mitruma dēļ ir apgrūtināta darbu veikšana un kavējas augu attīstība....

description_translated: Changing spring weather conditions with cold and frost, as well as sudden heat and heavy rainfall, have created challenges for farmers, especially berry growers. The Farmers' Saeima points out that cold nights and increased humidity are difficult to do the work and delay the development of plants ....

description: Šīs sezonas Nacionālās basketbola asociācijas (NBA) vērtīgākajam spēlētājām Šejam Gildžesam-Aleksandram gūstot 38 punktus, pamatturnīra uzvarētāja Oklahomasitijas "Thunder" ceturtdien izcīnīja otro uzvaru Rietumu konferences finālsērijā.

description_translated: With this season's National Basketball Association (NBA), the most valuable players, with 38 points, Oklahoma City's Thunder winner of the Main Event on Thursday won their second victory in the Western Conference Finals on Thursday.

title: ASV oficiāli atceļ sankcijas Sīrijai

description_translated: On Friday, the US officially overturned economic sanctions imposed by Syria, marking a dramatic change in policy following the overthrow of Bashar al -Assad and opening its doors to new investments in the country.

title: Pērn ne reizi tribīnē nekāpušais Ričards Šlesers algā Saeimā saņēmis vairāk nekā 44 000 eiro

description_translated: The salary of Saeima deputy Richard Slesers (LPV) in parliament decreased by 5% last year and was € 44,274, according to a declaration of a public official.

description_translated: Russia made a combined drone and rocket impact on Cijivai at night on May 24, injuring at least eight people, said Vitaly Klichko, the mayor of the Ukrainian capital.

title: KNAB sācis pārbaudi arī pret «Ventas Balsi»
description: Vēstules no Korupcijas novēršanas un apkarošanas biroja ar pieprasījumu skaidrot, pēc kādiem kritērijiem redakcijas izvēlējušās politiķus un pašvaldības, par kurām rakstīt pirms vēlēšanām, un vai par šīm publikācijām nav saņemta nauda, Baltijas pētnieciskās žurnālistikas centram Re:Baltica un ziņu aģentūrai LETA bija kā zibens no skaidrām debesīm. Vai tā ir nepamatota iejaukšanās žurnālistu darbā vai nepieciešama neērtība godīgu vēlēšanu vārdā?
title_translated: The KNAB has also begun a test against «Ventas Voice»
description_translated: Letters from the Corruption Prevention and Combating Bureau request to explain the criteria for the editorial staff chosen by politicians and municipalities to write about before the elections, and whether money has been received for these publications, the Baltic Research Journalism Center for Re: Baltica and LETA. Is it unjustified intervention for journalists or need discomfort in the name of fair elections?

title_translated: The finalists of the World Hockey Championship will become known today in Stockholm
description_translated: Today in Stockholm, the men's hockey teams will be determined to qualify for the World Cup final.

title: Vai tiesa, ka ātrās modes gigants "Shein" atvērs veikalu Rīgas centrā?
description: Pašā Rīgas centrā, Brīvības un Raiņa bulvāra krustojumā, iepretim Brīvības piemineklim, kādas ēkas pirmā stāva skatlogos parādījies uzraksts "Shein" un kvadrātkods. Ķīnas tiešsaistes tirdzniecības platformai "Shein", kas specializējas lētu apģērbu, apavu un mājsaimniecības preču pārdošanā, līdz šim gandrīz nav bijis fizisku veikalu. Vai tas nozīmē, ka viens no tiem drīzumā varētu parādīties Rīgā?
title_translated: Is it true that the fast fashion giant "Shein" will open the store in the center of Riga?
description_translated: In the very center of Riga, at the intersection of Freedom and Rainis Boulevard, opposite the Freedom Monument, the inscription "Shein" and a square code appeared on the ground floor of a building. For the Chinese online trading platform "Shein", which specializes in cheap clothing, footwear and household goods, so far has almost no physical stores. Does this mean that one of them could soon appear in Riga?

title: Aktrises Katrīnas Blauas-Zēbergas vīrs atklāj, kas abu attiecībās ir lielākais izaicinājums
description: Pie Blauu-Zēbergu ģimenes Kuldīgā ieradies attiecību speciālists Kristaps Ozoliņš, lai palīdzētu pārim labāk izprast vienam otru un sakārtot ģimenes dzīvi.
title_translated: Actress Catherine Blau-Zeberg's husband reveals what's the biggest challenge in the relationship between them
description_translated: Kristaps Ozoliņš, a relationship specialist, arrived at the Blauu-Zeberg family in Kuldiga to help the couple better understand each other and arrange family life.

title: Bezmiegs Sietlā: Kitijai Laksai pirmais zaudējums WNBA
description: Kitija Laksa sestdienas, 24. maija, rītā pēc Latvijas laika spēlēja 15 minūtes, bet "Phoenix Mercury" basketbolistes (2-1) sezonas pirmajā izbraukumā 9 091 skatītāju klātbūtnē zaudēja "Seattle Storm" (2-1) ar 70:77.
title_translated: Insomnia in Seattle: Kitty Laksa's first loss wnba
description_translated: Kitija Laksa played 15 minutes on Saturday, May 24, while Phoenix Mercury (2-1) lost to Seattle Storm (2-1) with 70:77 in the first outing of the season in the first outing of 9,091 spectators.

title: Andris Keišs par to, kas patiesi svarīgs bērna audzināšanā
description: Jaunā Rīgas teātra aktieris Andris Keišs skatītāju sirdis aizkustina ne tikai ar savu aktiermeistarību, muzikalitāti un fantastisko humora izjūtu, bet arī ar cilvēcisku vienkāršību. Viņš stāsta, kādas ir bijušas paša attiecības ar vecākiem, un uzsver būtisko bērnu audzināšanā.
title_translated: Andris Keish about what is really important in raising a child
description_translated: The actor of the New Riga Theater, Andris Keišs, touches the hearts of the audience not only with his acting, musicality and a fantastic sense of humor, but also with human simplicity. He tells what the relationship with his parents has been and emphasizes the essentials in raising children.

title: Balinska pārstāvētā «Panthers» nonāk vienas uzvaras attālumā no NHL Stenlija kausa fināla
description: Floridas "Panthers", Latvijas aizsargam Uvim Balinskim paliekot ārpus pieteikuma mačam, sestdien Nacionālās hokeja līgas (NHL) Stenlija kausa pusfinālā izcīnīja trešo panākumu, nonākot vienas uzvaras attālumā no iekļūšanas finālā.
title_translated: Balinsky's Panthers comes one victory away from the NHL Stanley Cup final
description_translated: Florida's Panthers, with Latvian defender Uvis Balinskis remaining out of the application, won the third success in the semi -finals of the National Hockey League (NHL) on Saturday, reaching one victory from the finals.

title: Ar slēptu smadzeņu satricinājumu un nervā iedurtu šprici. Garija Rožkalna vēsturiskais piedzīvojums Lemānā
description: No Biķerniekiem līdz Lemānai. Tā savu ceļu raksturo 32 gadu vecais motosportists Garijs Rožkalns, kurš pirms mēneša iegāja Latvijas motosporta vēsturē kā pirmais, kurš finišējis Lemānas 24 stundu izturības sacensībās. Rožkalns Jauns.lv plašāk atcerējās ceļu līdz Lemānai, piedzīvoto sacensībās un nākamajiem karjeras soļiem pasaules izturības čempionāta apritē.
title_translated: With a hidden concussion and a spray in the nerve. Garry Rozkalns Historical Adventure in LeMan
description_translated: From Bikernieki to Leman. It is characterized by 32 -year -old motorsportist Garry Rožkalns, who went into Latvian motorsport a month ago as the first to finish in the Le Mans 24 -hour endurance competition. Rožkalns Jauns.lv remembers the way to Leman, the race and the next career steps in the world endurance championship.

title: Hamiltonam starta vietu sods, Leklērs sarūgtināts par zaudējumu
description: Lando Noriss uzvaru Monako GP kvalifikācijā skaidro ar gudrāku, nevis ātrāku braukšanu, kamēr Šarls Leklērs ir ļoti sarūgtināts par pazaudēto reto iespēju sacensības sākt no pirmās pozīcijas. Tikmēr Lūiss Hamiltons saņēmis starta vietu sodu par patraucēšanu Maksam Verstapenam.
title_translated: Hamilton start -up punishment, lekler disappointed for loss
description_translated: Lando Noris explains victory in Monaco GP in qualifying with smarter rather than faster driving, while Charles Lekler is very disappointed with the lost rare opportunity to start the race from the first position. Meanwhile, Lewis Hamilton has received a starting place for grabbing Max Verstapen.

title: Zinātnieki nosaukuši pirmo pasaules valsti, kas kļūs neapdzīvota "ellīga karstuma" dēļ
description: Zinātnieki nosaukuši valsti, kas jau šajā gadsimtā var zaudēt piemērotību dzīvei ekstrēmās sasilšanas dēļ.
title_translated: Scientists have named the first country in the world that will become uninhabited because of the "hell of the heat"
description_translated: Scientists have named a country that can lose suitability of life due to extreme warming in this century.

title: Pirmā sieviete Everesta virsotnē
description: Pirms 50 gadiem japāniete Junko Tabei kļuva par pirmo sievieti, kura uzkāpusi pasaules augstākajā virsotnē – Everestā jeb Džomolungmā. Viņas hobijs zināmā mērā kļuva par apsēstību, jo laika gaitā šī dāma iekaroja vairāk nekā 70 pasaules valstu augstākos kalnus (Gaiziņkalnā gan nepabija) un pat mūža nogalē sapņoja par vienu – aizsniegties līdz jaunām virsotnēm, un ne jau slavas dēļ.
title_translated: The first woman at the top of Everest
description_translated: 50 years ago, Joke Junko Tabei became the first woman to climb the world's highest peak - Everest or Jomolungm. Her hobby became a obsession to some extent, as over time, this lady conquered the highest mountains of more than 70 countries around the world (though not in Gaiziņkalns) and dreamed of one at the end of her life - to reach new peaks, not for fame.

title: Ostapenko saglabā 21. pozīciju WTA rangā, Sevastovai 137 vietu kāpums
description: Sieviešu tenisa asociācija (WTA) jau publiskojusi jaunāko pasaules rangu. Latvijas tenisa līdere Aļona Ostapenko saglabājusi 21. pozīciju, bet valsts otrā rakete Darja Semeņistaja pakāpusies no 127. uz 124. vietu.
title_translated: Ostapenko retains the 21st position in the WTA rankings, Sevastova 137 seats
description_translated: The Women's Tennis Association (WTA) has already released the latest world rank. Latvian tennis leader Alona Ostapenko has retained its 21st position, but the country's second racket Darya Semenista ranks from 127 to 124.

title: Video: Reišulis visu braucienu vajā līderi, Kubuliņam neizdodas noturēt trešo vietu
description: Eiropas motokrosa čempionāta Francijas posma pirmajā braucienā abas klases pārstāvošie latvieši bija starp vadošajiem braucējiem. Jānis Mārtiņš Reišulis EMX250 klasē jau kopš starta ieņēma otro vietu, vajāja līderi Noelu Zanoču, taču apdzīt sāncensi tā arī nespēja un finišēja otrais. EMX125 klasē Jēkabs Kuubuliņš sākumā bija septītais, bet aizcīnījās jau līdz trešajai vietai, pirms pieļāva vairākas kļūdas. Pašās beigās sportists atkrita uz 18. vietu.
title_translated: Video: Reishulis Punish the leader of the whole trip, Kubulins fails to hold on to third place
description_translated: Latvians representing both classes were among the leading riders in the first race of the European Motocross Championship. Jānis Mārtiņš Reišulis took second place in the Emx250 class since the start, persecuting leader Noel Zanoč, but he couldn't overtake the rival and finished second. In the EMX125 class, Jacob Kuubulins was seventh at first, but fought to third place before making several mistakes. At the very end, the athlete fell to 18th place.

title: Vite un Hike - kā divi labdari Liepājā reiz deva patvērumu simtiem bāreņu
description: Divi draugi, no kuriem viens bija tirgotājs un vecpuisis, bet otrs – arī tirgotājs un pilsētas maģistrāta amatvīrs, piecus gadus laulībā nodzīvojis, taču zaudējis gan pirmo bērnu, gan pēc tam otro bērnu un vienlaikus arī sievu, uz visiem laikiem iegājuši Liepājas pilsētas vēsturē kā labdari. Pateicoties viņu atstātajam mantojumam, 18. gadsimta beigās Liepāja tika pie pirmās bāreņzēnu patversmes.
title_translated: Vite and Hike - As two charity in Liepaja once gave shelter to hundreds of orphans
description_translated: Two friends, one was a merchant and a bachelor, and the other, a trader and a city master's official, lived in marriage for five years, but lost both the first child and then the second child and at the same time went to Liepaja's history as a charity. Thanks to their inheritance, Liepaja was at the first orphanage shelters at the end of the 18th century.

title: Leģendārā grupa "Rebel" atgriežas bez Lolas. "Mani neviens neaicināja..." sūrojas viņa
description: Uz Latvijas rokmūzikas skatuves sevi atkal piesaka grupa "Rebel", kurā vienam no tās dibinātājiem Igoram Novikovam pievienojusies dziedātāja Sabīne Berezina. Sarunā ar žurnālu "Kas Jauns" kādreizējā grupas soliste Lolita Novikova saka – šādas izmaiņas ar viņu nav ne pārrunātas, ne saskaņotas.
title_translated: The legendary group "Rebel" returns without Lola. "No one invited me ..."
description_translated: On the Latvian rock music scene, Rebel is once again announced, where singer Sabine Berezina has joined one of its founders Igor Novikov. In a conversation with the magazine "What's New", the former soloist of the group, Lolita Novikova, says that such changes have not been discussed or coordinated.

title: Spiegošanā apsūdzētais Krievijas pensionārs pārsūdzējis viņam piespriesto cietumsodu
description: Par spiegošanu Krievijas labā apsūdzētais 72 gadus vecs Krievijas pilsonis, bijušais padomju armijas virsnieks pārsūdzējis Rīgas rajona tiesas spriedumu, ar kuru viņam piespriests astoņu gadu cietumsods, liecina tiesu kalendārs.
title_translated: The Russian pensioner accused of espionage has appealed to him in prison sentence
description_translated: A 72 -year -old Russian citizen accused of espionage in Russia, a former Soviet army officer, has appealed the Riga District Court's judgment, which has been sentenced to eight years in prison, according to a court calendar.

title: Pirmdien vietām gaiss iesils līdz +22 grādiem
description: Pirmdienas pēcpusdienā gaisa temperatūra Latvijā paaugstināsies līdz +17..+22 grādiem, bet valsts austrumos un vietām piekrastē maksimālā temperatūra būs +12..+15 grādi.
title_translated: On Monday, the air will warm up to 22 degrees
description_translated: On Monday afternoon, the air temperature in Latvia will rise to 17.

title: Tramps sazvanījies ar Leienu; uz laiku atliek muitas tarifa ieviešanu importam no Eiropas Savienības
description: ASV prezidents Donalds Tramps svētdien paziņoja, ka atliks 50% muitas tarifa ieviešanu importam no Eiropas Savienības (ES) līdz 9.jūlijam, lai dotu laiku sarunām.
title_translated: Trump contacted the leap; Temporarily postpone the introduction of customs tariff for imports from the European Union
description_translated: US President Donald Trump said on Sunday that he would postpone the introduction of a 50% customs tariff for imports from the European Union (EU) until July 9 to give time to the negotiations.

title: Pēcpusdienā gaisa temperatūra vietām pakāpsies līdz +22 grādiem
description: Pirmdienas pēcpusdienā gaisa temperatūra Latvijā paaugstināsies līdz +17..+22 grādiem, bet valsts austrumos un vietām piekrastē maksimālā temperatūra būs +12..+15 grādi.
title_translated: In the afternoon the air temperature will rise to 22 degrees
description_translated: On Monday afternoon, the air temperature in Latvia will rise to 17.

title: Oilers hokejisti pārņem vadību Rietumu konferences finālā
description: Edmontonas "Oilers" svētdien Nacionālās hokeja līgas (NHL) Stenlija kausa Rietumu konferences finālā sērijā līdz četrām uzvarām panāca 2-1.
title_translated: Oilers hockey players take the lead in the Western Conference Finals
description_translated: Edmonton Oilers On Sunday, the National Hockey League (NHL) Stanley Cup in the Western Conference Finals Series reached 2-1 wins.

title: Pirmdiena būs vasarīgi silta
description: Pirmdienas rītā Latgalē ir apmācies laiks, daļā teritorijas līst, liecina meteoroloģiskā informācija.
title_translated: Monday will be summer warm
description_translated: Monday morning in Latgale is cloudy, with some areas it rains, according to meteorological information.

title: Norisināsies Gaisa spēku militārās mācības "Latvian Shield 25"
description: No šodienas līdz 28.maijam Ķeguma, Salaspils un Ķekavas novadu apkaimēs norisināsies Nacionālo bruņoto spēku Gaisa spēku organizētas militārās mācības "Latvian Shield 25", aģentūru LETA informēja Gaisa spēki.
title_translated: Air Force Military Training "Latvian Shield 25" will take place
description_translated: From today until May 28, the National Armed Forces Air Force Air Force Training "Latvian Shield 25" organized by the National Armed Forces Air Force will take place in Kegums, Salaspils and Kekava districts, LETA informed the Air Force.

title: Ukraina un Krievija noslēdz lielāko gūstekņu apmaiņu kopš kara sākuma
description: Nedēļas nogalē Ukraina un Krievija noslēgusi lielāko gūstekņu apmaiņu kopš kara sākuma, apmainoties ar 1000 gūstekņiem.
title_translated: Ukraine and Russia are closing the largest prisoners' exchange since the start of the war
description_translated: Over the weekend, Ukraine and Russia have concluded the largest prisoners' exchange since the start of the war, exchanging 1000 prisoners.

title: Putins kļuvis pilnīgi traks, secina Tramps
description: ASV prezidents Donalds Tramps asi kritizējis Krievijas diktatoru Vladimiru Putinu par uzbrukumiem Ukrainai, kuros tiek nogalināti civiliedzīvotāji, un paziņojis, ka Putins "ir kļuvis pilnīgi traks".
title_translated: Putin has become completely crazy, concludes Trump
description_translated: US President Donald Trump has strongly criticized Russian dictator Vladimir Putin for attacking Ukraine, which kills civilians and said Putin "has" become completely crazy ".

title: Eksperti: Obligāciju tirgus Latvijā piedzīvo grūdienu, jāaktivizē arī akciju tirgus
description: Uzņēmums "Rīgas ūdens" ir pirmā pašvaldības kapitālsabiedrība, kas savas obligācijas tirgo biržā. Maija vidū birža "Nasdaq Riga" uzsāka arī "Preses nama kvartāla" attīstītāja obligāciju iekļaušanu parāda vērtspapīru sarakstā. Un nule kā attīstības finanšu institūcija "Altum" emitējusi piecu gadu obligācijas par kopējo summu 70 miljoni eiro. Baltijas kapitāla tirgū pašlaik ir liela obligāciju tirdzniecības aktivitāte.
title_translated: Experts: Bond market in Latvia is experiencing a jerk, and the stock market should also be activated
description_translated: The company "Rīgas Ūdens" is the first municipal capital company to sell its bonds on the stock exchange. In mid -May, Nasdaq Riga also launched the inclusion of the Bonds of the Press House Quarter in the list of debt securities. And as a development finance institution "Altum" has issued five -year bonds for a total amount of EUR 70 million. There is currently high bond trade activity in the Baltic Capital Market.

title: NBS komandieris: tāldarbības atļauja Ukrainai varētu būt vienīgais veids, kā piespiest Putinu apstāties
description: Vācijas, Lielbritānijas, Francijas un ASV lēmums par tāldarbības ierobežojumu atcelšana Ukrainai piegādātajiem ieročiem ir labs, taču varbūt nedaudz novēlots, uzskata Latvijas Nacionālo bruņoto spēku (NBS) komandieris Kaspars Pudāns.
title_translated: NAF Commander: A long distance permit for Ukraine could be the only way to force Putin to stop
description_translated: The decision of Germany, Britain, France and the United States on the cancellation of weapons supplied to Ukraine is good, but perhaps a little late, says Kaspars Pudāns, commander of the Latvian National Armed Forces (NAF).

title: "Thunder" līderu lielisks sniegums aizved komandu soļa attālumā no NBA fināla
description: Oklahomasitijas "Thunder" pirmdien nonāca vienas uzvaras attālumā no iekļūšanas Nacionālās basketbola asociācijas (NBA) izslēgšanas spēļu finālā.
title_translated: Thunder leaders' excellent performance takes the team step away from the NBA Finals
description_translated: The Oklahoma City Thunder on Monday reached one victory from entering the final of the National Basketball Association (NBA) playoffs.

title: Kafijas pieredze: Kā kafija ietekmē mūsu sociālās attiecības
description: Kafija ir daudz vairāk nekā tikai dzēriens, ko mēs baudām, lai pamostos vai saglabātu enerģiju darba dienas laikā. Tā ir kļuvusi par būtisku sociālās dzīves sastāvdaļu - simbolu, kas apvieno cilvēkus, veicina sarunas un palīdz veidot attiecības dažādos dzīves līmeņos. No mājas virtuvēm līdz rosīgām kafejnīcām - kafija ir ieguvusi īpašu vietu kultūrās visā pasaulē.
title_translated: Coffee experience: How coffee affects our social relationship
description_translated: Coffee is much more than just a drink we enjoy to wake up or maintain energy during the working day. It has become an important part of social life - a symbol that brings together people, promotes conversations and helps build relationships at different levels of life. From home kitchens to bustling cafes - coffee has gained a special place in cultures around the world.

title: Apburošā Ramona Plūme tikusi pie sapņu darba
description: View this post on Instagram A post shared by Ramona Plūme (@ramona.plume)Ramona Plūme, ko daudzi iepazina kā Latvijas Televīzijas laika ziņu moderatori, atklājusi, ka viņai izdevies piepildīt savu sapni - strādāt radio, vēsta žurnāls "Kas Jauns".
title_translated: The delightful Ramona plum has been to dream work
description_translated: View This Post On Instagram a Post Shared by Ramona Plum (@Ramona.plume) Ramona Plum, which many learned how Latvian Television weather moderators have discovered that she has managed to fulfill her dream of working on the radio.

title: Sievu apņēmis bobslejists Dāvis Kaufmanis
description: View this post on Instagram A post shared by Aiga Kaufmane (@aiigaaa)Mērsragā maija vidū gredzenus mija Latvijas bobsleja pilots Dāvis Kaufmanis un viņa mīļotā sieviete, banku speciāliste Aiga, ziņo žurnāls "Kas Jauns".
title_translated: The wife was determined by the bobsleighist Davis Kaufmanis
description_translated: View this post on instagram a post shared by Aiga Kaufmane (@Aiigaaa) in Mersrags in the middle of May rings Latvian bobsleigh pilot Davis Kaufmanis and his beloved woman, banking specialist Aiga, reports "What's New" magazine.

title: NBS komandieris komentē lēmumu par tāldarbības ierobežojumu atcelšanu Ukrainai piegādātajiem ieročiem
description: Vācijas, Lielbritānijas, Francijas un ASV lēmums par tāldarbības ierobežojumu atcelšanu Ukrainai piegādātajiem ieročiem ir labs, taču varbūt nedaudz novēlots, intervijā TV3 raidījumam "900 sekundes" komentēja Latvijas Nacionālo Bruņoto spēku (NBS) komandieris Kaspars Pudāns.
title_translated: The NAF Commander comments on the cancellation of the removal of distance restrictions on weapons delivered to Ukraine
description_translated: The decision of Germany, Britain, France and the United States to cancel the weapons delivered to Ukraine is good, but perhaps a little late, Kaspars Pudāns, commander of the Latvian National Armed Forces (NAF), commented in an interview with TV3's "900 Seconds".

title: Iznākusi grāmata par leģendāro restorānu Osiris
description: Iznākusi grāmata _Osiris. Sākums_, kas aicina lasītāju iejusties leģendārā restorāna atmosfērā un atsaukt atmiņā laikus, kad viss tikai sākās. Grāmatas atvēršanas svētki - 5. jūnijā, informēja fonda _Mākslai vajag telpu_ pārstāve Katrīna Jaunupe
title_translated: A book about the legendary restaurant Osiris
description_translated: The book _Siris has come out. Beginning_, who invites the reader to get into the atmosphere of a legendary restaurant and recall the time when everything just started. The opening ceremony of the book - June 5, informed Katrīna Jaunupe, a spokeswoman for the Foundation _

title: Zelenskis: Krievija plāno jaunu ofensīvu
description: Ukrainas prezidents Volodimirs Zelenskis pirmdien paziņoja, ka Krievija plāno jaunu ofensīvu pēc naktī uz pirmdienu veiktā Krievijas raķešu un dronu trieciena Ukrainas pilsētām, ko Zelenskis nosauca par "lielāko" kopš pilna mēroga iebrukuma sākuma 2022.gadā.
title_translated: Zelensky: Russia plans a new offensive
description_translated: Ukrainian President Volodimir Zelensky said on Monday that Russia was planning a new offensive after a blow to Ukrainian cities on Monday night on Monday, which Zelenski called the "largest" since the full -scale invasion of 2022.

title: Lielbritānijas karalis Čārlzs viesojas Kanādā, pauž atbalstu tās suverenitātei
description: Trīs dienu vizītē Kanādā ieradies Lielbritānijas karalis Čārlzs III un karaliene Kamilla. Viens no viesošanās mērķiem ir paust atbalstu Kanādas suverenitātei. Čārlzs formāli ir Kanādas valsts galva, tāpēc viņa vizīte ir tiešs mājiens ASV prezidentam Donaldam Trampam, kurš izteicies par Kanādas pievienošanu ASV, nosaucot to par 51. ASV štatu.
title_translated: The King of Britain Charles is visiting Canada, supporting its sovereignty
description_translated: King Charles III and Queen Kamilla came to Canada for a three -day visit to Canada. One of the goals of visit is to express support for Canadian sovereignty. Charles is formally the head of Canadian state, so his visit is a direct hint of US President Donald Trump, who has spoken out about the addition of Canada to the US, calling it 51.

title: Rinkēvičs: Mums vajag vairāk karavīru, bruņojuma un munīcijas
description: Latvijai nepieciešams vairāk karavīru, bruņojuma un munīcijas, pēc Militārās padomes sēdes secinājis Valsts prezidents Edgars Rinkēvičs. Intervijā Latvijas Televīzijai viņš atzīst, ka vērsīsies pie...
title_translated: Rinkēvičs: We need more soldiers, armaments and ammunition
description_translated: Latvia needs more soldiers, armaments and ammunition, after the military council, President Edgars Rinkēvičs concluded. In an interview with Latvian Television, he admits that he will appeal to ...

title: Jūrmalas virzienā – vilciens ik pēc 15 minūtēm; spēkā stāsies vasaras grafiks
description: Lai nodrošinātu ērtākus un biežākus savienojumus ar iecienītiem brīvdienu galamērķiem, no 31. maija tiek ieviests vasaras vilcienu kustības grafiks. Tajā paredzētas izmaiņas Tukuma un Siguldas virzienā, kā arī palielināts reisu skaits maršrutos uz Jūrmalu un Saulkrastiem. Jūrmalas virzienā tiks ieviests 15 minūšu intervāla grafiks, kas būtiski uzlabos vilcienu pieejamību un ļaus pasažieriem vienkāršāk plānot braucienus un orientēties kustības sarakstā.
title_translated: In the direction of Jurmala - the train every 15 minutes; The summer schedule will come into effect

description: Japānas valdība paziņojusi, ka pie premjerministra biroja Tokijā, kā arī pašā premjera kabinetā, tiks stādītas puķes, izmantojot īpašu augsni no Fukušimas apgabala. Šī augsne tika savākta pēc 2011. gada kodolkatastrofas, un to ilgstoši uzglabāja, jo tā bija nedaudz radioaktīva.
title_translated: The Japanese Prime Minister has decided to grow flowers in his office in radioactive soil

This soil was collected after the 2011 nuclear disaster and was stored for a long time because it was slightly radioactive.

Dodoties no Jēkabpils uz Rēzekni, jārēķinās ar palēninātu satiksmi un papildu 45 minūtēm ceļā, jo tur ieviesti divi luksofora posmi un ātruma ierobežojumi, portāls "Delfi" uzzināja uzņēmumā "Latvijas Valsts ceļi" (LVC).

When you go from Jekabpils to Rezekne, you have to take into account slowed traffic and an additional 45 minutes on the way, as two traffic lights and speed limits have been introduced there, the portal "Delfi" found out in the company "Latvian State Roads" (LVC).

title: Vilki Eiropā vairs nav "stingri aizsargāti". Vai tas nozīmē, ka Latvijā tos drīkstēs medīt vairāk? Skaidro pētnieks Jānis Ozoliņš
description: Pēc tam, kad Eiropas Parlaments (EP) šī gada 8. maijā lēma vilku aizsardzības statusu nomainīt no "stingri aizsargātiem" uz "aizsargātiem" dzīvniekiem, arī Latvijas sabiedrībā pacēlās jautājums, vai šīs izmaiņas nozīmē to, ka vilkus Latvijā turpmāk varēs medīt vairāk. Ko šīs izmaiņas nozīmē un kādēļ tās tika pieņemtas? Skaidro mežzinātnes institūta "Silava" vadošais pētnieks Jānis Ozoliņš.
title_translated: Wolves in Europe are no longer "firmly protected". Does this mean that they can be hunted in Latvia? Explains researcher Jānis Ozoliņš
description_translated: After the European Parliament (EP) decided to replace the wolf's defense status from "firmly protected" animals to "protected" animals, the question also raised the question of whether these changes mean that the wolves in Latvia could be hunted in Latvia. What does these changes mean and why were they accepted? Explains Janis Ozolins, a senior researcher at the Silava Institute of Forestry.

title: Arheologi Gvatemalas džungļos atraduši 3000 gadus vecas maiju pilsētas paliekas. FOTO
description: Gvatemalas ziemeļos, Petēnas reģionā, atklātas vairāk nekā 2800 gadu vecas maiju pilsētas paliekas, kas datējamas ar laiku no 800. līdz 500. gadam pirms mūsu ēras. Gvatemalas Kultūras ministrija norāda, ka atklātās pilsētas platība bijusi aptuveni 16 kvadrātkilometri, un tā bijusi viena no vecākajiem un nozīmīgākajiem maiju civilizācijas ceremonālajiem centriem.
title_translated: Archaeologists in the Guatemala jungle have found a 3000 -year -old Mayan city remains. Photo
description_translated: In the north of Guatemala, the Peteen region, more than 2,800 -year -old Mayan city remains, dating from 800 to 500 BC. The Guatemala Ministry of Culture points out that the area of ​​the open city was about 16 square kilometers and was one of the oldest and most important ceremonies of Mayan civilization.

title: Pašnāvību epidēmija – starpkaru Latvijas “zelta laiku” tumšā puse
description: “Pašnāvību sērga pārņēmusi visu tautu. Neviena diena nepaiet, ka nedzirdētu par kādu pašnāvību. Visdažādāko iemeslu dēļ ļaudīm patīk braukt uz debesīm. Bieži pašnāvību iemesli ir tik niecīgi un smieklīgi, ka nav pat spļāviena vērti,” tā 1930. gadā rakstīja avīze "Madonas Ziņas". Un ne jau tikai tā vien bija satraukusies par šo tēmu, jo pašnāvību apmēri Latvijā jau vairākus gadus bija tādi, ka tiešām varēja runāt par pašnāvību epidēmiju.
title_translated: Suicide epidemic - the dark side of interwar Latvia's "golden time"
description_translated: "Suicide has taken over the entire nation. No day goes on to hear about any suicide. For a variety of reasons, people love to go to heaven. Often the reasons for suicide are so small and funny that there is not even a spit," said Madona News in 1930. And not only was it worried about this topic, as the amount of suicide in Latvia has been such that one could really talk about a suicide epidemic.

title: Princis Harijs, Bruklins Bekhems, Makolijs Kalkins, Džolija un Adele - slavenības, kam ir sarežģītas attiecības ar tēviem
description: Ikviens no mums ir strīdējies ar vecākiem – tas ir neizbēgams pieaugšanas process. Tomēr daži konflikti pāraug ilgstošās nesaskaņās, kas var novest pie pilnīgas attiecību izjukšanas. Smagas domstarpības ar tēvu radušās ne tikai princim Harijam un Bruklinam Bekhemam, bet arī tādām slavenībām kā Andželinai Džolijai, Adelei, Makolijam Kalkinam un Bejonsai.
title_translated: Prince Harry, Brooklyn Beckham, Makoli Kalkin, Jolie and Adele - Celebrities having a difficult relationship with fathers
description_translated: Each of us has argued with our parents - this is an inevitable process of growth. However, some conflicts grow into prolonged disagreements, which can lead to complete disruption of the relationship. Not only Prince Harry and Brooklyn Beckham, but also celebrities such as Angelina Jolie, Adele, Macoli Kalkin and Beyon, are seriously disagreed with his father.

title: Andris Keišs savaldzina simtiem sieviešu, Ainars Mielavs no dāmām lūdzas tādu pašu aplausu vētru

description: Atzīmējot Latgales kopdziedāšanas tradīcijas simtgadi un Daugavpils 750. jubileju pēc desmit gadu pārtraukuma Stropu estrādē 1. jūnijā notiks kārtējo Latgales Dziesmu svētku lielkoncerts. Pēc skaita tie būs jau piecpadsmitie lielie Latgales dziedāšanas svētki. Lai arī varu maiņu un okupācijas laikā Latgales Dziesmu svētku oficiālais nosaukums ir mainījies, tas bija tikai niansēs (Latgales jaunatnes dziesmu svētki, Latgales apgabala dziesmu svētki, Novada dziesmu svētki Daugavpilī), to “lielo hronoloģiju” var apjaust. description_translated: Celebrating the centenary of the Latgale singing tradition and the 750th anniversary of Daugavpils after a ten -year hiatus on June 1, the big concert of the Latgale Song Festival will take place. By number they will be the fifteenth big Latgale Singing Festival. Although the official name of the Latgale Song Festival has changed during the change and during the occupation, it was only in the nuances (Latgale Youth Song Festival, Latgale District Song Festival, County Song Festival in Daugavpils), their "Great Chronology" can be realized. title: SAB aicina ceļotājus būt uzmanīgiem, īpaši, ceļojot ārpus ES un NATO
description: Pēdējo gadu ģeopolitiskajā situācijā Krievijas, kā arī citu Latvijai nedraudzīgu valstu, izlūkošanas un drošības dienesti ir pastiprinājuši savu darbību rietumvalstu, tostarp Latvijas virzienā, kā arī mainījuši darba metodes, īstenojot ietekmes pasākumus jeb hibrīdaktivitātes. Ir vērojama apņēmība un gatavība Eiropā, arī Latvijā, pielietot arvien agresīvākas aktivitātes, tostarp sabotāžas. Tādēļ, atbilstoši aktuālajiem drošības izaicinājumiem, Satversmes aizsardzības birojs (SAB) aicina Latvijas iedzīvotājus būt modriem un uzmanīgiem, lai tādējādi pretotos iespējamiem drošības apdraudējumiem.
title_translated: SAB calls for travelers to be careful, especially when traveling outside the EU and NATO
description_translated: In the geopolitical situation of recent years, intelligence and security services in Russia, as well as other countries that are unacceptable to Latvia, have stepped up its activities towards Western countries, including Latvia, as well as changed working methods in implementing influence measures or hybrid activity. There is determination and readiness in Europe, including in Latvia, to use increasingly aggressive activities, including sabotage. Therefore, according to current security challenges, the Constitutional Protection Bureau (SAB) calls on the people of Latvia to be vigilant and careful to resist possible security threats.

title: Jaunākā prognoze – nedēļas otrajā pusē būs daudz nokrišņu; vietām aug plūdu risks

description_translated: Starting on Thursday, there will be a lot of rainfall in Latvia and floods in the eastern and central parts of the country, forecasts by the opticians.

title: Zemestrīce Turcijā: 70 cilvēki ievainoti, panikā lecot ārā pa logiem
description: Turcijas dienvidrietumos, tūristu iecienītajā Muglas provincē, otrdien notikusi 5,8 magnitūdu zemestrīce, kurā gājusi bojā pusaudze un ievainoti 70 cilvēki, paziņojušas vietējās amatpersonas.
title_translated: Earthquake in Turkey: 70 people hurt by panic jumping out of windows
description_translated: In southwest Turkey, a 5.8 magnitude earthquake in the popular Muglas province of Mugla, which killed a teenager and injured 70 people, said local officials.

title: Dienvidkorejā notiek prezidenta vēlēšanas
description: Dienvidkorejā šodien notiek prezidenta vēlēšanas, kas tika izsludinātas pēc iepriekšējās valsts galvas Juna Sukjola atcelšanas no amata.
title_translated: Presidential elections are held in South Korea
description_translated: In South Korea today, the presidential election is held, which was announced after the former head of the country, Juna Sukjols.

title: "Lightning" paraksta ilgtermiņa līgumu ar Gordu
description: Latvijas hokejista Zemgus Grigensona pārstāvētā Nacionālās hokeja līgas (NHL) vienība Tampabejas "Lightning" uz sešiem gadiem pagarināja vienošanos ar uzbrucēju Janni Gordu, pirmdien pavēstīja "Lightning".
title_translated: "Lightning" signs a long -term contract with Gord
description_translated: Latvian hockey player Zemgus Grigenson's National Hockey League (NHL) unit Tampabey's Lightning extended an agreement with striker Janni Gord for six years, Lightning said on Monday.

title: Rakst-raudži un vairāk nekā 430 ilustrācijas. Izdota grāmata par tamborēšanas vēsturi Latvijā
description: Jaunu grāmatu izdevis Latvijas Etnogrāfiskais brīvdabas muzejs un tā ir Etnogrāfijas departamenta vadītājas Aijas Jansones grāmata "Tamborēšanas māksla Latvijā 19. gadsimta beigas – 20. gadsimts". Grāmata izdota ar Valsts Kultūrkapitāla fonda atbalstu un, kā jau mēs varam nojaust pēc virsraksta, tā veltīta tautā tik populārajai tamborēšanas mākslai, ko lieto kā apģērba, tā arī telpu un gultas tekstiliju darināšanā. Kuram gan mājās nav kāda vecmāmiņas tamborēta sedziņa, dvielis vai mežģīne? Kā izrādās, tā nav nemaz tik sena māksla Latvijā.
title_translated: Writers and over 430 illustrations. Published book on crochet history in Latvia
description_translated: The new book was published by the Latvian Ethnographic Open -Air Museum and is Aija Jansone, Head of the Ethnographic Department, "The Art of Crochet in Latvia at the end of the 19th century - 20th century". The book was published with the support of the State Culture Capital Foundation and, as we can guess the title, it is dedicated to the popular crochet art, which is used in the making of clothing and rooms and bed textiles. Who doesn't have any grandmother's crocheted blanket, towel or lace at home? As it turns out, this is not such an ancient art in Latvia.

title: Izraēla apšaudījusi Sīrijas dienvidus
description: Atbildot uz diviem no Sīrijas pret Izraēlu izšautiem šāviņiem, Izraēlas armija otrdien uzbrukusi mērķiem Sīrijā.
title_translated: Israel fired southern Syria
description_translated: In response to two Shots fired from Syria against Israel, the Israeli army attacked targets in Syria on Tuesday.

title: Laksa gūst desmit punktus Mercury zaudējumā WNBA līderei Lynx
description: Latvijas basketboliste Kitija Laksa otrdien guva desmit punktus Sieviešu nacionālās basketbola asociācijas (WNBA) mačā, Fīniksas "Mercury" komandai piedzīvojot zaudējumu.
title_translated: Laksa scores ten points in Mercury Loss WNBA Leader Lynx
description_translated: Latvian basketball player Kitty Laks on Tuesday scored ten points in the Women's National Basketball Association (WNBA) match, with the Mercury team losing to the Mercury team.

title: Zelenskis veic pārkārtojumus Ukrainas bruņoto spēku vadībā
description: Ukrainas prezidents Volodimirs Zelenskis otrdienas vakarā paziņoja, ka bijušais Ukrainas armijas Sauszemes spēku komandieris ģenerālmajors Mihailo Drapatijs atbrīvots no organizatoriskiem uzdevumiem, piemēram, mobilizācijas, apmācības un rekrūšu sagatavošanas, bet viņš paliks bruņotajos spēkos.
title_translated: Zelenski is making rearrangements under the guidance of Ukrainian armed forces
description_translated: Ukrainian President Volodimir Zelensky said Tuesday night that former Commander of the Ukrainian Army Land Force Major General Mikhailo Drapaty was released from organizational tasks such as mobilization, training and recruit preparation, but will remain in the armed forces.

title: Šodien vārda dienu svin Elfrīda, Sintija un Sindija, bet uzvārda dienu – Adamoviči, Matuseviči, Stikuti, Antipovi
title_translated: Today's name day is celebrated by Elfrid, Cynthia and Cindy, but the surname day - Adamovich, Matusevichi, Stikuti, Antipovi

title: Kas notiks ar elektroenerģijas cenām pēc "Estlink 2" darbības atjaunošanas?
description: Igauniju un Somiju savienojošā elektrības starpsavienojuma "Estlink 2" darbības atjaunošana varētu galvenokārt sekmēt elektroenerģijas cenas samazinājumu Baltijas valstīs augstāka pieprasījuma jeb pīķa stundās, aģentūrai LETA norādīja Sabiedrisko pakalpojumu regulēšanas komisijas (SPRK) Enerģētikas departamenta direktors Jānis Negribs.
title_translated: What will happen to the electricity prices after the Restoration of Estlink 2?
description_translated: Restoration of the operation of Estonia and Finland's connecting electricity interconnection "ESTLINK 2" could mainly contribute to a reduction in electricity prices in the Baltic States in higher demand or peak hours, Jānis Nants, Director of the Public Utilities Commission (PUC), told LETA.

title: ASV stājas spēkā 50% tarifi tērauda un alumīnija importam
description: No trešdienas ASV ievērojami palielina ievedmuitu tēraudam un alumīnijam – tarifi dubultojas no līdzšinējiem 25% uz 50%. Šo rīkojumu ir parakstījis ASV prezidents Donalds Tramps, tā vēsta BBC.
title_translated: The US enters into force at 50% tariffs for steel and aluminum imports
description_translated: From Wednesday, the US significantly increases import duties for steel and aluminum - tariffs doubled from the current 25% to 50%. This order is signed by US President Donald Trump, the BBC reports.

title: Šoigu ieradies vizītē Ziemeļkorejā
description: Krievijas Drošības padomes sekretārs Sergejs Šoigu trešdien ieradies vizītē Phenjanā, kur viņam paredzēts tikties ar Ziemeļkorejas līderi Kimu Čenunu, ziņo Krievijas propagandas mediji.
description_translated: Sergei Shuig, secretary of the Russian Security Council, has come to Pyongyang on Wednesday, where he is scheduled to meet North Korean leader Kim Chenun, Russian propaganda media reports.

title: Pildegovičs komentē Krievijas rīcību ANO Drošības padomes balsojumā
description: Varam nojaust, ka balsojumā par Latvijas ievēlēšanu Apvienoto Nāciju organizācijas Drošības padomē (ANO DP) atturējās Krievija un tās sabiedrotās, intervijā TV3 raidījumā "900 sekundes" sacīja speciālo uzdevumu vēstnieks, Latvijas kandidatūras sekretariāta vadītājs Andrejs Pildegovičs.
title_translated: Pildegovich comments on Russia's actions in the UN Security Council vote
description_translated: We can guess that Russia and its allies abstained from the United Nations Security Council (UN DP), said Andrei Pildegovich, the head of the Special Task Force in an interview on TV3's "900 Seconds".

title: Pēc traģiskā negadījuma izmeklēšanas Jūrmalā izvērtēs iespējamos Dzintaru Mežaparka skatu torņa drošības uzlabojumus
description: Pēc maija beigās notikušā traģiskā negadījuma izmeklēšanas Jūrmalas pašvaldība izvērtēs iespējamos Dzintaru Mežaparka skatu torņa drošības uzlabojumus.
title_translated: After an investigation into the tragic accident in Jurmala will evaluate possible improvements in the security of the Dzintari Mežaparks View Tower
description_translated: After the tragic accident at the end of May, the Jurmala Municipality will evaluate the possible improvements of the security of the Dzintari Mežaparks View Tower.

title: Vilmanim ar komandu izdevies sasniegt Kaldera kausa finālu
description: Latvijas uzbrucējs Sandis Vilmanis otrdien kopā ar Šarlotas "Checkers" komandu sasniedza Amerikas Hokeja līgas (AHL) "play-off" turnīra jeb Kaldera kausa finālu.
title_translated: Vilmanis and the team managed to reach the Calder Cup Finals
description_translated: Latvian striker Sandis Vilmanis reached the American Hockey League (AHL) play-off tournament or Calder Cup final on Tuesday with the Charlotte "Checkers" team.

title: Portugāles futbolisti Nāciju līgas pusfinālā pārspēj Vāciju
description: Portugāles vīriešu futbola izlase trešdien Minhenē pārspēja Vācijas izlasi un iekļuva UEFA Nāciju līgas A līgas finālā. Portugāle uzvarēja ar 2:1 (0:0).
title_translated: Portuguese footballers beat Germany in the semi -finals of the League
description_translated: The Portuguese men's football team beat the German team in Munich on Wednesday and entered the final of the UEFA Nations League A league. Portugal won by 2: 1 (0: 0).

title: Eiropa piedzīvo lielāko difterijas uzliesmojumu 70 gadu laikā
description: Rietumeiropa kopš 2022.gada piedzīvo lielāko difterijas uzliesmojumu pēdējo 70 gadu laikā, secināts trešdien publiskotā pētījumā.
title_translated: Europe is experiencing the biggest outbreak of diphtheria in 70 years
description_translated: Western Europe has been experiencing the largest outbreak of diphtheria in the last 70 years since 2022, according to a study released Wednesday.

title: Stenlija kausa finālsērijas pirmajā mačā papildlaikā uzvaru izrauj Edmontonas "Oilers"
description: Floridas "Panthers" bez Latvijas aizsarga Uvja Balinska sastāvā trešdien Nacionālās hokeja līgas (NHL) Stenlija kausa izcīņās finālsērijas pirmajā mačā ar 4:3 (2:1, 1:1, 0:1, 0:1) papildlaikā piekāpās Edmontonas "Oilers", kas sērijā līdz četrām uzvarām izvirzījās vadībā ar 1-0.
title_translated: In the first match of the Stanley Cup finals, the winner of the Edmonton Oilers
description_translated: Florida Panthers In addition to Latvian defender Uvja Balinsky on Wednesday, the National Hockey League (NHL) Stanley Cup in the first match of the finals with a 4: 3 (2: 1, 1: 1, 0: 1, 0: 1) defeated Edmonton's "Oilers" in the series in the series in up to four wins.

title: Putins un pāvests telefonsarunā apsprieduši karu Ukrainā
description: Krievijas diktators Vladimirs Putins trešdien sazvanījies ar Romas katoļu baznīcas pāvestu Leonu XIV, un telefonsarunā apsprieduši situāciju Ukrainā.
title_translated: Putin and Pope have discussed war in Ukraine in a telephone conversation
description_translated: Russian dictator Vladimir Putin on Wednesday contacted Pope Leon XIV, the Roman Catholic Church, and discussed the situation in Ukraine in a telephone conversation.

title: "Panthers" hokejisti papildlaikā zaudē Stenlija kausa finālsērijas pirmajā mačā
description: Floridas "Panthers" bez Latvijas aizsarga Uvja Balinska sastāvā trešdien Nacionālās hokeja līgas (NHL) Stenlija kausa izcīņās finālsērijas pirmajā mačā piedzīvoja zaudējumu.
title_translated: Panthers hockey players lose in the first match of the Stanley Cup Finals
description_translated: Florida's Panthers, without Latvian defender Uvja Balinsky, lost to the National Hockey League (NHL) Stanley Cup on Wednesday in the first match of the finals.

title: Šilovam divas smagas trešdaļas, Abotsforda otrajā papildlaikā nospiež dienvidniekus
description: Trīs piegājieni tikt Kaldera kausa finālā būs Kanādas komandai Abotsfordas "Canucks", kura šorīt ar 5:4 otrajā papildlaikā pieveica Teksasas "Stars".
title_translated: Shilov's two heavy thirds, Abotford presses southern overtime in the second extra time
description_translated: Three runs will be for the Calder Cup final for the Canadian team for the Canucks, which beat Texas's Stars in the second overtime this morning.

title: Nakts uzbrukumos Ukrainai Krievija nogalinājusi vismaz 5 cilvēkus, arī gadu vecu bērnu
description: Aizvadītajā naktī Krievijas trieciendronu uzbrukumā Ukrainas pilsētai Priluki Černihivas apgabalā nogalināti vismaz pieci cilvēki, arī gadu vecs bērns. Krievijas īstenotajos uzbrukumos citviet Ukrainā cietuši vēl vairāki civiliedzīvotāji.
title_translated: Night attacks on Ukraine Russia killed at least 5 people, including a year old
description_translated: Last night, at least five people, including a one -year -old child, were killed in the Russian impact drone attack on the Ukrainian city of Priluki in the Chernihiv region. Several civilians have been injured elsewhere in Ukraine's attacks in Russia.

title: Krievijas dronu uzbrukumā Ukrainai pieci nogalinātie, daudzi ievainotie
description: Krievijas dronu uzbrukumā Ukrainai aizvadītajā naktī nogalināti pieci cilvēki un daudzi ievainoti, kā arī nodarīti postījumi dzīvojamām ēkām, ceturtdien paziņoja Ukrainas amatpersonas.
title_translated: Russian drone attack on Ukraine five killed, many injured
description_translated: The Russian drone attack on Ukraine last night killed five people and many injured, as well as damage to residential buildings, Ukrainian officials said Thursday.

title: Tramps un Putins pirmo reizi komentējis Ukrainas grandiozo operāciju "Zirnekļtīkls"
description: Amerikas Savienoto Valstu prezidents Donalds Tramps paziņojis, ka vairāk nekā stundu garā tālruņa sarunā viņš ar Krievijas vadītāju Vladimiru Putinu apspriedis Krievijas speciālo operāciju "Zirnekļtīkls", kuras laikā ukraiņi iznīcināja gandrīz trešdaļu no Krievijas stratēģiskās bumbvedēju flotes.
title_translated: Trump and Putin have first commented on the Ukrainian grandiose operation "Spider Network"
description_translated: United States President Donald Trump has announced that in a more than an hour -long telephone conversation, he discussed with Russian head Vladimir Putin, a Russian special operation "Spider Network", during which the Ukrainians destroyed almost a third of Russia's strategic bombers fleet.

description: Krievijas dronu uzbrukumā Ukrainai aizvadītajā naktī nogalināti pieci cilvēki un daudzi ievainoti, kā arī nodarīti postījumi dzīvojamām ēkām, ceturtdien paziņoja Ukrainas amatpersonas.
